utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , you have many opportunities to grow in this company as long as you do well .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That's perfect . I will definitely do well .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hey , That's a really nice outfit you have on .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Why , thank you . I wasn't sure if it looked okay or not . I can't believe all the words the salesgirl said .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , you look stunning . Your dress really goes well with your shoes .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm glad that you think so . I thought it might be a bit too revealing .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: No , not at all . It looks really classy on you . Where did you pick that up ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I got it on sale down at the department store .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: When did you go there ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I was just there a couple of days ago . You know , you should go down there too . They have a lot of stylish clothes on sale .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I might just do that . What style of clothes do they have ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Anything you want . They have both casual and formal styles .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I was hoping to get a few new ties for my collection .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That's a good idea . Some of your ties are pretty outdated .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , I spent a lot of money on getting my shirts tailor-made , so I couldn't afford to buy any new ties .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Anyways , are you going to the party tonight ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , I am . Say , are you going to wear that outfit to the party ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I don't think so . It is a little too formal . I'm probably going to wear something more laid back .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Me too . I will probably go dressed in a T-shirt and jeans .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I guess that you will really be dressing down .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That's my style when I'm not in the office .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Good point . I suppose that we all have our own individual styles .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I have never seen so many flavors of ice cream in one place !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: There certainly are a lot . Can you choose a favorite ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Vanilla with toppings is my favorite .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Is there anything as good as a hot fudge sundae ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: No way ! Do you have a flavors you don't like ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I don't like ice cream with too many different flavors in it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I agree with that , it just doesn't work for me .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I saw garlic ice cream on the menu once .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I think that would be horrible !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I think I'll stick with a more traditional choice today !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hi , Li Ming . You look upset . What's the matter ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: There will be a parents ' meeting in our class this Saturday and I am worried about it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Why ? We can leave school earlier that day .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I didn't do well in last exams . If my father knows it , he will beat me up .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I can't believe it . My parents never beat me .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You know that my father is irritable .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You can ask the teacher for help .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Good idea .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: This is the first time for me to have a Chinese guest . I hope you like western cooking .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes . I like it very much .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Cooking is a hobby with me . I'm always trying to think up new recipes . I hope you like the soup . It's kind of a specialty of mine , so I hope you enjoy it .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It's excellent .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thank you for your compliment . Won't you try this fish with white sauce ? I'm rather round of it .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It's delicious .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What sort of western food do you like best ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I like beefsteak very much . Have you tried Chinese dishes ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I find the Chinese dishes wonderful .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , it's getting late . I have to get up early tomorrow . So I must say good night .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It's still early .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hi , come on in . Can I take your coat ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sure , thanks . I brought you a bottle of wine as well .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You're the first guest to arrive . I'll just put your coat away and then I'll get you something to drink .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Should I take my shoes off ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Whatever you prefer .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: This is a very nice place . How long have you been living here now ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Just over three weeks . Would you like a drink ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sure , what do you have ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I've got white wine , red wine , gin and tonics , ginger ale , lemonade , orange juice , and sprite .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'll have a glass of red wine please .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: One glass of red wine coming up !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: So how many people are coming for the dinner tonight ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: There's just going to be 6 of us tonight .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , I thought there were going to be eight . who isn't coming ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Marcia and Paul called to cancel at the last moment . Paul was running late and Marcia wasn't feeling well .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That's too bad . They ' re such good company .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I think there's someone at the door . Excuse me while I go and get that .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Can you believe her ? She is not even a hundred pounds and she is going off on how she wants to go on a diet .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Tell me about it . If I was as small as her , I wouldn't think about going on a diet .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Me too . But what are we going to do ? I have been on 4 different diets and I can't seem to lose weight .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That's because you don't exercise . If you were more active , you wouldn't have a dieting problem .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What do you know ? You are over weight too .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm not on a diet though .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I know . But I don't have someone to diet with . If we help each other and motivate each other , then I think we can lose some weight .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I like ice cream too much though .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: C'mon . You'll feel better and look better and as a reward you can eat a little bit of ice cream here and there .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It does sound appealing .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It's a great idea . I can't believe I didn't think of this earlier . Going on a diet with a friend to back you up is a great way to succeed .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Okay . I'm in . Let's do it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Great . I'll get our plan started right away .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Can we start tomorrow though ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You ' re making my blood boil .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Calm down . Madam .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm about to explode ! You ' Ve made a mess of this matter .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I am very sorry to hear that you ' Ve been having so many problems .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Sorry isn ' t good enough ! What can you do to help me ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I understand why you ' re angry , Mrs . Wilson , and believe me , we are doing everything in our power to work this out .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , obviously , what you ' re doing is not good enough !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: If you could just give us a few more days , we should be able to get this straightened out .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It's late . It ' s high time I left . Thank you for a most wonderful evening .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Don't mention it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Good night then !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Good night !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Dan , Dan , dude . You have to come over to my house right now !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Is everything OK ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Just get over here !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Come in ! Quickly !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: So , since when is your house a bank ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What do you mean ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I mean , what ' s up with the locks and iron bars on your windows .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Security , Dan , security ! You can never be too safe you know ! A lot of sickos out there . Just the other day they caught that peeping tom red handed ! Had a high power telescope and binoculars by his window .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What ' s the matter with you ? Why are you acting all paranoid ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Paranoid ? I ' m not paranoid ! I ' m cautious ! You see Dan , we have to be on guard at all time ! People just invade your privacy as if they knew you ! Telemarketers , solicitors , even your bank ! They have way too much information ! I like to keep everything on a need to know basis .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: OK , well , what did you want to see me about ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You are being watched ! Be careful Dan ! Be careful !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hey Mark . What are you doing ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Just watching some TV .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Anything interesting on ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Not really . Just watching the sports highlight on ESPN .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: So I take it you're pretty bored too .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Just killing time until I find something to do . What are you going to do ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It's Saturday and we are sitting at home doing nothing . What's wrong with us ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You wanna shoot some hoops ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I already tried to call up some of the guys , but they are all busy .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Where's your girlfriend ? I thought you were going out with her today .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: She's out shopping with her friends .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Let's go to Starbucks and think of something to do then .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Aright . Do you have any cigarettes ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I only have a couple left . Why don't you pick some up on the way .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Ok . See you there in about 30 minutes .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Aright . See you there .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Why don't you come round for a meal one evening next week ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'd love to .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Which day would suit you ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Any day except Tuesday .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How about Thursday ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , Thursday would be fine . What time shall I come ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , about 6:00 . Will that be OK ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , of course . Thank you very much .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: See you on Thursday , then .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Will you be done doing my hair soon ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Give me a little while longer .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How much time do you need ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: There you go . How do you like it ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I think it looks gorgeous .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You think it looks nice ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I honestly think it looks great .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thanks . I'm glad that I did a good job .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How much is it for my hair ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Just give me $ 55 .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thanks for doing such a good job .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No problem , girl friend . I'll see you next time .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hot in here , isn't it ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yeah , really .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Is it Ok if I sit here ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Of course . Suit yourself .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thanks . My name's Bill Peters , by the way .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hi , I'm Susan Jackson .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Nice to meet you . And what do you do , Susan ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm a student at UCLA .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , are you ? And what are you studying ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Medicine .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Really ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , I want to be a doctor one of these days . What about you ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm an engineer , I work for Boeing . Say , would you like a drink ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sure . Thanks .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hey , Ted . What are you up to this Friday ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , I have the day off from work .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That ' s great ! Do you have any plans ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , I ' Ve been working so hard lately , so I ' ll probably just take it easy .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Sounds nice .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yeah , I ' ll probably just stay in and relax . Maybe watch a few movies .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Can I stop by ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sure . Any time .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: We've got a new manager in our department .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh ? You hoped to get that job , didn't you ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , I did .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm sorry . That's too bad . Who is it ? Who got the job , I mean ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Someone called Drexler . Carl Drexler . He's been with the company onlytwo years . I've been here longer . And I know more about the job , too

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hmm . Why do you think they gave it to him and not to you ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Because I'm the wrong sex , of course !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You mean you didn't get the job because you're a woman ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , that was probably it ! It isn't fair .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What sort of clothes does he wear ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: A dark suit . White shirt . A tie . Why ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Perhaps that had something to do with it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You mean you think I didn't get the job because I come to work in jeansand a sweater ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It's possible , isn't it ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Do you really think I should wear different clothes ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well . . . perhaps you should think about it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Why should I wear a skirt ? Or a dress ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm not saying you should . I'm saying you should think about it . That's all !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Why should I do that ? I'm good at my job ! That's the only important thing !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hmm . Perhaps it should be the only important thing . But it isn't . Not in this company .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Welcome back ! How was your vacation ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It was fantastic , but I'm glad to be back ! Being a tourist is really tiring !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Where did you end up going ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Because it's off-season , we got a really good package deal to Paris , so we went there .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I've always wanted to go to Paris . The Eiffel Tower is one of the most famous tourist attractions in the world ! Did you go to the top ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That was the first thing we did . I have a few pictures . Do you want to see them ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Sure . What's this one a picture of ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , that's a picture of me on our fourth day of travelling . I'm standing next to a famous foundation in the centre of the city .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You don't look very happy in that picture .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No , by that time , I was sick of sightseeing . I had had enough of art galleries , cathedrals , fountains , statues , and palaces !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: So what did you do ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: We spent that afternoon walking around a flea market . We had a few coffees , watched a movie , and went for a swim in the pool at the hotel .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: My travel agent always reminds me to plan a day of relaxing for every 3 days of sightseeing . Did you go to the Louvre ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Of course ! You can't go to Paris without going to their famous art gallery ! I was surprised by how small the Mona Lisa was though .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That's what everyone says ! I can't wait to see it for myself some day .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Your search on this project has been excellent .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you . I couldn ' t have done it without the help of a strong team .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: The final report is exceptionally thorough and well done . I think that you have been come up with some interesting recommendations for the client .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , I hope the client feels the same way !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I am sure they will be pleased .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I want to say ...

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Say it ! What is it ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That I can't go on any longer without you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You know you shouldn't say that at a time like this .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Nancy , I made up my mind you were the only woman for me at the first sight .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Too sudden ! I'm not ready for it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Forgive me for startling you with the impetuosity of my sentiments .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Stop it . No more of that talk .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I really love you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No , I shall faint .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: And I hope so . This is what you were meant for . Say you love me , say yes , say yes .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I don ' t know what I ' m going to do ! It ' s going to be impossible to make ends meet if I lose my job !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Don ' t worry . I don't think you ' re going to lose your job over one mistake .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It was a rather big mistake . When you work as an investment adviser , one small mistake can cost the company millions .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: But it wasn ' t just you who was involved , right ? You were only doing what your supervisor told you to do .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That ' s true , but my supervisor is very dishonest . There ' s no reason he needs to tell our boss the truth . I ' m sure he will tell our boss that it was all my fault , and there ' s nothing I can do about that . My boss won ' t believe me if I tell him the truth .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Let ' s think realistically about what might happen . How much money do you have in your savings ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I have enough to live off of for about 3 months . But I really don't want to spend my life savings on just living ! I ' d rather invest my money somehow .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , you can't have everything . Let's just figure out what you will do if you lose your job . When is your contract up on your apartment ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Next month . So I can either move out then or renew my contract for another year .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , that ' s good . If you lose your job , you can just move in with me until you find another job . That will save you plenty of money .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That ' s very generous of you . I guess that would work .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: If you lose your job , you just have to go for a few months without buying all the junk you usually buy . If you live frugally , you ' ll save plenty of money .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I guess working with so much money has made me rather greedy . Maybe losing my job would be a good thing !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Good morning , Mr . Huang . It's a pleasure to meet you again .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Pleased to see you . Welcome to our company . I hope you have a good day .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thank you . Can I meet my colleagues ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sure , come with me . Hello , Michael , this is Steven . He will be part of your team .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hi , Steven , welcome to join us !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I ' Ve been looking forward to meeting you . I am new to the working world and would appreciate your guidance .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That ' s right . Just call me if you need anything .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That's great .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , as the other guys are still not in , I ' ll introduce you to them later .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: All right .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You didn't show up to my performance last night ! Some kind of friend you are !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Give me a chance to explain . I was no my way and I had an accident .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Sure . You look like you're all black and blue .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I am fine . In fact , I don't have a scratch on me or my vehicle . But the other guy is in critical condition .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You're serious ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , I'm serious . I'm really sorry about missing your concert .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I guess I misjudged you . I hope you can forgive me .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Of course I forgive you . What are friends for ? Now , what am I going to do for that other guy ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Mary , today is a great day for you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: How nice of you to remember !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , here's a little token of my affection .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You're so thoughtful . Thank you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How was the party yesterday ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Did you enjoy it ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , don't talk to me about yesterday ! It was the most awful evening I've ever had .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Why ! what happened ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well . John had promised to be my date , but he stood me up . I waited for a full hour in the cold wind .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: So how long did you stay ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I left after the opening dance . I couldn't wait to get out of there .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: what ? How could you forget to reserve the concert tickets ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm sorry . I forget all about it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How could you ? I reminded you just this morning .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It's leap my mind . I really feel terrible about it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I have been looking forward to this performance all month .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm really sorry I let you down . I'll make it up to you somehow .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: May I take your order now ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , please . What's special today ? Any special recommendations ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Certainly . I would recommend ' Songshuguiyu ' .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: The name sounds fascinating . What is it exactly ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , it is sweet and sour fried Mandarin fish .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sorry , I'm not interested in vinegar .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Then , how about this one ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: OK . I'll have that .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Very good . Could I serve you anything else ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you . That's enough .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: My pleasure . Just a little while , your order will be ready very soon . Please enjoy your lunch .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thanks .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Did you see the information on sales for last year ? The sales review was made at our last board meeting . There's a great news for our shareholders .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yeah , I went over the figures this morning . We're finally started making money again !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: We've never sold this much before , our growth this year has been phenomenal . We have captured 8 % of the market , up from last year by 120 % . Our strategy is working !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: not only our annual sales brake a record , but our month by month earnings exceeded our forecast as well . After a two-year slump , we finally back in the black .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: The company's performance has improved since Wallace became president . He's made our little business into a real lucrative operation . Products are selling like hotcakes .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I think our success is partly because of Wallace's contribution , and partly because of our new marketing strategy . Because of the new advertising campaign , we have become the top sellers in the field .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Let's hope this stroke of good luck lasts . I hope we are over our financial difficulties for good .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Let's hope it is !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hi ! Ed , what's up ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Nothing .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Doesn't look like it to me .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Just get out of my face !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Woo , easy .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Leave me alone !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What are you so ticked off about ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I don't want to talk about it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Maybe I can help .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I blew the finally exam .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You've got to be joking .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No , I'm not .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , don't get bend on a ship about it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hello , Rachel . It's glad to see you here .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hi , Ross . Glad to see you , too .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm going to throw a party tomorrow night . Would you like to come ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: A party ? Yes . I'd love to . Thank you for inviting me . Will Monica come ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Of course .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That's great ! What time will it start at ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: At 6 o'clock .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: OK . I'll come . See you then .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: See you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Judy , your husband has a really nice car .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thanks . It's a lot better than mine , and it's new .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Where are you going ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: We're going to visit my sister in the city .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I didn't know your sister lives in the city , when did she move there ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: About a year ago . She lives in an apartment on 3rd street , across from the public library .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I see . It's almost 5:00 PM now , don't you think there will be a lot of traffic ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , we're not driving . We're going to take the subway . The subway only takes about 20 minutes .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , but it can be very crowded around this time . I always feel uncomfortable taking the subway .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I take the subway to work everyday , so I'm used to it now .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Doesn't your mother live in the city ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , she's lived there for about ten years .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I remember when she moved there . Apartments were a lot cheaper then .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I know what you mean . It's hard to find anything that's reasonable now .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Have a good time . Next time you're free , give me a call and we'll go play poker .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: See you later .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hi Bill , I saw your grandma yesterday .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh where was that ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I was running around the track at my college and there she was walking around the same track .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Grannie always tries to stay fit and healthy . She is always making us kids eat the proper foods .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , it pays off for her . How old is she anyway ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: She will be 86 next month .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That is truly amazing !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How are you doing ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm doing great .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What movies have you seen lately ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I saw Forrest Gump the other day .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What type of movie is that ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: The movie type is drama .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I can't believe you are watching movies . The weather is great . You should be outside .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I hate the hot weather . I'd rather stay indoors with the air conditioner .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What else do you like to do besides watching movies ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I like to play computer games , read books , go shopping , and play pool .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Out of those what is your favorite ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: My favorite is to play computer games .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What is your favorite computer game ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: My favorite is Diablo . It used to be Star Craft , but it is getting a little old .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: If you like to play so much , when do you ever exercise ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Although I hate to exercise , I go jogging at least twice a week .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That's pretty good . By the way , what are you doing next Saturday ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I am going to go to the bookstore .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I am having a party Saturday night at my house . If you have time , you should come .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That sounds like fun .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Great . I'll see you on Saturday .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Ok . See you later .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Tomorrow I'll take you to some places that I'm sure you will have interest in .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Where else haven't we been to yet ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: They are the Folk Antique Handicrafts and Collectibles Exhibition Halls .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sounds great ! How many kinds of folk collections do they have ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well . there're actually over 200 kinds of folk collections in this city . That's half the collections of antique objects in China . There's one exhibition half for multiple collection , and several individual display rooms for private collectors .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Private collectors ! They must have excellent collections . I'II go and see each of them . What kinds of collections can I see ? Come on , don't keep me in suspense !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: No hurry ! I'II tell you now , The collections include ancient cases and caskets , tea sets , abacuses , precious sea shells and conches , drama costumes , agates , ancient coins , fans , mini-musical instruments , root-carving , rare stones and rocks , model ships , model cars ...

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Enough ! I can't wait anymore .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You got a letter in the mail .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Give it to me .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What is it ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It ' s from NYU .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What does it say ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I didn ' t get accepted .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You can ' t be serious !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I ' m serious .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Are you all right ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: NYU was my first choice .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I ' m sorry that you didn ' t get in .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I ' ll just have to wait for UCLA .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Philip , I was really glad to hear about your award . Congratulations !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thanks , Denise . Actually , I was really surprised . I mean , there were a lot of qualified people out there .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Sure . But the work you did was really exceptional ! You definitely deserved it !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thanks a lot . I expect to see your name nominated pretty soon , too . You ' Ve been doing some great work !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Please help yourself to whatever you like , don't be shy .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , thank you . I ' Ve already been helping myself .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: This dish tastes terrific . Would you like to try a little ? It is a little hot , but very good .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I like hot food , especially Sichuan cuisine .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Would you like another beer ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'II have another cup of beer insist . I know I don't like to drink alone , especially there are someone sitting there next to me .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Come on , it's the weekend . Let's taste and enjoy this meal . Cheers !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Bottom's up , and you're right . This meal is incredible . I wish I had known this restaurant before . Thanks for bringing me here . I know I'll be back soon .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hi , Mike . We're having a party tonight , wanna come join us ? You can bring your girlfriend .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well . I am breaking up with Cathy .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What happened ? Did you have a fight ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No . She is really a very nice girl ...

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yeah , she is . She is pretty , caring , getting easy-going and she is a great cook . She is a gem .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , you are right . But sometimes she is too caring . Well , no ... she ' s just possessive and I kind of want a break ... you know ... for some room for myself .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh ? ! Did you talk with her about it ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I've tried , but it didn't work .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: So , when are you going to tell her ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Maybe tonight . I don't know . I don't know how to tell her .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I know she ' s head over heels in love with you . She will be badly hurt !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I know ...

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Mike , did you win the lottery or something ? Why the big smile ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm so relieved . I just passed the bar exam .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You did ? That's great ! You must be very happy now ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That's an understatement . I'm on cloud nine . I couldn't be any happier .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Did you tell your parents yet ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Not yet . I didn't get a hold of them . I'll try to call them again tonight .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: They're probably going to be so happy .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I think so . It's turning out to be a great day .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: ORG ! It must be so late where you are . What time is it ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: just after 2 am .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: what's wrong ? Can't sleep ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: nope , actually I was waiting for you . I have something big to tell you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: really ? What is it ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I have an offer to work for a company in your city today ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I can't believe it ! Is it real ? You're moving here ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I haven't accepted the position yet and with the upcoming holiday I think it's the perfect chance to visit the city and take a good look at the company before deciding . If you have time I think we c

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: just give me the dates and I'll make sure I'm free . You know after all these chatting online , it will be great to meet you in real life . I look forward to seeing you soon !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: me too . But I think I am going to bed now . my head is getting heavy . Have a nice day there !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: thanks . This is so exciting . Sleep tight and sweet dreams !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: talk to you later .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: The music has started .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: How do you like this waltz ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It's very nice .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: May I ask you for a dance ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Certainly .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You are doing the waltz wonderfully well .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thanks . I'm glad you say so . Oh , the music has stopped .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How nice it is here

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You can say that again . The sunny shining and there ' s pleasant raise . it ' s so lovely

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I ' Ve heard the whether here is ideal , just like spring most of the year

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That ' s correct . we have four seasons of spring

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Where is Pamela ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Is she coming ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: She told me she'd be here .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: They are announcing your flight . You'd better board the plane .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Are you rushing me ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I am just reminding you about the time . You don't want to miss the plane , do you ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I know what I am doing . Don't worry . Can you do me a favor ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Name it and I'll do it for you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Take care of Pamela when I am away . She is a nice girl . I don't want her to get hurt or anything .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I've got it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thank you . Now I see that you are my true friend . Most of my so-called friends left me at the moment my company went bankrupt . You are the only one who has stood by me the whole time .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I am just doing what I think I should do .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thank you for being a friend of mine .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: This isn't like you ... Well , I hope you will have a nice flight and a successful start in business

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thank you . I have to leave now . If you see Pamela , tell her I'll write to her .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Dora , are you interested in going to the museum with me tomorrow ? I read the newspaper this morning . I know there is an art exhibition in Taipei Modern Art Museum .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sure . I am free tomorrow . It sounds interesting to me . Can we buy the ticket online ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I don't think so . I think we had better go there earlier , or we may have to spend a lot of time waiting .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I guess that is the thing we can do with we really want to visit the museum .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Look at the ticket booth in the center . There seems to be not as many people as we thought it would be .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yeah . We are lucky . Let's go buy the tickets first . We can have breakfast later . I am so hungry .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Good idea .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: ( After the breakfast ) Which floor is the art exhibition we are going to ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I have no idea . Let me take a closer look at my museum map

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sure , take your time . We have a whole day .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It's on the 2nd floor . We are going to see some beautiful paintings about the history of ancient Greece .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Look at the museum guide . It says there are also some sculptures and potteries in this area . Let's rent an audio guide .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What fools we were !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: To think of it ! All my old silver ! It meant so much to me .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: And my new car . To think that he simply drove off with everything in my car . That's what hurts me most .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What's so terrible too , is the fools we've made of ourselves .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I hardly dare call the police . They'll just laugh at us .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'll never get over it . Oh , Harry , it was all so unnecessary . That man ! ! How could he do this to us after we'd put him up ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: And his story didn't even hold together . I feel such an idiot .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh ! You're engaged ! What a beautiful engagement ring ! Who to ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Of course Mike . Who else ? We fell in love at first sight .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: When's the wedding going to be ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: We haven't decided yet . There are a lot of things to sort out , you know .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Are you having a big wedding ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , I've always dream of having a big wedding .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: But what do you say about that ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I don't really enjoy big occasions , but I think I ' ll come round to the idea in the end , It only happens once in a lifetime .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Perhaps I'll agree with Mike . I couldn't stand a big wedding with many relatives and friends of my parents or my wife whom I'd never met before .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hello . May I speak to Mary , please ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Speaking . Who's calling , please ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hi , Mary . This is Tom .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , hi , Tom . How've you been ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Just fine . I say . Aren't you busy tomorrow evening ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Let me see . Uh-huh ... no , I guess I'll be free .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , uh ... why not dine out together and go to the movies ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sounds like a good idea .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Okay . I'll pick you up at 6:00 .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you for inviting me . See you then . Bye , Tom .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Good morning , Mr . Jones !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Good morning , Miss Bell !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Nice to see you again .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Nice to see you too . It's been a long time .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How is everything ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Just fine , and you ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Quite well , thank you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Did you drive yourself to the airport ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: No , I was driven by my husband .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Did someone meet you at the airport here ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , thanks .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Is this where we'll be holding the meeting ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: No , the meeting will be held on the fourth floor .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hello , Tom . How do you find the dinner of yesterday ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Very good . That may be the most delicious food I have ever eaten .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It's nice of you to say so .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I really appreciate you for having invited me .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Don't mention it . You know , we ' re old friends .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Anyway , I owe you one . Are you free tonight ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes . Why ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I want to invite you to enjoy the food I cook .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That ' s great . I'd love to .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What a wonderful game !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , the weather is wonderful , the game is wonderful and the players are wonderful .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I think John is the best player on the field .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: He certainly is . He is the Peckham in our collage .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Maybe he shouldn ' t come to collage , he should become a football star .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: isn't it wonderful walking here ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: what do you mean ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I mean look at all these magnificent tall buildings around us .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: yes , look over there . That's the Empire State Building . My book says it's 102 stories tall .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: it's quite famous but don't you think it looks a bit old-fashioned ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: you're right , but when it was built in 1930 it was a marvel of technology and engineering .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: what other important buildings are we going to see on Fifth Avenue ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: quite a number . Actually every skyscraper has a history . A few blocks ahead we'll see St . Patrick ' s Cathedral and just across the street will be the world-renowed Rockefeller Center . It's a landmark

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: what's there after that ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: well then , there's a Central Park . Facing the park on Fifth Avenue is probably some of the most expensive properties in the world .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: what are all they for ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: most of them are office buildings , huge department stores , and hotels but some are just private homes . New York is one of the financial centers of the words so there are lots of very expensive places .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hi , dear , I've got your voice at last .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hi , darling , I am thinking it is the time of your calling .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Are you OK today ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Quite good except thinking of you so much .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: So do I . You are a beautiful flower in my mind .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It's called love is blind , I think .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hurry up , get in .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I ' m in , let ' s go !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: OK , make a left here . . . no wait , I meant make a right . Come on , speed up !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Geez ! What ' s the rush ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Don ' t worry about it , just drive . Oh , no , the light is about to change . . . step on it !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Are you nuts ! I ' m not going to run a red light !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Whatever . Just turn right here . . . The freeway will be packed at this hour . . . let ' s take a side street . Go on ! Get out of our way ! Move , move !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What ' s your problem ! Geez . Having a fit is not going to help !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Here , I know a short cut ... just go down here , and we ' ll cut though Ashburn Heights . Let ' s go , let ' s go ! Watch out for that lady !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I ' m going as fast as I can !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes ! We made it . 5 fifty-eight , just before the library closes .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You ' re such a geek !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I wish I knew who had moved our flower pots .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It was me . I am so sorry .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What did you think you were doing ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I had to move it , so that I can get my bike through .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How dare you be so inconsiderate ? That's wrong .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I am awfully sorry . I didn't think you would mind so much .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Never do that again .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I promise .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: We ' re going to the Dragon Boat Festival tomorrow . Feel like coming along ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sure . I ' Ve never seen a dragon boat race .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Really ? I think you ' ll love it .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: As long as I don ' t have to row .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: So Alex , you ' re off to the Olympic stadium then ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , I should get there just in time for the women ' s 400m relay .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Wow , that should be really exciting , especially with so many famous athletes there .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , I ' m also going to watch the triple jump and the high jump .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well have a good time . Get me some autographs if you can .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Ok , I ' ll try my best .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Excuse me ? Is this where I register ? I ' d like to sign up for my courses for next semester .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , of course . I need your student ID please .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Here you are .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Okay , Susan . It says here that you are a business major and you are in your second year . Is this information correct ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes . I do want to take some additional credits this year to get a minor in psychology .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sure . That ' s not a problem . Do you have the list of courses you want to taketh semester ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yeah . Here ' s my list . I ' m not sure if the class schedule will allow me to take all of them though .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yeah , that ' s perfect . What about the subjects for your minor ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh yeah ! Almost forgot ! I need to take fundamental linguistics , consumer psychology and neuroanatomy .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Wow , you are going to be busy this semester ! Okay , here you go . You are registered now . you ' ll have to make your first tuition payment before classes start .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hi , John ! How was your vacation ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: We went to Malaysia and Thailand .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That must have been wonderful . Do anything interesting ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well . We went bungee jumping when we were in Malaysia .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Wow , isn't that dangerous ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: A little , but the rush was worth it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Tell me about it .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: We jumped off a bridge and fell 500 feet before the bungee cord caught us .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: 500 feet ! I would never be able to do that .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yeah , It was scary but exhilarating .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Another glass of beer , will you ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thanks , I'm enough .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: At least one for your trip .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'll have it if you insist .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Happy birthday , Aims !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you , Lisa .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Here is a present for you . I hope you like it .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , great ! I love it ! You know I've been expecting this for a long time .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm very glad to hear that .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Come here ; let me introduce some friends to you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Dad , why are you taping the windows ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Honey , a typhoon is coming .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Really ? Wow , I don't have to go to school tomorrow .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Jenny , come and help , we need to prepare more food .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: OK . Dad ! I'm coming .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: you're rather energetic today . What's going on ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: nothing really . I think I've had a few too many coffees .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: free coffee is one of the perks at this place , isn't it ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: it's the only perk of this job ! How's your day going ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: not that well . I've got that Monday morning feeling today .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: why is that ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: my boss has been breathing down my neck all day . I can't wait for the weekend !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: your boss is a real salve-driver , isn't he ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: you can say that again ! He won't even let us check our personal email at work !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: that's not just your boss . No one is allowed to send personal emails from the office .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: really ? I didn't know that it was against company policy .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: maybe your boss isn't so horrible after all !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: no , he is . Some bosses will bend the rules a bit sometimes , but not my boss . He always follows the rules to a T .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: try not to let it bother you too much .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: thanks . I better get back to my work before my boss yells at me again !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: ok , I'll see you in a bit .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: alright . See you later !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How delicious ! Tender and crisp !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: This is the specialty of our restaurant , sir .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , it's really savory .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you for appreciating it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thank you for organizing this great baby shower for me ! I ' Ve always been to baby showers but never actually had one held for me ! Let ' s get started !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Ok , let ' s start opening some presents !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh look ! What a great little bib for the baby ! This will definitely come in handy ! Oh wow , you also got me a stroller ! That ' s so great ! Thank you !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: This next one is from Betty .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: A highchair and car seat ! Wow Betty , thank you so much ! I really appreciate it !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: One more from Carla .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: A playpen and crib ! Thanks Carla ! This is just what I needed !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: OK , that ' s all of them . No more gifts . Now who wants to guess when the baby is due ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Umm . I think my water just broke ! Get me to a hospital !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Mom , Happy mother's Day ! Here's my card .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What a surprise ! Thanks . It ' s beautiful .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thank you for your love and care over the years , I appreciate it , mom .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: This is the best card I ever received .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Mom , what can I do for you today ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Nothing , son . I'm already very happy .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How about dinner tonight ? My treat .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Actually . I prefer we eat at home . We ' ll have more time to catch up that way .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm sorry I haven't dropped in that much these past few years . Business kept me too busy , I apologize .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , don't mention it . I'm proud of you !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thank you , mom . I love you so much !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How do you like this waltz ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It's very nice , I like it very much .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , then , may I invite you for the first dance ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: My pleasure . But I'm afraid I'm not much of a dancer , and I suppose you dance often .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Me ? Oh , no . In fact , I took up dancing quite recently .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , really ? But you're doing the waltz wonderfully well .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm glad you say so , you dance beautifully too . It's lucky that I got a partner .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you for your compliments . It ' s just that you are a good leader . Do you like the fox-trot and tango ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes . And what dances do you do best ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Disco is my favorite . I like it better than any other dances because it can release one's pent-up feelings , and is a healthy exercise . But I don't do the rock and roll and the break dance .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , well , the music has stopped . Thank you for the dance .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: My pleasure . Let's go and have a drink .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Fine .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What's taking you so long ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Don't worry . I'm almost finished .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I need you to hurry up .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: All right . I'm finished .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I think there's more you need to do .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What do you mean by that ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: My hair looks awful .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What don't you like about it ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I just don't like my hair .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm sorry that you don't like it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I won't be paying you for this .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm sure we can work something out .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Excuse me , is this the Guyon Travel Agency ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , sir . What can I do for you ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I want to travel to the ancient town in the south of China . Would you please tell me something about it ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sure . There's network of canals . And there are white walls , black tiles , small bridges , flowing rivers , flagstones roads , blue sky and white clouds . Few places have preserved the past like this place . Walking on the ancient road makes us back to our sense .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Wonderful . That's just what I expect , where is my first place if I go there ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Zhouzhuang .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How long does the tour take ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It's about two days .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: what's the cost ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It's about 300 yuan .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I know . Thank you very much .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That's all right . May you have a good trip !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thank you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: My pleasure .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hello , Mr . Black , I'm calling to say goodbye .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You're leaving so soon ? I wish you stayed a little longer .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I wish I could stay a little longer , but a lot of things to do back home .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Have you got the ticket ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , I did .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What time are you going ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: At 11:00 o'clock .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'll pick you up by nine o'clock and take you straight to the airport .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: No , I'll go by myself , thanks .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: OK , goodbye .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm so excited ! We have two weeks off ! What are you going to do ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm not sure . I guess I'll just stay at home . Maybe I'll catch up on my reading . What about you ? Any plans ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , my parents have rented a condominium in Florida . I'm going to take long walks along the beach every day and do lots of swimming .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sounds great !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Say , why don't you come with us ? We have plenty of room .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Do you mean it ? I'd love to !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: This is my favourite restaurant .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It looks very nice and the food looks delicious .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , there might be some food you have never eaten before .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Really ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh yes . Like this , for example . Have you ever eaten jellyfish before ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No , I haven ' t . I have never eaten jellyfish before .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What about these ? Have you ever tried pig ' s brains ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No , I have not and I ' m not sure I want to try them now .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hey , Taxi . Over here !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Did you call for a car service

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , are you engaged

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Not at the moment . Where would you like me to take you

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I am going to the airport , and I have to catch the 930 flight to New York .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , it's a long way and there is roadwork near Broadway . I am not sure I can snake it in half an hour .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: But I can't miss the flight . It's an important meeting and it ' s waiting for me .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: All right , I will try my best . If there aren ' t any holdups , I think we can get there in time .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That's great . How much is it to the airport

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: About $ 25 , tips not included .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Fine . Will you please help me with the luggage

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , yes , sure . Let me put it in the boot .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thanks very much .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Not at all . Bang the door , please .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Ok , let's hurry .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You are in luck . The traffic is not heavy today .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What do you like to do in your spare time ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I like taking photos .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Really ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , look at the photos I took .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: They are beautiful . You did a good job .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you for saying so .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: As a matter of fact , you are really a terrific photographer .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You don ' t look like enjoying this workout .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I ' m not crazy about it at all .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You don ' t like this sort of exercise ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I ' m not interested in it . Are you keen on it ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , that ' s funny . I thought you liked it .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I hate it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Never mind . It ' ll be over in 10 minutes .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It ' s the worst thing I ' Ve ever tried .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I wonder what he looks like . Oh , I can't wait to see him ! His email said he'd be wearing a white hat . ( looking around for him ) oh , there he is .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: hey , Isabelle ...

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Logan ! Why on earth are you hiding here ? White hat ! Come on ! Don't tell me you're the guy ! It can't be true .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: yes , I am the guy .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: what a bummer ! You set me up ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: let me explain . I didn't mean to hurt you ...

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: how dare you !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: hang on a second . Hear me out , just this once , Isabella !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: why did you lie to me in the email ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I didn't lie . You just didn't ask me my real name .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I should have known it was you . No wonder all the 20 questions were answered correctly . I thought I might have found the one for me .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm sorry . It was cruel of me . But I promise it will never happen again ? Look , there's a nice restaurant . Let me take you to dinner and we can talk things over .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I really should be on my way .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , not yet . At least have one for the road .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: No , thanks all the same .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , I am sorry you have to leave so early .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thank you very much . I really had a good time .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , thank you for coming .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: So see you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Bye .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I think I may rent out this apartment that I found .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , really ? Where ' d you find it ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I was looking through the ads today , and I found it in there .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: In the ads ? Are you serious ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yeah , and it ' s affordable too .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I ' d like to hear about this apartment .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: First of all , it ' s absolutely gorgeous .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What is the rent each month ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It ' s only $ 725 a month .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That ' s amazing . The rent is very cheap .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I know it is .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It ' s a good thing that you read that ad today .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Ten sheets of rice paper , 25 brushes , two boxes of oil color and two boxes of water color . All these come up to $ 35 . 50 , sir .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Ok , here is $ 50 . Oh , can you make out an invoice for me ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Sure , just a minute . Are you an artist , sir ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No , I am a teacher . I teach art .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That must be a very interesting job .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It is . You must be new here . I do my shopping here regularly , once a week .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Do you ? Nice to meet you ! And here is the invoice and your change .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you . Nice to meet you , too .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Nice to see you , Patrick .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Bob ! I hear your team won the match .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yeah . All of us tried our best .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Congratulations !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thanks .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm going to try sky diving this weekend .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I wouldn't do it if I were you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It's sounds like fun .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It's very dangerous , you know .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I want to try something exciting .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It's an easy way to get hurt , let me tell you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'll tell you all about it next Monday .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , take care of yourself , and don't say I didn't warn you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hey . I'm a visitor from China . I love your music . It's the best I've ever heard . Will you please spare a little bit of time for me ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sure . Thank you for saying that . Actually , those songs were sung for the first time today . I wrote them in the past two months .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , you wrote them all by yourself . That's amazing ! Are you a regular singer here ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You can say that . But my band and I also sing regularly in several other places , too .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Cool . Your guitar skills are very impressive . How did you learn to play like that ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I picked up guitar at an early age , maybe around 8 years old . Afterward , I taught myself by listening to some records of top players .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Wow , that's unbelievable ! You play so well , but you've never been to a real teacher . You will definitely be famous in the near future .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I would like to watch the Oscars on Tv tonight . How about you ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , I'd love to . It ' s interesting to see who is considered the best in their field and which film are thought to be particularly good .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I like watching it for the fashion . I like to see what the ladies are wearing . Of course , the men nearly always just wear the traditional tuxedo .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sometimes the men wear flamboyant colours . Which films do you think will win awards this year ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm really not sure . Usually just one or two films look set to sweep the awards ceremony , but this year there are several contenders .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You ' re right . This year should be much more exciting than usual . What ' s you favourite award category ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You might think this strange , but I like the category for " best foreign language film " .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It ' s nice to see foreign language films making a little impact on Hollywood . I like the " best actor and actress " .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Steven , why are you so depressed ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm feeling very sad . I just read the newspaper .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What's the news ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: According to the newspaper , the town was razed by an earthquake and more than 10 thousand people died in the earthquake .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It's horrible .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yeah , we have to do something to help the people in the stricken area .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes . How about donating some money ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It's a good idea . But where can we donate money ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Just find the answer through Internet .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , let's do it now .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Mr . Bellow , have you anything in mind as to what to drink or may I make a few suggestions ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I have had enough gin fizz and bloody mary . But I have no idea about Chinese cocktails .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Would you prefer our cocktail -- Shanghai cocktail ? It's a mixture of real Chinese ingredients .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That ' s good .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: ( The waiter makes the cocktail for Mr . Bellow and hands into him . ) Here is your Shanghai cocktail , Mr . Bellow .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you . Oh , it tastes excellent .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You shouldn't have told her the truth . What can we do now ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm sorry , It's all my fault .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You are always like this . I've told you many times not to tell her .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sorry , I had no intention .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It's too late to say sorry now . Oh , what am I going to do ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I know I was an idiot , But if there is anything I can do to make up , Please do tell me .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How is your job search 1 going , Janet ?

utterances.speaker: B
