utterances.text: I found the ideal position . I ' m working for a plumbing company .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Are you serious ? You studied mathematics at college for four years , and now you have a job working with your hands !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Plumbing work requires mathematics knowledge , and creativity . I love this job .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I can see that . But I didn ' t know you had experience in that line of work .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I didn ' t , but I applied for an apprenticeship , and since I studied math , AND I have a good attitude 4 , my application was accepted .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Congratulations ! You do have the right attitude .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How are you doing , Christopher ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: To be honest , I'm really fed up with work at the moment . I need a break !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Are you doing anything this weekend ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I have to work on Saturday all day ! I really hate my job !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Are you available on Sunday ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , that's my only day off until Thursday .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Ok , well , my friends and I are planning on going to the beach on Sunday . We tend to leave around noon whenever we go anywhere , so you could still sleep in . Do you want to come with us ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That'd be fantastic ! Which beach are you going to ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It's a quiet beach just about an hour outside of the city .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What should I bring with me ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: We've got plenty of inflatables , but if you want to sit on a chair , you'll have to bring your own sunlounger .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I can just use my beach towel . I love lazing around in the sun .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Do you like surfing ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I've actually never tried . Do you have a surfboard ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: We've got a few . I can teach you how to surf on Sunday . It'll be fun !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I can't wait ! It sounds like we're going to have a great time . How much money should I bring ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You'll just need roughly $ 10 for food and gas money . My friend is driving , so we usually all chip in a few dollars for gas money .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Ok , where and when should I meet you ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: We'll pick you up at your place at noon . Be there or be square !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Say , Anna , what are you doing tonight ? Would you like to go out ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , sorry , I can't . I'm going to work late tonight . I have to finish this report .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , how about tomorrow night ? Are you doing anything then ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No , I'm not . What are you planning to do ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm going to see a musical . Would you like to come ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sure , I'd love to ! But let me pay for the tickets this time . It's my turn .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: All right ! Thanks !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: We have a holiday next week , don't we ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , on Monday .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What're you going to do ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm probably going to spend the day looking at cars .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: At cars ! You aren't thinking about buying a car , are you ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , I am . I'd like to be able to get around a little more .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: But it will be expensive to have a car in the city , won't it ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , I don't know . Of course , gasoline costs a lot these days .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: But what about parking ? You can't park on the street , can you ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: A lot of people do . I'll try it for a while anyway , but I certainly don't want to pay a lot of parking tickets .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: A funny thing happened to me the other day .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , yes ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I was just thinking about someone I went to school with , this boy I was quite friendly with in third grade . We used to hang out together - he lived next door - but then my parents moved and I changed schools and never saw him again .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Mmm .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , I was walking down Nan Jing Dong Lu ( Nan-Jing E . Rd . ) during my lunch break thinking about this boy-I have no idea why I was thinking about him .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Really ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes . And suddenly I heard someone call my name . I turned around and there was this man looking at me . I didn't recognize him at all , but he obviously knew who I was .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , yeah , that's embarrassing when that happens .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You got it . Well , he walked up to me and said my name again and then I realized it was the boy I had been thinking about , the one from third grade !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Would you honor us with a visit ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'd love to . Thanks .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: When will you be convenient ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Any time will suit me .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Are you doing anything tomorrow ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm free tomorrow .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'll pick you up at about nine o'clock , will it do ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: All right , see you then .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm so glad to meet you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: How is everything going on ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Fine .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You look prettier than before .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Really ? Thank you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hey Michelle . Good to see you . Are you at lunch ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh hi Jim . No I just got back . I thought you were on vacation now .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: No , I wish I was ! I just got back from Spain actually .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh wonderful ! Have you been there before or was it your first time ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: My first time . I've traveled around Europe a lot , but this was my first time to Spain . It was amazing , and the weather was just beautiful ! No rain , and just sun , sun , sun ...

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm so jealous of you . I've never been anywhere in Europe . I've always dreamed of traveling around and seeing the sights .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , I really recommend Spain . You really should go . Anyway , it's been great to catch up , but I must be going , this is my floor . Speak again soon I hope .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What sports do you like to play ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I like baseball and basketball .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How about football ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: In my country football is brand new , so I never learned the game when I was younger .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It's a very popular game in America .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yeah . I heard a lot about it . Is it really that fun ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: For me , it's one of those games that are fun to both watch and play .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Are you a football player ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: No , I just for fun with my friends . We play two hand touch or flag football . We're too old to play tackle football .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What is two hand touch and flag football ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Instead of tackling somebody , you just have to touch them with two hands , or if it is flag football , grab the flag that the ball carrier is wearing .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I see . It's safer then right ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Exactly . We play every Saturdays on the field by the tennis courts . If you want to learn and play a little , you're welcome to join us .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'll give it a try . Give me a call and let's go down together .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Ok . I'll call you Saturday morning .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Great .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hi , Daisy !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hi Simon . Nice to meet you again

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I hope you are Settling in at school !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I am ! I've made lots of friends and I really enjoy my courses .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Good ! Me too ! By the way . you didn't tell me what you are studying here .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Didn't I ? I'm doing business studies .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Really ? That's great . You hope to join a company after graduating ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Maybe . My parents moved to Canada the year when I was born . We are living in Toronto . Suppose I might get a job in Toronto when I graduate . It's too soon to say really .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What about your friend Zoe

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: She's from Australia . She lives in Sydney . Her father runs a hotel business there and she is doing a degree in accountancy .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Accountancy ? Really ? She must be very good at figures .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I guess so . What about you , Simon ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm studying law .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Great ! So I'll know who to call if I ever need a lawyer .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Sure , welcome anytime

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How have you been ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Fine , thank you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: And how ' s everyone in your family ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Very well , thank you . I ' m meeting my wife and daughter for lunch at 12:00 , would you care to join us ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I ' d love to but I ' m afraid I can ' t . I ' Ve already got a lunch engagement .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What did you do last night ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I just stayed at home and watched TV .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Did you watch the Barcelona versus Madrid game ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , it was a very evenly matched game .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What were the results of the game ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It ended in a tie .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What was the actual score ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It was three all .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Really ? I thought Barcelona was going to win . They are a much better team than Madrid .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: If Barcelona had played as they normally do , they should have won .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What happened ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Their goalkeepers got injured after the first goal , but he kept on playing anyway .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That explains it .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: How many more games are left this season ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That was the last game before the playoffs .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: When do the playoffs start ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: In a few weeks . Are you planning on watching them ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Of course ! I really love watching football games on TV .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Me , too ! Do you want to come over and watch the next game at my place ? I'm planning on having a few people over to watch it together .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sure , that would be great .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Ok , it's a date then !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Jack , I hear you got promoted . Is that true ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes . I think I'm lucky .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , Jack , you deserve it . You ' Ve been working so hard .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you for saying that .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: David , would you like something to eat ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No , I'm full .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Do you want something to drink ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , I'd like some coffee .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Sorry , I don't have any coffee .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That's OK . I'll have a glass of water .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: A small glass , or a big one ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Small please .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Here you are .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thanks .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You're welcome .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Whoa ! This is a massive flea market !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You're telling me ! There are thousands of people here .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: And hundreds of booths-all filled with different kinds of stuff .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: This is almost like a Taiwanese night market ! I can't believe it !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You can't buy much more , Wei ! You already have enough to fill two boxes to send back to Taiwan .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , yeah . OK . I'll just buy smallthings !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I really hate to say this , but don't go away mad , just go away .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I knew this would happen some day .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Then , why didn't you try to prevent it in the beginning ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well . It's not all my fault , Anna . You are responsible , too .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I don't want to argue anymore . Please get out of my life !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I think we can still talk .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: No way ! Please don't follow me around .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Talk it easy , Anna . You really don't hate me . do you ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , I do . Leave me alone !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I am totally fed up with my boss . He has crossed the line one too many times with his sexist comments . This time I am really going to report him for sexual harassment .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What happened ? Did your boss say something to offend you at work ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: He constantly lets inappropriate things slip out , referring to the women employees as girls or calling us sweetheart or darling . I doubt any of my male colleagues would stand for such treatment .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Don ' t you think you are overreacting a little ? Calling you by nicknames shouldn ' t be so bad ...

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You ' re missing the point . It ' s about respect . He treats us with such a patronizing attitude , as if we are not equal or not as serious as our male co-workers . It ' s his attitude that needs to be changed , not just his words .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That ' s what you get for working in a male-dominated field . I think you ' ll find that most male bosses in your industry are already conditioned to treat females in this way . You probably won ' t be able to change him .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hi , long time no see . How have you been ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , I've been fine , but I'm having some trouble with my son .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Tell me all about it .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , he's 14 and in the past few months , he's become quieter and a bit secretive . He locks himself in his room and I think he's running around with the wrong crowd .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , I see . What makes you think that ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , he's become friends with a couple of older boys who are in a band . And one night last weekend , he came home really late , way past his curfew .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Really ? What happened ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: He told me that his friend's car broke down and they had to walk home .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I see what you mean . I understand why you're concerned . Have you tried talking to your son about it ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I haven't yet . I just keep hoping it's just a phase he's going through .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You may be right , but it doesn't hurt to find out more about what's going on in his life .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You're right . I should talk to him . Sometimes , it's not easy being a parent . Thanks . It helps to get it off my chest . You're always so easy to talk to .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I don't know about that , but my door is always open . Stop by anytime .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thank you very much for everything you have done for me during my stay in China .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: And I must thank you again for your generous help .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: The help is mutual . I must thank you to see me off . My wife and I will be looking forward to seeing you . You will come to see us , won't you ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I promise I will take the first chance to call on you . Please send your wife with my best regards .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Have you seen that house ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , it looks interesting .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You're right . I love it very much .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It must be old .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: At least more than 100 years old .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Let's enter it !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I can't open the door .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It must be locked .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Let me ask the old woman in that reception office .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: She can't answer you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: She must be deaf .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It must be a haunted house . Are you frightened ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Frightened ? You must be joking .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What do you think of the new television channel ? Aren't the programs awful ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I quite agree with you . They are terrible . They are complete waste of time , but my wife disagrees with me .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Actually , what bothers me is the violence . There are far too many detective and police shows .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I couldn't agree with you more . There aren't enough educational programs , and even the news shows are not well done .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You are absolutely right . They are too brief . They don't tell you anything .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thank you for coming to see me off .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Not at all .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: If have time , I'll come again .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You're welcome at any time .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thank you for your hospitality . I hope I didn't cause you too much trouble during my stay .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You're most welcome .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm afraid I have to go now . The plane will take off soon .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Call us as soon as you get home .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Can we talk ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sure , honey , we ' re talking now , aren ' t we ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You know what I mean .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yeah . I know .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I want to know where this relationship is going . I ' m in love with you and I need to know ...

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You know , I think you ' re awesome .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I ' m awesome . Well , I guess that ' s my answer , isn ' t it .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Honey ...

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Look , if you don ' t love me , it ' s not a thing , alright , we ' Ve had our laughs , but I don ' t appreciate ... maybe it ' s just time we ...

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Baby , I love you so much .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You do ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I love you . And I think you ' re awesome .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , I love you too !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Come on . Put the gun down .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh baby , I ' m so sorry .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Good afternoon , sir , is there anything I can help you with today ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: umm ... yeah ! I ' m looking for a nice gift to give my girlfriend . Our fifth anniversary ' s next Friday .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , I would be happy to assist you in choosing the perfect gift for her . Is there anything particular that you have in mind ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No , not really ... I ' m completely at a loss .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , you can give her a set of pearl earrings , or this beautiful heart-shaped pendant . What is her favorite gemstone ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That purple one . I ' m sorry ... I ' Ve never bought jewellery for anyone and I ' m kind of nervous .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Don ' t worry , we specialize in providing our customers a relaxed , pressure-free shopping environment . That stone is an amethyst . We have a range of beautiful amethyst pieces . Take a look at this bracelet . It ' s 18K rose-gold , studded with amethyst and blue topaz . It ' s a great statement piece .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh ... wow . That ' s really pretty . Jess would love that . But ... I was thinking of something a little more delicate , perhaps a necklace ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: We have this beautiful platinum pendant , or you could also get her a locket . You could also get her a timepiece -- it ' s both glamorous yet functional . If you tell me a little more about your girlfriend , maybe I can help you find something for her .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Jess ? Well , she ' s very smart , and has a great sense of humor . She ' s very feminine ...

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Perhaps you could give her a ring ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well ... actually ... I was thinking about asking Jess to marry me ... I ' Ve just been so nervous .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well sir , I believe your fifth anniversary is a great time to propose !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Okay , I ' Ve decided . I ' m going to pop the question !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Fabulous ! We should look at engagement rings then ! Now that ' s a whole other section .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I have just had my new paper published .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You have done excellent work .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm going to Britain .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Really ? How did you get the chance ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I have been accepted by Oxford University on PhD .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: My warmest congratulations on your entering the Oxford University .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I really appreciate your kind words .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: how was your day ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: let ' s start with you . How was yours ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: it was really busy . I had to work straight through my lunch break .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: did you get to leave early then ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: my boss told me that I could either go home early or take a long lunch break another day , so I decided to wait and take a long lunch break another time .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: it was nice of your boss to give you an option . My boss would never do that .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: let ' s get back to you . How was your day ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: it was horrible ! It was just one thing after another .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: you look pretty upset . Are you ok ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I ' m fine . But I have bad news .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: what ' s that ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I got sacked today .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: you ' re kidding ! How did that happen ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: well , I was late to work today . It was the third time I was late this week .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: how late were you ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: only about 5 minutes .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: you got fired for being a few minutes late ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: my boss is really picky about that . He never arrives late , usually works over-time , and always gets his work done on time .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: oh well . You never really liked your boss anyway , did you ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Everybody , I'd like to propose a toast to Mary Johnson , Teacher of the Year . She worked hard all year . She really deserved the honor .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , we're all proud of her !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Here's to you , Mary !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Cheers !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I have tickets to The Phantom of the Opera on Friday night . Would you like to go ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thanks . I'd love to . What time is the show ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It's at 8: 00 .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That sounds great . So , do you want to have dinner at 6:00 ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Uh , I'd like to , but I have to work late .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , that's OK . Let's just meet at the theater before the show , around 7:30 .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That sounds fine .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Why don't you have dinner with me tonight ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'd love to .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Let's say about 6:00 ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That's OK with me .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Isn ' t he the best instructor ? I think he ' s so hot . Wow ! I really feel energized , don ' t you ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I swear , I ' m going to kill you for this .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What ' s wrong ? Didn ' t you think it was fun ? !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , yeah ! I had a blast ! I love sweating like a pig with a bunch of pot bellies who all smell bad . Sorry , I ' m just not into this health kick .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , no , get off it . It wasn ' t such a killer class . You just have to get into it . Like they say , no pain , no gain .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I am wiped out . Thank you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Look , next time get yourself some comfy shoes . You ' re gonna come back again with me , aren ' t you ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Never ! But thank you for inviting me .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Come on . You ' ll feel better after we hit the showers .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: When can we expect you and your daughter for dinner ? Next Saturday ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Next Saturday ? I ' m sorry . I ' Ve promised to go to a Chinese Opera with my daughter .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How about Sunday then ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , Sunday sounds fine . What time ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Does six thirty suit you ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It suits us fine . We ' ll see you then .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thanks , goodbye .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Do you want to go to the beach tonight ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sure , which beach are we going to ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I wanted to go to Malibu beach .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I like Santa Monica .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: The water there looks so dirty .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I just like the pier they have at Santa Monica .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I like the pier too , because it's beautiful at night .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Is Malibu beach nice ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It's a lot nicer , and I really like it better .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: So you want to go to Malibu ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: If that's okay with you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sure , let's go to Malibu .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Wow , American football is more exciting than I thought .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You ' re in America now , my British friend . We just call it football .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , right . So , I can ' t quite follow what ' s going on ... who ' s winning ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: The Giants are up by three points because of the field goal they kicked , but the Redskins have the ball and there pretty close to the end zone .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Wow ! What a hit !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yeah , he tackled him so hard his helmet came off .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Is he ok ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It looks like it , he ' s getting up .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I guess he hit him too hard ; the referee just called a penalty on the home team .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: The Giants ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yeah .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , here we go again .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What happened ? Why did everyone get so quiet ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: The Redskin ' s quarterback just threw a touchdown pass for seven points . We ' re losing again .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Many happy returns of the day , darling ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you very much .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: And here is your birthday present .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: A gold watch !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Do you like it ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I love it ! Darling , you ' re kind .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What are the pop groups that you like ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , there are so many good ones ! I loved the Spice Girls . They were so cool !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I agree ! I cried for a week when they broke up .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I was really sad too , but at least I can still listen to their Cds .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hey , Mary , can you cut that out ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Cut what out I ' m not doing anything .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: The tapping of your pen on your desk . It ' s driving me crazy .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Fine ! By the way would you mind not slurping your coffee every time you have a cup !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I don ' t slurp my coffee . And plus , how can you hear it when you ' re shouting into your phone all the time ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You ' Ve got to be kidding me ! You ' re complaining about me talking on the phone when you go out for a cigarette break ten times a day to shoot the breeze ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Look , we have a lot of accumulated anger from working in these conditions , and it ' s probably okay to let off steam once in a while . But , it ' s probably not a good idea to keep it up I ' m willing to forgive and forget and if you are .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Fine . Let's call a truce . I'll try to more considerate and to keep the noise down .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yeah , I ' ll try to do the same . So , I was wondering you wanna go out to dinner Friday night ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Is this Zhang Lin's home ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes . Oh , it's you , Linda . I haven't seen you for a long time . Well , come in and sit down . How about something to drink ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , please . I'm a little thirsty , actually .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Would you like tea or coffee ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Coffee , please .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Here you are .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Would you like to talk over a drink ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That sounds good . How are you doing , Linda ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Just fine . Are you busy now ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No . I'm just killing time .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Shall we visit our math teacher tomorrow ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes . I haven't been in his house for several weeks . When shall we start ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How about eight o'clock tomorrow morning ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: All right . See you tomorrow .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Mary , it was wrong of you to be so late . Mother ' s very worried .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I ' m so sorry I ' m late . But Henry ' s car broke down .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I don ' t really like Henry . I like my Rose .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I don ' t like your Rose . And I do love Henry . And I ' m going to marry him .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: But my Rose is great .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Your Rose is a fool .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Really , Mary , you ' re horrible .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Why don ' t you marry Rose , then ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Did you see the 2005 Grammy Awards on TV last night .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yeah . I was so happy , because my favorite singer , Ricky Martin won ' Best Latin Pop Performance ' .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: He seems to win awards everywhere .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: He is really great . He has sold millions of records worldwide . He is especially known for his rocking performance at the football World Cup song-the Cup of World .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I heard one observer even said ' It was a song sung in Spanish for international football , and he made it so popular that even the Americans loved it . '

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That's right . His voice ranges from the smooth sound of ballads to the highpowered rhythms of the Spanish Caribbean where he grew up . He has fan clubs across the world , from America to Russia , from England to Taiwan , from Norway to Australia .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: This is going to surprise you , but I'm happy . I think you're making the right move .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You do ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Look , maybe I shouldn't tell you this , but I'v going over to WebTracker , too .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No way ! That's great ! Then we'll still be together !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Actually , I'm already working for WebTracker . Vince never wanted to give me what I was worth , so I figured , what the heck .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No kidding ! I can't believe this . You devil !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It's kind of cool , isn't it ? I'm sort of like a secret agent .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Your garden is looking beautiful this summer . The flowers are really colorful .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you . I have roses , tulips , and daffodils . Do you like the rockery with the smaller flowers ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , I do . Those are violets , aren ' t they ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , they are . This afternoon , I ' m going to prune the hedge .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: The lower branches on that tree are hanging very low . Would you like me to cut them off for you ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you ! That would be very kind of you . I have a saw in the garden shed .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: When the lower branches are removed , you ' ll be able to sit under the tree .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Tomorrow , I ' ll cut the grass . Then the garden will lock perfect .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Just make sure children don ' t play in the flower beds and destroy the flowers .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: When can we expect you for dinner ? Can you come tonight ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Not tonight . I promised to go to a concert with my sister .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well ... How about Friday then ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That sounds fine .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Good . Shall we say seven o'clock ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'll be there . You're still a fabulous cook , aren't you ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That'll be for you to decide . I've got a new dish that I want to try out on you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm ready . I'll look forward to it all Friday !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm glad to have had the opportunity to meet you here .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I trust you ' re keeping well ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm doing great , thank you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: So we can get down to business .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Mmm . Nice and crunchy . And they leave a space uncovered for you to hold ...

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: They're so much fun to eat . You can suck all the coating off first ...

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Or just stuff the whole thing in your mouth at once !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: But that way you're not savoring it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Whatever . Give me another pack .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hey ! The movie hasn't even started and they're almost gone !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What a nice dress , Jean . You look marvelous !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You , too . Where did you get your new hat ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: From the Crown's . Oh , what lovely earrings you have ! Are they diamond ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes . It's a birthday present from my husband !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , you are lucky to have such a considerate husband . Mine hasn't brought me a single rose since we married .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: He'll come out with surprises . Just wait and see . Look at that woman , with the white chiffon !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: She's chic , isn't she ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes . I like the dress . It must be the latest fashion . Look , the hem has lowered , and the waist narrowed .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It makes me feel rather shabby . That woman has a good taste in dressing , I would say .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes . She dressed with an individual flair . I rather envy her .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Most women follow fashion like sheep . They don't know any better than imitate .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I quite agree with you . See the woman there ? I dare say she hasn't got any eyes . How could she match the mauve gown with the green handbag ? And all that jewelry !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: The gown is quite expensive , believe me .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: So what ? It only makes her look cheap and vulgar .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You know those upstarts . They're all show-offs ! I think I'd better have a diet ; otherwise I'd look like a ballon soon .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You're quite slim . In fact , if you were one of those starlets , the movie company would say you have a fabulous figure .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thanks . I'm flattered .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , my shoes pinch me . Let's find a seat and sit a while .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: did you get my email ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I certainly did . Do you want to come in and give me some feedback about your weekend ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: sure .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: how did the business trip go ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: well , to be honest , nothing is more stressful than going on a business trip with our boss .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I understand . The last time I went on a business trip with the boss , I didn't even have enough to eat !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I also think the company is pretty cheap with travel expenses . I spent half of the weekend on a train ! Surely they could have afforded to buy a few plane tickets !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: our company is quite conscious of the environmental problems that frequent flying causes .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I see . Well , then perhaps they could give me a few days off after a business trip . It was really tiring for me .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I can ask the boss about giving you the day off today .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: thank you . I can't imagine getting much done today . I'm just too exhausted !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: no problem . Did you bring any gifts back for your department ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: no , should I have ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What's the matter with you ? You look so upset and tired .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: My father failed in business .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , that's really tough .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Maybe it is the most difficult period of my family have experienced .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I can understand . By the way , is there anyway I can help ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No , not now . I have found a part-time job . So perhaps I can help my family to come over the difficulties .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , that's so great , bless you ! if you need me , I'll always be there .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hey , Maris , are you a part-timer ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Part-timer ? Is that a new buzzword ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , it ' s pretty popular among my classmates these days . So are you ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sure , I have a part-time job as a bartender .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Cool ! It must be amazing to work at a bar !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yeah , but I ' m not there for fun . I have to remain professional and if I get distracted , the manager would be pretty upset .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That ' s true . I ' m wondering did you learn anything from the job ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Of course . There ' s always much to learn . I got to know more about the real world .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You mean you got working experience , right ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Not just working experience . I would say the biggest lesson I learned is how to deal with people from all walks of life .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It must be very demanding .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sometimes it is . But after working for a few weeks , it ' s easy to figure out .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Really ? It sounds interesting .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Maybe you can come to the bar one day and I ' ll show you around .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Great . I ' m looking forward to it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Good morning , Mary !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Good morning , John !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I want to have a few friends over for a dinner party to celebrate my birthday . Would you be able to come the next weekend on Saturday ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'd be delighted to , John . Saturday did you say ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , if that's all right for you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm pretty sure I'll be all right . In fact , I'd be delighted to come over and celebrate your birthday with you . What time are you planning to start ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , good . If you could come around six thirty or seven o'clock , that would give us some time to chat a whit over a glass of wine before dinner .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That sounds fine . I'll be there around seven .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It's snowing outside .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , how could it be ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Let's go out and have a look .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: OK . Wait a minute .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Look at the snow , it's so beautiful .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes . It's really snowing .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I love winter , I love snow .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: But don't you think it's a little too cold ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: But I like cold more than hot .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You are so interesting .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Did you bring some lunch with you ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , I packed it myself .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Wow , that looks beautiful .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It's my health-conscious lunch , good for my health and beauty .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I might try it myself .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Do you want to go out for dinner tonight ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sure . Have you got anywhere in mind ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm starving , so maybe we could go somewhere with large portions .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That Italian restaurant in the city centre always has large portions . Do you want to go there ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm not really in the mood for Italian , actually . I was thinking of something a bit spicy .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: If you want spicy food , then I'd recommend going to a Thai , Indian or Chinese restaurant . How about that Chinese buffet on Cowley Road ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I really like that restaurant ; you get a lot for your money there . But , they've westernized their food , so it's not actually that spicy .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You're right . Most of their dishes have sweet sauces . We could try that Indian restaurant just down the road from us .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: The Taj ? They're a bit expensive , but they do serve large portions of very hot food .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: The Taj it is then .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Shall we bring our own bottle of wine to save some money ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: They'll still charge us a corkage fee .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That's right . It'll probably work out to be about the same then anyway .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Don't worry about money . I'll treat you tonight .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Are you sure ? We could go Dutch .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No , I'll pay . It's my turn anyway . You paid last time .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I won't argue with that ! Let's go !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Are you going to the party on Saturday ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I was thinking about it . Are you ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yeah , I heard it's going to be a lot of fun .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Really ? Well , what time does it start ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It starts at 8

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , who all is going to be there ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Everyone from school .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: How do you know it's going to be so fun ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: This party is going to have a DJ , food , and drinks .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Wow , that does sound like it's going to be fun .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: So am I going to see you at the party ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yeah , I will be there .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hey Lydia , what are you reading ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I ' m looking at my horoscope for this month ! My outlook is very positive . It says that I should take a vacation to someplace exotic , and that I will have a passionate summer fling !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What are you talking about ? Let me see that ... What are horoscopes ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It ' s a prediction of your month , based on your zodiac sign . You have a different sign for the month and date you were born in . I was born on April 15th , so I ' m an Aries . When were you born ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: January 5th .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Let ' s see . . . you ' re a Capricorn . It says that you will be feeling stress at work , but you could see new , exciting developments in your love life . Looks like we ' ll both have interesting summers !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That ' s bogus . I don't feel any stress at work , and my love life is practically nonexistent . This zodiac stuff is all a bunch of nonsense .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: No , it ' s not , your astrology sign can tell you a lot about your personality . See ? It says that an Aries is energetic and loves to socialize .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , you certainly match those criteria , but they ' re so broad they could apply to anyone . What does it say about me ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: A Capricorn is serious-minded and practical . She likes to do things in conventional ways . That sounds just like you !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You ' re all set now ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , thank you so much .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Really , it was nothing .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I really appreciated it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I was happy to help .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It was so kind of you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Don ' t mention it .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You ' re a real friend in need .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: David , what have you been up to lately ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I went on a trip with my family last week .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Really ? Where did you go ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: We went to Europe .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What cities did you go to ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: London , Paris and a few other cities .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Did you go to Berlin ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No , We didn't go there . I'd like to go there next time .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I think this summer is a good time to visit Berlin . It's a beautiful place and the people there are very nice .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That's what I've heard .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I went there last year . If you want , I can give you some information I have about the city .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thanks .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: The band is pretty good . How do you like the music ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It's very nice . I haven't heard live music in a while . This is fun .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , then , may I invite you for the next dance ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Of course . But I'm afraid I'm not much of a dancer ...

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Don't worry . I'm not much of a dancer myself .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You're dancing so well .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You dance beautifully too .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: When did you learn to dance ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: In college . But I don't dance very often . What's your favourite dance ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It's hard to say . It depends . But I love the waltz .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How about tango ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , I like it . It's such a beautiful dance , but I can't do it well . What about you ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Tango is my favorite . Anything but hip-hop or the foxtrot . ( the music has stopped )

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you for the dance .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: My pleasure . Let's go and have a drink .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: OK .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What do you think ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It looks great .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I would like to purchase it .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Will this be cash or charge ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Here , take my credit card .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Just sign here , please .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Sure . Here you go .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Here's your receipt . Have a nice day .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Now , you are to board the plane . We ' re sorry that we haven't done much to help you when you stayed in China .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I appreciate what you have done for me . Everything I have seen here has left a deep impression on me . I really don't know how to express my thanks to you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: We are ready to help you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Will you be kind to say " Thank you " to Mr . Zhang and other friends for me ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'd like to . I'm sure your visit will help to promote the friendship and understanding between both of us . Welcome to China again .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Of course , I will . Well , it's time for me to say goodbye . The plane will take off soon . Hope some day you will come to America for a visit .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thank you . I will if I have chance . Goodbye and happy landing !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Goodbye !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What a charming room ! It faces south , and there's such a lovely view of the city .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm glad you like it . The bell is on the bedside . Just ring if you want anything . The room attendant speaks a little English . So I don't think you'll have any trouble .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: No , I shouldn't think so . By the way , is there a socket for my razor ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I think so . Here it is . It ' s by the basin .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Is it a two-pin socket ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , it is .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Good , I ' Ve get a two-pin plug .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It seems that you are an optimistic man who doesn't dismay easily . That is what a good salesman needs . Good luck .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I guess we have covered all the stuff that we need to discuss and it's time to say goodbye .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , goodbye and keep in touch .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hi , Ann . I was wondering if you are free tomorrow night ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , George . I guess I am . Why do you ask ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I've just gotten a pair of pre-sale Star Wars movie tickets from a friend and was thinking of inviting you along for the opening premiere . Are you interested ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yeah , definitely ! Thanks for inviting me .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: My pleasure .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I really wanted to watch the Star Wars on the opening day , but the pre-sale tickets were sold out . How did you manage to get hold of them ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: A friend of mine works at the corporate headquarters of Pepsi , which is a major sponsor of the movie . He was able to get the tickets for free , and then he sold two more for me for 50 dollars a piece .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You paid 50 dollars for each ticket ? That's a huge premium over the regular price .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Not really . Considering the fact that other people were willing to pay as much as 200 dollars each on the black market . Besides , I knew you were really looking forward to watching Star Wars on the opening day .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Wow ! I am really honored you went through all this trouble just for my sake . I really appreciate that . So , what time are we going ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , let's see . The movie stars at 10 . We should be there at least 1 hour earlier , because there is a big line . I could pick you up at your house at 8 , if that's ok with you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: 8 pm , that's fine with me .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Okay .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: So I'll see you tomorrow then at 8 .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yeah , that's great . I'll see you tomorrow night .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Ok , George . Bye !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Bye , Ann !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'd like to meet you again sometime .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That would be great . Actually , can I get your phone number , Ella ? That's assuming you don't mind if I call you sometime .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Anytime . You can reach me at 5558929 .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Ok , got it . I will call you sometime next week .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Fine .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It's time to go . Bye , Ella . Hope to see you soon

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Bye , Jason .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I just got a telegram from Margaret and Greg .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Are they coming to Chicago again ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes . They ' re coming the beginning of August .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , good ! We can all get together again .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I ' m glad they ' re coming in August . Maybe Greg and I can play some golf or get tickets to a baseball game .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: And Margaret and I can take the dog and go jogging in the park .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Remember the garden party they gave when we were in England ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , yes . We all sat on the grass , and Margaret played the guitar and sang Greek songs .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I had a great time . It ' ll be good to see them again .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Listen , Karen , I need your help . I don't know anyone here yet .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm glad to help you . What's wrong ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: My mother-in-law just went into the hospital in L . A . Hank and I will be flying there tonight .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm sorry to hear it . What's wrong with her ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Doctors aren't sure yet . But the real problem is Suzy . She has a bad cold , and we don't want to take her with us . But we don't know who can stay with her .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You need a babysitter .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , I'd ask Jill , the girl I've had before , but I need someone overnight . Maybe even for two nights .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I could have Suzy stay at my place .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I don't want to do that to you , Karen .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Why not ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Your own kids would get Suzy's cold . I think it would be better to have a good babysitter here . But I don't know who to ask . I need someone more mature than Jill . It might even be for two or three days .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I know who we can ask . There is a girl I know , Sara Ralston . She is 17 , and she will usually take this kind of job . I know her from my church , and I trust her completely .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'd like to talk with her . This is short notice , I know . But Hank and I are leaving tonight .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'll get you her number . I hope she can do it . She is very responsible .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm glad you know someone . I knew you would be the best person to ask about this . I don't want to insult Jill or her mother . I think Jill maybe could do it . But I'd rather have someone a little older .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'll go home and get Sara's number . I'll call her first myself .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Great . Then call me and let me know if she's free .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hi , Sara , what are you reading ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hi , John , I am trying to find a carpenter .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Why ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , I want to build a deck in my back yard .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What for ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: So I can have a special place to hang out with friends , and also do some barbecuing on weekends .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That sounds cool . Do you mind if I recommend myself for the job ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You ? Do you have a carpenter's license ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , of course . But I only freelance on weekends with my uncle .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Wow ! That's cool . So , let me give you some details about the deck I want .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Please go ahead , I am listening .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'd like my deck to be at the same level as the back door .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Is your back door higher than the ground level ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , the back door is about four or five steps higher than the ground .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Okay , then you need a deck with a guardrail .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I don't like things to be fancy .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Don't worry . I will build your deck with a simple but classic look .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hmm , that's good . Can you use cedar or redwood to build it ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Cedar is a good choice .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , let's take the measurements right now .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh that ' s a lovely necklace .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you . My husband gave it to me .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh I didn ' t know you were married .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes I am . I got married five years ago .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh I see . That ' s nice . Did you meet your husband at work ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No , we met at university .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hey , Robert , what are you doing this weekend ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I didn't have any big plans .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: We are putting together a birthday party for Mary .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That sounds like fun . Where will it be ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: We thought it would be fun to have a pool party at Jay's house .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh good ! Can I bring anything ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: We will be providing hot dogs , hamburgers , and cake , but people can bring side dishes .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I am assuming that the dress is casual .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Dress casually and bring your bathing suit !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Wonderful . Just e-mail me the time and date and I'll be there .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Craig , what do you do for work ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm still a student .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What school do you go to ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Boston University .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That's a good school . What do you study ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm studying English , math , and history . My major is English .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How long have you been studying English ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: More than six years .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That's a long time .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yeah , I started to learn English when I was in high school .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: No wonder your English is so good .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Actually , it's not that good . I can read but I can't speak very well . I haven't had a lot of chance to practice .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I see . Talking with other people is very important .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , but I still don't have many friends here yet .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm having a party tonight at my apartment . You should come .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh thanks for inviting me . I'd love to come .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hey , that ' s a very nice hairdo you ' re wearing !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh you ' re exaggerating . I ' m never really good at making hairdo .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You did it yourself ? Wow , you are good !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thanks for saying so , but my husband thinks otherwise .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: He ' s just got no idea of how good you are .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Did you enjoy that new movie ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That movie's just a lot of noise , same as Simon .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , what happened , Carole ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I had to go by myself , he couldn't make it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What ? I met him just before I took off from Kitty's , he said he was coming .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Kitty's ? He sure gets around , doesn't he ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Looks like it . So how did he handle it to ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: His excuse was familiar . He said his car died again .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I think that's a bunch of nonsense . It seemed ok to me .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I know . Last week he gave me a lie about being too busy .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Doesn't sound promising .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , I think it's the time to pull the plug .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: If you want I'll let him know if I run into him .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thanks anyway , but I'll do it , Rebecca . Let's get to class .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What are you doing this weekend ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I am not sure . What are you doing ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I was thinking of maybe taking a drive to the beach .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That sounds like a great idea !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Would you be interested in joining me ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sure , I would love to go with you . When would you be leaving ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I thought that we could leave around 8

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That would give us plenty of time to explore . Did you know that there is a music festival on the beach in Santa Barbara ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That was part of my plan .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well then , I'll see you on Saturday . Thanks for asking me to go with you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How are you feeling , John ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , not too bad , but I've got to stay in bed .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Do more exercises after you are healthy .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Ok , I will . You have said that many times .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Are you hungry ? Do you want me to buy something for you to eat ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No , there ' s no need . Thank you all the same .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I want to try something different today .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What do you mean ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I want a different hair style .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What style do you want ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Can you make my hair short ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Exactly how short do you want it ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Make it a few inches long .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Are you sure you want me to cut it that short ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I've been thinking about this for a while now .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Okay . I'll do it if you're positive that this is what you want .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I honestly want my hair that short .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: All right , then let's begin .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I've something very unpleasant to talk with you . Upon the arrival of the first consignment , it was found that about 50 % of the sixty cases of pineapples were leaking .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It's rather an unusual case . Have you found the cause of leaking ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It ' s simply because the tins were damaged .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It appears to be the only case to us , that the goods have been damaged on the way .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I am sorry to say it's not on the way , but during loading . The tins inside the cases were broken evidently through rough handling .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Could you offer us a certificate issued by your Health Department ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Certainly . Here you are . Our health authorities said they were no longer suitable for human consumption . I have to remind you that our terms are CIF Hamburg . I hope you would indemnify us for the loss , so it wouldn't be so heavy on us .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Now we are prepared to settle the issue with you amicably .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I don't know what to do about the people who live in the flat above me !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Why ? What are they like ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: They're incredibly selfish . They ' re always up until the wee hours of the night playing their music so loudly that I have to wear earplugs in order to fall asleep !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Have you ever talked to them about it ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I tried to introduce myself to them when they moved in , but they were so arrogant that I didin't want to ever talk to them again !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What did they say ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: They both just talk about how great they are all the time .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: They soud like the neighbours from hell !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: They are ! Besides being loud and arrogant , they're also terrible gossips . They're always talking about everybody else in the apartment .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I thought you didn't talk to them much .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I don't , but they talk so loudly that I can hear what they're talking about from my bedroom - and it's not very nice .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What do the other people in your apartment think about them ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Most of my other neighbours are scared of them .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Maybe you should think about moving .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I can't afford to move right now .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , perhaps you should have a party and try to get to know them better . Maybe once you get to know them , they'll turn out to be more sensitive .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I think you're being a bit optimistic . If you met them , you'd understand .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , I don't know what else you could do then . Do you think bribing them with chocolate would work ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I don ' t think I can take another semester of this dorm food .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I know what you mean , it leaves a lot to be desired .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Sure , like taste , variety , nutritional value , what I should do is move into an apartment off campus where I can cook for myself .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Have you found anything yet ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You know how hard it is to find a decent place at this time of year ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You should be able to find something comfortable in town , though that would be kind of far from school .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I got a car , so the distance wouldn ' t really be a problem .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: But the parking might be .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You bet !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hoo , I'm getting tired , Jeanine , been a long day .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm not quitting yet . You know my favourite slogan , don't you ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yeah , I know . Shop till you drop .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Right !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm getting a little short on cash . Let's just window shop a little .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Ok .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hey , Jeanine , get a load of that . It's beautiful .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Ahahah , and I thought you were tired .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You know .. I have a weakness for long dresses .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It sure looks special , looks expensive too .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Sure does . Hey , can I sponge a little cash of you ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Don't worry , Mary , I've got you covered .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thanks , Jeanine , you are a real pal . Let's go in .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Lucy , come here ! I can see the lake which is in the center of park .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It is beautiful ! Look , there are so many birds around it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It is a great place for a relaxing vacation .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Listen to the sound of nature ! It's like music .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yeah , I agree . It makes you feel really good .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What are those ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Do you mean the red things ? They are roses .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm going to take more pictures today .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Me , too .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: This is tough to say , Jordan , but I think we should break up .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Are you serious ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , I mean it .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: But why ? Did I do anything wrong ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: No , we are just too different . This isn ' t working .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hey , come on . It ' s too early to say that . We can fix things .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I have thought about it for a while . I think it ' s time to move on for both of us .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: But I still love you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I ' m sorry .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I knew this would happen some day ...

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Then why didn ' t you talk to me ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well . It ' s not all my fault , Anna ...

utterances.speaker: A
