utterances.text: I don't want to argue with you anymore . This is going to be tough , but Let ' s try and be friends .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I would like that Anna , but I think I ' ll need a little space for a bit .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I think we ' ll be better off if we are apart .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Shall we keep pur friendship ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Sure , let ' s just be friends .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: how's it going ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm in a really good mood , actually . How about you ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: to be honest , I'm a bit fed up .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: what's wrong ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: well , my boyfriend was supposed to call me last night , but he never did .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: that's too bad . I'm sure there's a logical explanation for it . Don't be too upset about it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: the thing is , this isn't the first time he's promised to do something and then didn't .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I see how that can get a bit annoying .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: a bit ? I'm extremely annoyed that he didn't phone me when he promised me that he would ! He's such a liar .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: so what are you going to do about it ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I don't know . I've got mixed feelings about it . On the one hand , I really want to end it with him , but on the other hand , I don't want to be without him .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: what do you think would make you happier ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: in the long run , I think breaking up with him would make me much happier , but I know that I'll be depressed about it for a few weeks first .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: relationships can be confusing sometimes .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: what would you do if you were me ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'd call him and dump him now ! You deserve better than him !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hi , how are you doing ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm fine . How about yourself ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm pretty good . Thanks for asking .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No problem . So how have you been ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I've been great . What about you ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I've been good . I'm in school right now .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What school do you go to ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I go to PCC .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Do you like it there ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It's okay . It's a really big campus .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Good luck with school .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you very much .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It's wonderful to be in the mountains after a hustle bustle week .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Indeed . I love the smell of the grass and trees . They certainly refresh my mind .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Can we stop here for a while ? My backpack is very heavy .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sure . Did you hear anything ? Look ! An eagle is hovering in the sky .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Let me see . It's not an eagle . I think it's a vulture .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes . Will it hurt us ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I don't think so . Let's walk by the stream . I am sure we can find the waterfall on the map .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: OK . I have a good pair of hiking boots . It should not be a big problem .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I also brought a bottle of water and some provisions . If you are hungry , you can let me know .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You are kind . Look there is a big tree over there , it looks like a thousand-year-old tree .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , it is a birch tree . It is not as old as you think .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: How do you know ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Because its trunk is not thick enough to be like a thousand-year-old tree .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Here ' s a letter for you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Let me see it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Who ' s the letter from ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It ' s a letter from UCLA about my acceptance .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Read it !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: UCLA accepted me !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Really ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I ' m not joking . I got accepted !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I ' m so happy for you !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: UCLA was my second choice , but I ' m happy knowing I ' Ve been accepted .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I am really proud of you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You have no idea how proud I am of myself .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hi , it is a pleasant surprise !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yeah , it ' s been ages ! So how have you been ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Couldn ' t be better . And you ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Just as usual , you know .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What's the bonus like at your company ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , it's OK , I suppose . We get about the equivalent of six months ' salary .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Six months ' salary ? Are you serious ? That's incredible !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Maybe . But you'd be amazed at how little's left after the credit companies have deducted their share from my account .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hey , I know what that's like . I bought a BMW on my Visa card . Now the payments really hurt .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , you're lucky that you're still able to make your payments . I missed a credit payment last month . Now my bank account's overdrawn , and the company is threatening to take back my purchases .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What did you buy ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: A new home health monitor .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Health Monitor ? I read an article about that racket . They ' re overpriced to begin with ! Listen , if I were you , I'd let them take back their monitor and spend my money on something more practical .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You're kidding !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: No joke !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That's something else ! Maybe I'll return it to them .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hey Steve . When's the next time you're going to play golf ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm going out this Saturday .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Do you already have a foursome ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Unfortunately , we do . Let's plan for something together for Wednesday . We can go right after work .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That sounds good . Where do you want to play ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: We won't have much time , so let's play somewhere close to work .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How about Bellevue ? It's pretty close .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: How much does it cost over there ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Twilight rates are 21 dollars .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That's pretty good . Let's do it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Aright . I'll get a tee time for Wednesday at about 4

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Make it 4

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Ok . I'll call you later when I get a tee time .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sounds good . I'll see you on Wednesday then .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Aright . Have fun on Saturday .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Will do .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I like the Honda Accord you showed me before . I think it's more practical for my needs .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Alright , sir . You are making a good choice . Honda has made a lot of design improvements in the new Accord .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What does it come with standard ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: On all our new cars , the standards includeair conditioning , anti-lock brakes , air bags , and an AM / FM stereo with a CD player . But on the Accord , there is another standard item as well . The Accord com

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Cruise control ? I don't like that .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Why not , sir ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I think it's dangerous . What if I can't turn it off ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , sir , I know some of our customers are concerned about cruise control . But Honda has never had a single cruise control malfunction that led to an accident .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I wish it didn't have cruise control . My wife doesn't like it either .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You know , sir , you don't have to use it . You can turn it on or off . If you don't want to use it , you just never turn it on .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I suppose . And what about the sunroof ? Is that standard ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No , the sunroof is optional , sir .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I see . Another important question is the time I can get this car . I need a new car rather soon .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , I can say that the new models will be here in August . If you order one now , we will have it for you in August .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That's good enough , I think . What colors does the new Accord come in ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: We have this new model in red , white , black , or silver . These are the standard colors . Of course you could specially order from various other colors too .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: My brother has last year's Accord . And his car is a kind of soft purple color mixed with silver . I really like that color . I wonder if I can get that color on my Accord .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I know the color you mean . Is this it , sir ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , I think that's it . Can I get that on the Accord ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , you can . That color is very popular with Honda buyers . So we've kept it available .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , I think I want to order the new Accord then . It looks like an excellent car .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You have made a good choice , sir . I drive an Accord myself . They are very solidly built machines , very reliable .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , I know . I think Honda is the most reliable car on the road . I would never change to anything else . The Honda I have now almost never has service problems . It runs smooth as silk .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Alright , sir . I will get the paperwork ready for you . Just a moment .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Dalian is a beautiful city . Do you agree ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I suppose I do .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: The climate here is pleasant .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You said it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: This city is really comfortable to live in .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It sure is .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: No other city can match it . It's heaven .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , if you live in other cities as long as enough , you will love them just as much .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Maybe .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That's for sure .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Come and sit down . Would you like a drink ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , yes please ! I'd love a gin and tonic .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Do you like olives ? Or would you prefer crisps ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , just olives please . What music is this ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Do you like it ? It's Irish music .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It's great ! Where did you get the CD ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Arm - I think it was in the CD shop in the Mall . Have you been there ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes . I buy a lot of stuff from there . It's a good shop , isn't it ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes . Hey , I've got some photos of our holiday in Ireland . Would you like to see them ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Why not ? I'd love to !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hello everyone , and welcome to our CPR for beginners course . First of all , does anyone know what CPR stands for ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Cardiopulmonary resuscitation !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That ' s right ! We apply CPR in the case of cardiac arrest or pulmonary arrest .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What does that mean ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , basically if your heart stops pumping blood , or your lungs stop pumping air , then we need to get them going again ! That ' s when we have to apply this procedure . Let ' s begin ! I need a volunteer .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Me ! Me !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Alright , come here and lay flat on your back . Let ' s suppose this young woman has stopped breathing . We must lift the person ' s chin so that we clear a pathway for air to get into the lungs . Then we place our mouth over the other person ' s mouth and blow air two or three times , like this .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Wait , what are you doing ? I ' m a married woman ! You can ' t just try to kiss me like this !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Madam I ' m not trying to kiss you ! I am trying to demonstrate how to apply CPR in the case of an emergency .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , OK . But no French kissing !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: As I was saying , we blow air through the mouth in this manner . Once this is done , we must try to get the heart going again . To do this , we place our hands over the person ' s chest , and press down firmly two or three times .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Wait , what are you doing ! You can ' t just kiss me then go for second base !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Look ! This picture of Mom in her cap and gown .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Isn't it lovely ! That's when she got her Master's Degree from Miami University .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , we are very proud of her .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , that's a nice one of all of you together . Do you have the negative ? May I have a copy ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Surely , I'll have one made for you . You want a print ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No . I'd like a slide , I have a new projector .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'd like to see that myself .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Have a wallet size print made for me , too .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Certainly .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hi , Tony . Haven ' t seen you for a long time . How have you been ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: OK , I ' Ve been looking for a job for days , and I haven ' t found one yet . It's so hard finding work these days . Have you had any luck ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , I've got a job , a waiter's job in a restaurant .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Are you well paid ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , $ 10 per hour , but I can keep the tips . That comes to roughly $ 80 every evening

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Not bad .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Actually , there's still another opening . If you are interested , you ' ll surely get it .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That ' s great ! I ' ll go there right now and speak with the boss .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: There ' s no rush . You can see him tomorrow . I ' Ve told him about you . He promised to give you the job .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That was nice of you , Susan . Thanks a lot .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Think nothing of it , Tony . I ' m sure you ' d do the same for me .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Could you tell me a bit more about the work there ? I mean , those dos and don'ts . I am a green hand , you know .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: First of all , you must be punctual . You should be there before 6 p . m . so that you will have half an hour for preparation changing clothes and things like that . Then , remember you should smile . Smile to your customers all the time . Never pull a long face even If you feel awful that day . Anything else ? Oh , yes . Never argue with your boss . Learn to say ' Yes , sir . '

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Be a yes-man , you mean ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You may put it that way if you like . Don ' t worry . You ' ll have no problem .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I hope not .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Would you talk to me about taking one of Dr . Miller's classes ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes . Have you ever been in one of his classes ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm thinking about taking his class next semester .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: He was a very easy teacher . Are you thinking of taking a class with him ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm not sure because I really need to learn something , but I also worry about grades .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Grades are important , but don't you think that gaining the knowledge is important , too ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I really need to learn this stuff .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: He made everything so interesting that the time just flew by . Do you know what I mean ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , that sounds right for me .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Did you know that he came here last year after 10 years in the military ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yeah , I already knew that . That could be a good thing .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I think you know that you have to make the best decision for you . Enjoy your year !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm better now . Want to play again ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'll let you break the balls this time .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Let's get all the balls out of the pockets .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: OK . How much do you want to bet on this game ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You are crazy . Gambling is against my principles .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Julia , why have you prepared a candlelight dinner ? Anything special to celebrate ? Did you get a promotion ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Honey , don't tell me that you forgot our anniversary , did you ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , my dear , how can I forget such an important day ? I was just kidding . Look at this box .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What's in it ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Have a guess .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: A necklace ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: No .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I have no idea .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Open it now .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , my god . A diamond brooch . It's so beautiful . You're so kind to me , A . Thank you !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You're welcome , honey . I hope we will celebrate our golden wedding anniversary in future .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Beautiful day , isn't it ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , it's not like what the radio said at all .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I wish it would stay this way for the weekend .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: As long as it doesn't snow !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hey , Leo . How come you look so terrible ? What ' s going ' on ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You can say that again . Susan ' brother dropped in from out of town , so I offered to put him up for a few days . But he ' s driving me up a wall . This guy is bottomless pit .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How gross ! I can ' t handle people like that . Does he at least give you a hand around the house ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: He doesn ' t lift a finger ! I bend over backwards cleaning up all day and he sleeps in until noon .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Man , what a freeloader . You better do something quick or he ' ll never hit the road . After all , he ' s got it made in the shade here .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You think he might stay even longer ? !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Now , don ' t go losing your temper . If you tolerated all you can , just kick him out ... but do it with gloves . I know ! Tell him a white lie like you ' re getting the house fumigated !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That wouldn ' t be a lie !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Many congratulations on your winning the game .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That ' s very kind of you , but it ' s nothing special .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You were doing great out there !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , actually it ' s just about luck .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Do you have a bf ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , I had a bf before .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Why you say bf before ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: We parted from each other last month .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Have you got a new one ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Mmmm , no . How about you ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I am single , I have no real of , only an E-gf , that is you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Haha , so you are my E-bf .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I like you . Do you agree to be my of ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Mmmm . .. OK , let's try to be .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Wow ! Blablablabla . . .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hey ! What is it ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I am flying like a bird .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: LL

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I am so happy . I want to drink a cup of champagne .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I have no champagne right now . How about this ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It's OK , so I send you this .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Is it made of chocolate ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It's my heart ; it's made of what you like .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , I will have a sweet dream .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Are you sleepy ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: A little bit . I have to go to sleep though I don't want to .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , I do not want to see ur sleeping in the office .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thx . Bye for now . Kisssssssssss .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: C U here , honey .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: The band is pretty good . How do you like the music ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: it's very nice . I haven't heard live music in a while . This is fun .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: well , then , may I invite you for the next dance ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: of course . But I'm afraid I'm not much of a dancer ...

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: don't worry . I'm not much of a dancer myself .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: you're dancing so well .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: you dance beautifully too .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: when did you learn to dance ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: in college . But I don't dance very often . What's your favourite dance ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: it's hard to say . It depends . But I love the waltz .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: how about tango ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: oh , I like it . It's such a beautiful dance , but I can't do it well . What about you ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Tango is my favorite . Anything but hip-hop or the foxtrot .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: thank you for the dance .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: my pleasure . Let's go and have a drink .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: ok .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Why don ' t we go the cinema tonight ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That sounds good but I don ' t know what ' s on .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I think there ' s a very romantic new film starring Hugh Grant . Let ' s go and see that .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Ok , that ' s a good idea . Where shall we meet ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well how about meeting at my place ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That sounds good . I ' ll call you once I arrive .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What's the time now ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sorry , I don't know , there's something wrong with my watch .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You've simply forgotten to wind it up , have you ? When do you usually wind it up ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: In the coming , before going to work .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You got up so late today . You have , I think . Turn on the TV and set your watch by it .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: OK . I'll turn it on .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: All right . It's just four o'clock .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , I'm setting my watch at four . Thank you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You are welcome .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I think it's high time we had lunch .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Of course . I can eat a horse now .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I am sorry for that . I was so attracted by the beautiful scenery .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Where shall we go now ? A Chinese restaurant or a local one ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I suppose the local one .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Are you free this Saturday evening ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , it seems there is nothing that evening .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Would you like to go to the concert with me ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'd like to , where ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: At our club .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: When ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: At 7:30 p . m .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'll go in time , thank you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm so pleased that you can go .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Did you call me ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you for returning my call .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What was your call about ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I wanted to have a talk with you about your son .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What did he do ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: He was messing around last week in class .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Exactly what did he do ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Even though I asked him not to , he kept speaking out in class .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I don't know what his problem is .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I need you to talk to him , if you don't mind .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That won't happen again , I'm sorry .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you . Hopefully I won't have to call about him again .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: He followed me all the way home !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That's about five blocks . And around corners too . So he was definitely following you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , he was . I'm not imagining it . Finally , just when I got home , I turned around and looked at him . He was just standing there . He didn't smile . He just stood there . It was so obvious . What should I do ? I'm so scared . Can I call the police ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Actually , I don't think you can call the police . Not yet at least . He hasn't done anything . And probably the police will just ignore it . But if anything happens again , then maybe you should call .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Why can't I call the police now ? He was definitely following me !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Of course you can call the police if you want . That's not what I mean . I'm just saying that they probably won't do anything .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I suppose . What can they do ? I don't even know who he is .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Listen , Carol . Don't let this bother you too much . Probably it's nothing . Just keep your eyes open when you go out . If you see him a third time , and if he follows you again , then I think we should go to the police . But for now , just try not to worry .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Alright . And I won't go to that cafe for awhile .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hey Matt . I just got a job at a consulting firm .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Congratulations . That's great !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm so happy . I don't have to worry about finding a job and interviewing anymore .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: When do you start ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I start next Monday .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You're going to have to put in a lot of hours you know .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I know . I'm a little nervous , but it's pretty exciting .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I bet . You must be stoked .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yeah . I'm going to celebrate tonight . Wanna hang out ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sure . It's on you right ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Of course . How about Toby ? Should we call him ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I don't know . He's a little depressed . He's having a hard time finding a job right now .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I should still tell him . In the least , I can refer him to my company . It might help .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That sounds like a good idea .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hello , this is Helen speaking .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hello , Helen . This is John . How are you ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Fine , thank you . And you ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Fine , thanks . I ' ll have a party next Sunday at home . I ' m calling to ask whether you can come or not .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , how wonderful . I ' ll be glad to .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Okay , now you are a famous star .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hum , don ' t say that . Maybe you can do something useful for me .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What ' s wrong with you ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I ' ll tell you at the party .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Okay .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What's the matter with you then ? You look miserable .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It's us .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What do you mean by us ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , you always say you're busy .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That's right .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: And you often go back to live with your parents and leave our son in the room by himself .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I ... I ... I miss my parents , also they miss me .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh I remember , I cut terrible calls , and you didn't say anything about it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You mean I am groaned a few words ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Totally not . Perhaps it's about our marriage .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Listen to this . Mary got married .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Is she really ? I can ' t believe it !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes . Yesterday .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Good gracious . That ' s incredible !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: She married Jerrod .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You ' re kidding .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: She ' s going to live in Paris .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Really ? I ' m surprised .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: David , why didn ' t you clean the room ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I ' m not in the mood .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Why are you feeling depressed ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I was told my girlfriend was speaking ill of me . That ' s a real let-down .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I don ' t think she will do such a thing .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: But she did and made me disappointed .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , cheer up . A girlfriend is not everything .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: But she means a lot to me .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Then forgive her mistake .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh . I just can ' t forget it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hello , Tom ! Do you have plans for this evening ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Nothing special .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How about having dinner with me ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That's great . I would love to . And when ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Let ' s fix it at seven o'clock , OK ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No problem . However , maybe I should come early to help you prepare the dinner .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Don ' t worry . I will arrange everything .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: All right , see you tonight .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: See you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You said you like classical music very much . Then who is your favorite opera star ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: There are three of them , the Three Tenors .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , you mean Pavarotti , Domingo and Carreras . Have you been to their live shows ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yeah , it's really a unique experience . It's a solo concert by Pavarotti . He put on the performance in the Forbidden City in Beijing .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I've heard of that one . It was also his swan song .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Besides , speaking of classical music , we should never forget about the New Year's Concert .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Of course not . People all over the world watch it on TV , or listen to it on the radio .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sure . It's undoubtedly one of the biggest classical music events . Have you ever been to the live show ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , I went to the New Year's Concert in 2005 .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Wow , you are so lucky . I saw that one on TV . But it must be so different to be there in the concert hall .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That's for sure . You know , it's really amazing to be in the best concert hall , listening to the performance by the best orchestra . I had the greatest time ever .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Who was the conductor at that event ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Lorin Maazel . He did an amazing job . Moreover , he just celebrated his 75th birthday .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: So cool . I wish I can go to the live New Year's Concert someday in the future .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: The right opportunity for you would come along soon . You know , music is transnational .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I believe in that . Well , the performance is about to begin . Let's be quiet .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I just love your hair that way .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thanks .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Where did you have it done ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: My sister did it . When did you get yours cut ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Just yesterday . I'm still getting used to it .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , it looks very nice .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thanks .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It's very thoughtful of you to invite me to your wedding .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: How can I forget my old friend ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: My best wishes to you and the bride !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you very much .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Where to , miss ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hi ! Crenshaw and Hawthorne , at the Holiday Inn that is on that corner .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Sure thing . So , where are you flying in from ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: From China .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Really ? You don ' t look very Chinese to me , if you don ' t mind me saying so .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It ' s fine . I am actually from Mexico . I was in China on a business trip , visiting some local companies that manufacture bathroom products .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Wow sounds interesting ! Excuse me if I am being a bit nosy but , how old are you ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Don ' t you know it ' s rude to ask a lady her age ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Don ' t get me wrong ! It ' s just that you seem so young and already doing business overseas !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well thank you ! In that case , I am 26 years old , and what about yourself ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I am 40 years old and was born and raised here in the good old U . S of A , although I have some Colombian heritage .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Really ? That ' s great ! Do you speak some Spanish ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Uh ... yeah .. of course !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Que bien ! Sentences poems habeas en espanol !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I can ' t believe it !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What ' s wrong ? That was a great goal .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , but I bet $ 200 dollars on the Cougars !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Looks like you ' re going to lose out on this game then .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I can ' t believe it ! I thought the Cougars were going to win for sure .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What were the odds ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: 20 to 1 , in favour of the Cougars !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Too bad .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Jenny , are you having a good time ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , of course . This is a really wonderful party with interesting people and great food .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I ' m glad you are enjoying yourself .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you for the invitation .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It ' s my pleasure . Can I get you another glass of champagne ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , I ' d love another glass . You ' re a wonderful host . Thank you for everything .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It ' s my pleasure having you here .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hello , Mr . Green . This is Lin Tong . How are you ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hi , Mr . Lin . I am leaving tomorrow and I am just packing .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , sorry to interrupt you . But I am calling to say goodbye to you . I am awfully sorry to tell you that I am afraid I could not see you off at the airport tomorrow , because I will have to attend a very important meeting .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It doesn't matter , Mr . Lin . I can understand . I know you are always very busy . Work must come first .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thanks a lot . You have been here for almost three weeks . How time flies !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes . And I would like to convey my thanks to you for your help during my stay here in Nanjing .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It is our pleasure . It has been a great pleasure to work with you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Me too . I am looking forward to cooperating with you again .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Really ? Great ! We will . Well , what's your flight number ? When are you leaving tomorrow ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It's Flight No . 104 , Northey Airlines , which leaves at ten O'dock tomorrow evening .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: OK , I will send someone to see you off .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That is so thoughtful of you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: My pleasure . Take care and have a nice trip .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thanks a lot . My wife and I will be welcoming and looking forward to your visit .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Let's call it a deal . Hope to see you again soon . Keep in touch then . Byebye .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Goodbye . Thanks again .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Welcome to my birthday party , I am so happy you can come .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thanks for inviting me . Here is the gift for you . Happy birthday , Francis ! Many more happy and healthy years for you !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thank you , shall I open it now ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , please do .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Wow , a remote car model and my favorite brand . I really like it . That is so nice of you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yeah , I was really struggling whether I should give you this nice little car . It was the last one they had and I really like it so much myself .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Typical you , always wanting to keep the best things for yourself . The more I appreciate the gift now .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I can ' t believe it !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What ' s wrong ? That was a great goal .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , but I bet $ 200 dollars on the Cougars !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Looks like you ' re going to lose out on this game then .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I can ' t believe it ! I thought the Cougars were going to win for sure .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What were the odds ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: 20 to 1 , in favour of the Cougars !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Too bad .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Here ' s your hot dog and beer . What happened ? Did I miss anything ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yeah , Cal Ripen just hit a home run .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What ' s the score ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well it was 3 to 4 , but Ripen ' s home run made it 5 to 4 since another player was on first base .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: So Baltimore is winning ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Right .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: This is a really great place to watch a baseball game .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yeah , there isn ' t a bad seat in the place .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: The fans are great here , too . Not like in Philadelphia .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It was a great idea to spend a day watching a game .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yeah , it reminds you why they say baseball is America ' s favorite pastime .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What a pin-up she is !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Can you imagine she's over forty ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That's incredible ! She has such a sharp figure .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Absolutely . She ' s a teacher of aerobics .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I heard that Janet has got a new job . She ' s working for the united investment group . I heard that they pay very well .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I heard that too . She must be making a pocket . Well , good for her .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Now , she ' ll be able to save up for that holiday in the united states .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , she will . At the moment , the exchange rate is very favorable , so she should try to go as soon as possible , while it ' s cheaper .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You ' re right . By the way , did you hear that Tom inherited some money recently ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Really ? I thought his parents had died several years ago .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: They did . He inherited the money from an uncle . I hope he doesn ' t lose a lot of it in taxed to the government .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Dying can be very expensive nowadays ! What ' s he going to do with it ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: He said that he would probably invest most of it . He ' s got a well-paid job , so he doesn ' t need the money to cover day-to day expenses . He just wants some extra money available for when he retires .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I had some good financial news yesterday too .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Really ? Have you won a fortune in the lottery ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No , but I got a pay rise of 5 % and a bonus for all the hard work I ' Ve put in recently . I think it was very nice for my boss to show his appreciation in that way .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It certainly was ! So , what are you going to do with your windfall ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Rose , the weekend is coming . Let's discuss what we will do .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What about going to the zoo on Saturday and to the park on Sunday ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Sounds good . But on Saturday there's a football final .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Then , what shall we do on Sunday .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Let me see . We can visit the country . We haven't done that for such a long time .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Good idea . I'll go shopping in one of the department stores nearby . We'll go to the zoo and the park another time . After all , we can put that off .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: OK .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What do you do when you are angry ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I usually calm down first and think about the reason that caused my anger .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That ' s smart . What do you usually do to relieve your anger ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Something like listening to music is a good idea .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , what kind of music do you listen to ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Classic . Something that could calm your mind .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I think that might work for me as well .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Working out is another good way to relieve anger .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Like what ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Jogging , yoga , or even just taking a walk .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hi , Doris . You look a little bit down . What's the matter ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , I'm leaving Japan and I'm going back to London , tomorrow .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Really !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yeah .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How do you feel about that ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , I do feel quite down because I am going to miss Japan after being here for 9 months , in Japan . I am going to miss it so much , cause I've had a great time here .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Mm , so what are you going to miss about Japan ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , I am going to miss the people , the food , the night life . Especially the nightlife .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What especially about the night life are you going to miss ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , I really like dancing . And I enjoy going out to night clubs and to restaurants and eating Japanese food also and I'm really going to miss that because it's very different to London .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How are the clubs different in Japan than in London ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , here there are many different clubs you can get into , for free , you don't have to pay , some of them . In London it's really expensive for drinks and an entry fee .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Can you believe the headlines ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What are you reading ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I ' m reading about Michael Milliken , the Bond King .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Didn ' t he sell worthless stocks to people or something ? He got arrested for that , didn ' t he ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: He got arrested all right .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: If I remember , he got off with a light sentence . Something like three years in a minimum-security prison .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yup , that ' s him . He made millions of dollars selling bonds to people and ended up with a pile of cash when they became useless .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I think the government fined him a small amount , and he kept the rest in his foreign bank accounts . He ' s still a millionaire .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That ' s the kind of thing in America that gets me mad . Some guy pulls off a stock scheme and makes millions while spending the bare minimum sentence in jail .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I know . And some poor guy that robs a liquor store makes $ 500 at most and ends up in jail for five to ten years .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You have a nice apartment .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you . My wife would be very happy to hear this .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: She must have done a lot of work on it .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You bet .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hi , John , how was your vacation ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Awesome , we went to Australia and New Zealand .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That must have been wonderful . Do anything interesting ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , we went bungee jumping when we were in Australia .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Wow ! Isn ' t that dangerous ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: A little , but the rush was worth it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Tell me about it .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: We jumped off a bridge and fell 500 feet before the bungee cord caught us .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: 500 feet ! I would never be able to do that .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yeah , It was scary , but exhilarating .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Tom , you look thoughtful and unhappy recently . What's wrong with you ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Lily broke up with me last week . In fact , she dumped me .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Why ? I mean , why did she part company with you after seven years together ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: She said it was because we had very different ideas about life .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Do you believe her excuse ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Of course not . I knew she had fallen in love with another guy . It is difficult to see her move on so quickly .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Come on , buddy , cheer up . Why not do some sports with me ? Violent exercise might help to shake you out of your disappointment in love .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you , Steven . You are really a good friend .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Mum , this is for you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , flowers ! What for , my dear ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Happy Mother's Day to you , Mum !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , thank you . You are so sweet !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hi there ! I am looking for a new car . I have this old Ford Pinto that I would like to trade in .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I see . You are in luck this month because all of our models are on sale ! it is a perfect time to buy a new car since it ' s the end of the year .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Perfect ! I like this one .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That is the Ford Focus . A very light but powerful vehicle . It comes with dual side airbags , power steering and power windows , tinted windows and your choice of either automatic or manual transmission .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Sounds like a good car ! How many miles to the gallon ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It is a very fuel efficient vehicle giving you about 34 miles in the city and 40 on the highway .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That is really convenient . Especially now that fuel prices are so high ! What ' s under the hood ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: A very powerful 2 . 5- liter turbocharged engine , Trust me , this car is fast !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Now for the most difficult question . What is the price tag for this lovely vehicle ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Very affordable sir . You can take it out of this lot today with 0 % down payment and no interest for the first year ! You can test drive it now and we can sign the papers when we get back .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Great ! Let ' s do it !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hi . Bob ! We've been working hard at our lessons for a fortnight . So why don't we take it easy this weekend ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Okay ! What do you suggest ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How about seeing a play ? I hear Hamlet is on at the National Theater .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Is that so ? Why not ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: ( looking at a newspaper ) Oh , dear me ! There's no performance at the National theater this weekend . So we have to go to cinema instead .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What's on ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Let me see .. um . Gone With the Wind . It is on at six cinemas on Saturday night .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That sounds interesting . Which is the nearest ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Ah . The Royal , I think .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What time does it start ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Why don't we go to the 7:30 show ? It is convenient to us , I think .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: But we won't have enough time for dinner .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Do you want to go to the earlier or the later show ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Ah ... I fancy going to the later show .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Then , there's a 9:30 show .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That's Okay , I think .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: All right .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Can I help you ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Could you show me the coat on the shelf ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Sure . Please come this way .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: May I try it on ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Of course . Here is the fitting room .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It doesn't fit quite right . It feels a little tight in the waist . Do you have this in a larger size ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , here it is .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , how do I look in this one ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You look really beautiful in it .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: OK . I'll take it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What are you doing this Saturday ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Not much .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Do you want to go see a movie ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That sounds good .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What's playing at the Century Fox ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Candlelight in the Window

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Should we go see it ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'd rather not . I don't like horror movies .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How about ' Run of the Mill ? '

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No . I heard that's really boring .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Why don't we go to a concert instead ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Great idea !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hi , Mike , what gives ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hi , Bill , this is my new car .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hey , great set of wheels .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You like it , huh ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Who wouldn't ? Wow , that's out of this world .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It is special , isn't it ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yeah , too cool . How much did they sold you for ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Lots . Looks like I'll have to moonlight for the next two years .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I can imagine .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hey , let's go for a spin . You can try it out .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'd love to .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Ok , let's go .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm happy to see you again .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Me too .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: We should do this more often .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Okay , I'll give you a ring next week .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: And so , that concludes my outline for our marketing strategy next year . Thank you very much for your time .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hey , that was quite the presentation ! Honestly , I was completely blown away by your strategy outline . I've gotta say , Alex , you really wowed me today .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Aw , come on , it was nothing . I'm just doing my job .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No , I think you deserve some recognition here ; I mean , if I look back on your previous presentations , this is a huge improvement .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , Kristin did give me a hand with the slides . She ' s a real wiz on PowerPoint .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: And I saw that you took on board my feedback about pricing strategies . I really appreciate you taking the time to think though my suggestions .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yeah , well , that was some good advice . You made some really good points .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , I just wanted to say well done . Really you did a great job .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Nice day today , isn't it ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , beautiful weather we're having .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: We can't complain about the weather recently .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , the sun shines day after day . It's neither too hot nor too cold .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I wonder how long this weather can last .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I hope it will last fine Sorrow . I'm going to have a picnic with my family .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: When can we expect you and your daughter for dinner ? Next Saturday ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Next Saturday ? I ' m sorry . I ' Ve promised to go to a Chinese Opera with my daughter .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How about Sunday then ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , Sunday sounds fine . What time ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Does 6 thirty suit you ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It suits us fine . We ' ll see you then .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thanks , goodbye .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hi Bob , this is my friend Mary .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I am very pleased to meet you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Bob is in advertising .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That sounds an interesting job , Bob .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , my God ! What's this ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Look ! This window is open .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Did you open it before we left ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Are you kidding ? It's winter . Why would I open it ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I don't know . Wait . Is this yours ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: No ! Oh , my God ! Someone has broken into the house .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It looks that way . That's probably why the door wasn't locked when we came in .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I locked it when I left though .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , but the robber broke in . Then , when he left , he left through the door . So it wasn't locked .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I don't care about that , Allen ! What did he steal ? That's the question !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Look around .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: The TV's still here .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: And your stereo too . So what did he steal ? We have to go look upstairs .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: But what if someone's still up there ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I don't think there will be . He left through the door , remember ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I couldn't look at you , and say you aren't beautiful !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You are pretending !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: No , Miss Anna , you must let me say how lovely you are ! What's wrong with that ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It's wrong because---it isn't true .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You know that everybody notices how beautiful you are , don't you ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , no-that is , I've heard Linda say they do , but ... Thank you . But please don't speak to me again .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , Miss Anna ! That's too hard ! I won't be here long .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hello Mary . I haven ' t seen you for ages . Are you still seeing Paul ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No . We broke up last month . I ' m taking a break from dating for a while .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Did you break up amicably ? Sometimes couples row a lot before splitting up .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: We just decided to stop seeing each other . It was all very amicable . Are you still going out with mike ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , I am . We ' re thinking about getting engaged . We ' Ve been dating for over a year now .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Good for you ! Have you seen Kelly recently ? Is she still dating nick ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I havn't seen her for a while . She stopped seeing nick because he was cheating on her . He was seeing a girl form his office . One day , she saw them holding hands and ended the relationship immediately .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: She was right to do that . I heard the Neil and Tina getting married soon .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Really ? They ' Ve been together for a long time . When are they getting married ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I think it ' s 26th September . I ' ll check and make sure that Tina remembers to invite you to the hen night .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thanks . Hey , look at that guy over there . I think he fancies you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: He certainly looks interested , doesn ' t he ? Shall we invite him over to our table ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hello , Jill .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Tom , You're back , come in please . How are you ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Fine , only a little tired .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You'll recover after a good night's sleep .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thank you very much for looking after my house in my absence .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That's all right . Would you have a cup of coffee ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , Please . It ' s very kind of you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Don't mention it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: The rooms are very tidy and the flowers grew very well . You are very helpful . I want to thank you for everything you've done for me .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It's my pleasure .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I bought you some books on literature , I don't know if you would like them .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you . Thank you for the trouble you've taken .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Not at all .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Did your wife give birth yet ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yeah . She's a healthy beautiful girl .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Congratulations . How is your wife doing ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: She is tired , but getting a lot of rest now .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That's good to hear .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm just glad there were no complications .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: If your wife and baby are both happy , what more can you ask for ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It's been a week , and I haven't slept that well .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That's normal for anyone with a newborn .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yeah , but it's so hard . I have to work , and then go home and take care of my wife and the baby . I'm going to get sick at this rate .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You'll get used to it . After everything stabilizes , you can regain your health .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That's true . I should make sure my wife and baby stay healthy during this time .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Wow ! What happened to you ? You look sad .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I just lost my job . My boss just told me .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That's unbelievable . Why did this happen ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I don't understand of myself . It seems they have to save money .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I cant't believe it . You've worked here for years .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: My goodness . She is thirty seconds faster than the world records in five thousand meters race .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Excuse me . What did you say ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: A chinese girl have broken the world record in the Olympic Games

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That's incredible . I cann't believe it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You have to . It's sure .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: How amazing !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Joe , how are you doing ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Pretty good . Mary , I was wondering if you would like to come to a party on Friday night ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I am free that night , and a party sounds good .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Fine . It will be at my house . Do you know how to get there ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I kind of know where you live , but could you e-mail me your address ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I can do that . Do you have anyone that you would like to bring with you to the party ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I would really like to bring my friend Jake , if that would be OK .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh yeah , I remember Jake . That would be fine .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Would you like some help with the food ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Just bring along whatever it is that you and Jake would like to drink .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Good game ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Not bad . But too hot for me today .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , I know . Kind of hard to concentrate , isn't it ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Absolutely . Who were you playing with ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , just on my own . I just joined , so I don't really have any partners .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Really ? Oh , well , in that case we should play together some time . What's your handicap ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: 16 . Yours ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No kidding ! I'm 16 , too . We should definitely play together some time . My name's Bob .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Jane . Nice to meet you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Me too . So , do you like the course ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , it's fine . However , I personally think the fairways between the greens are a bit too long , especially for such a hot climate . Don't they have carts ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , they used to , but they got rid of them because of environmental concerns .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , that's good . I guess the caddies were pleased .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Actually , in my opinion , the carts were better because you don't have to tip them .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , but look at it this way , getting rid of the carts probably gives more work to local people , which is a good thing , right ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Possibly , but I still miss them ! What bothers me is that the heat makes the caddies ' life quite hard . One member's caddy fainted last week !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How awful , poor guy .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Right . Luckily it was on the eighteen hole , quite near the clubhouse , so he didn't have far to carry him .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , my God , you're kidding me ! He carried him back ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yup .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Happy Anniversary , honey .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I thought you had forgotten .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: After the trouble I got into last year , no way .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you honey , it means a lot to me .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Bill , I have received the admission letter from Cambridge University !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Congratulations !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How about you ? Have you got any news from university ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No . But I am going to apply for some vocational schools . I like fashion design and want to study it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I am glad you can study something you really like !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You must like negotiating a lot . People are saying , you are a super negotiator .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Ha , I am flattered . Actually , when it comes to negotiate , you don ' t need to like it . You just need to understand how it works .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I am not good at it by any means . Give me some advice .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , generally speaking , if you want to change someone ' s mind or understand his position , you have to put yourself in his shoes . Understand his need and the cost for his need . And then you work together to find a solution .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Sounds easy . But how can I apply to practice ? I am thinking about applying for more reimbursement for my mobile bill . But I am afraid our boss will turn me down .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Ok , as John after Kennedy put it , let us never negotiate out of fear , but let us never fear to negotiate .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Professor Wang looks so handsome today . He is wearing a light brown suit and a pink tie .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: He always wears an extremely becoming suit with tie .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: He ' s quite particular about what he wears , especially about his ties . He gets different tie each day .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: A light brown suit and a pink tie today , and a light blue shirt and a blue tie yesterday . A perfect match !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: The tie is necessary for man . It makes you look so attractive in a super tie .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Match is important ; well , the way of tying is also important .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: My father dose not know how to tie a tie , for he often wears a cravat .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: My father wears a tie every day , but he can ' t do it himself . My mother helps him with his tie every morning .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You mother is not only a patient mother but also a gentle wife .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thanks for coming shopping with me .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm so honored that you thought to ask me .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I've never given a speech in front of a thousand people before .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You're going to do great . And you're going to look great .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thanks . Now let's decide which one of these suits looks best for this occasion .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I still like the olive one best . There's a tailor here who can take up the sleeves for you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: The question is , can he have it done before Friday ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: These guys are professional . I think they can have it done tomorrow . Let's ask .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Do you like flowers ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Of course , I like .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What's your favorite flower ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Forsythia . It's also called winter jasmine which is the symbol of the spring's arrival .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Spring is a lively season .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes . How about you ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I admire plum blossoms very much . It seems that only it can blossom in the cold winter .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You have a perfect taste !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It is the symbol of laughing at hoar frost and fighting with snow . I admire the bravery of plum blossoms .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: But it used to be ignored by many people .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: The bright people will remember it forever .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , it's snowing . Let's enjoy the plum blossoms when snowing .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hey Bob . Whatchy doing ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm at home painting .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I didn't know you paint . What type of painting is it ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I enjoy oil painting . I learned it in one of my extra classes in college .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That sounds so interesting . I wish I learned a hobby .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hobbies are never too late to learn . They offer a variety of classes at the local community college . You should look into it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I think I will . Thanks for the info .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It seems that you get antsy when you hear I praise another guy .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I get antsy not because you praise a guy , but because you may be taken for a ride by a guy like him .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How come you think of him that way ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Because you seem to have lost your vigilance . You should be on the watch out .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I have no reason to distrust him . He's never caused any harm .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Isn't there anything that sounds fishy ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Nothing smells a rat . I told you that he's an all-right guy .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: All-right guy ? All right . Let's talk about something else instead .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What a wonderful sight !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes . I've dreamed a thousand times that I could lie down here to relax .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: We are tired of jobs and competition . We need a quiet place .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'd like to stay here for all my life if possible .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: So would I . Look , it might be going to rain .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I don't think it will spoil our trip .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It will give us better feeling and atmosphere if it rains .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Let's kick off our shoes to walk on the green flag stoned roads .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That's a good idea !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Are you going anywhere for your vacation ?
