utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Get ready for the best meal of your life !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Come here ! I can see the tall camphor trees from here .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , we can also see some yew trees .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: This is a great botanical garden in the city .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Listen to the sound of nature ! It's like music .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yeah , I agree . It makes you feel really good .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What are those . Miss Liu ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Do you mean the red flowers ? They are peony flowers ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: The red and yellow peony flowers are so beautiful .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , you like them very much . right ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sure . I'm going to take more pictures today .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I can help you with it

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You are so kind . Thanks .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Have you seen this ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: They killed another hostage .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , how awful . What a terrible thing to do .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I agree completely . I just don't understand what's wrong with them . Don't they have any humanity ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , maybe they've got a point . I mean , I suspect that they think the same about us .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , but that doesn't make them right , does it ? Just because they think so ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I guess not . My view is that we should give in to their demands , so that innocent people can stop getting killed .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Come on , you can't be serious ! We should never give in to terrorist's demands , otherwise where would we be ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , that's probably true , but I don't think we should be dogmatic about it . A colleague of mine was kidnapped once , so perhaps I have a different view of things .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Really ? What happened ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , it was in the Balkans during the war . He was only held for three days , and then they simply released him . It was a case of mistaken identity , and they just let him go when they found out he was no use to them . It was lucky they didn't kill him .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , sure .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: There's a double feature at the cinema this Saturday . Do you want to go with me ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What are the movies that are playing ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: There's an action movie with Harrison Ford and a chick flick with Susan Abandon .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I've never seen a movie I don't like that had Harrison Ford in it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: So , is that a yes ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes . What time does it start and do you want to meet me there ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It starts at one and yea , let's meet there . It's the cinema on the corner of Lincoln and Main .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Great ! I have a coupon for free popcorn at that theater !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hey , Tom , I want to learn how to play golf .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You're really sporty !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I want to do everything I can .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Do you have clubs ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: No . Can I rent clubs ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: There are clubs for beginners . It's cheaper to buy those rather than rent them a few times .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What kinds of clubs ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Like the seven-piece set . It's only $ 120 .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'll buy a set . But you have to teach me .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Okay .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What a nice day ! Why don't we go for an outing ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sure . Where would you suggest ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How about going to the suburbs ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sounds good .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It ' s a wonderful party , Joan , The food , the drink , the atmosphere ... Everyone is enjoying himself .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thanks to your help . To our friendship .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Bottoms up ! By the way what kind of entertainment are we gonna have ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Dancing . The boys from the Campus Band have promised to play music for us .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , how wonderful ! Every girl on the campus has a crush on those handsome guys .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'll surely make introductions for them .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Mr . Lin , what are you interested in ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I enjoy camping .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Really ? I'm not much of an outdoor person . What do you like about it ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I love the fresh air , the scenery the exercise , and the time to think .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Do you hike or fish on your trips ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , both . Last trip I fished a little and hiked five miles .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Did you catch anything ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , but I threw them back .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How about Joining our summer camp next week ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Great ! I can't wait .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: what do you think about this store ? I heard it ' s a posh store that ' s only got branches in big cities .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I love this store . The only problem is that it ' s extremely expensive .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: don ' t worry . I ' Ve decided that for your birthday I ' m going to take you shopping for a new dress .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: really ? I thought you hated shopping ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I do , that ' s why you should appreciate this gift !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: sure . That ' s really nice of you . Let ' s go in and try some things on .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: how about this red dress ? I think it would really suit you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: that ' s gorgeous ! Do they have it in a size 8 ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: here you go . On any other day , it would cost me a fortune , but it ' s on special offer today .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I think this color isn ' t quite right for me . Do they have the same dress in white ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: let me look . Let ' s see ... they ' Ve got one in blue , green , pink , black ... and white . Here you are .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: this is perfect ! What do you think ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I think you look fantastic . Happy Birthday !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I ' m so lucky . You only get a chance like this once in a blue moon ! Thanks honey !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What are you reading ? You've had your nose buried in that book since last night .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: This book is so good . I just can't put it down ! It's called ' The Power of One ' .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I haven't read a book like that for as long as I can remember .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Me either . From the very first page , this author just pulled me right in !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Can I read it when you're finished ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes . I'm in the last chapter now and it is just gripping .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Don't tell me anything about it . I want to read it for myself .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Okay . But be prepared for an all-nighter ! I doubt you will want to put it down either .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What dances do you like ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I love to dance the fast music .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Then you must be interested in disco .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , it's my favorite .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , it's a disco . Let's dance .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You're a good dancer .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thank you . Now they are playing a rumba . Would you have a try ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sorry . I feel like sitting out the next dance .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: OK . Let's get something to drink .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Good idea .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hey , Shirley . The party has been wonderful . My husband and my children have enjoyed it very much , and me too .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I've said you will enjoy your life here !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I surely will . By the way , is the party like this held every weekend in our neighborhood ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , I've forgotten to tell you . The party is held every other week . And every family gives their own performance each time .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: My children would like that ; they like dancing very much .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That's good !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Look ! Who is that guy on the stage ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , my God ! That's my husband , Benjamin .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Really ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: He likes American Idol very much , and he always imitates the contestant at home . I can't believe he got on the stage himself .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: He performs very well . He is so funny !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: OK , just ignore him . I've noticed there are lots of exercise facilities in our community . After dinner you can go there for a walk with your family !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: OK , that's perfect ! By the way , is there any playground in our neighborhood ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , there is one behind our building . And you can play tennis there . But if you want to play tennis there , they will change you 30 Yuan per hour .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: OK , got it ! Thank you so much . You have helped me a lot !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You are welcome ! We are neighbors !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I went to Jessie's birthday party yesterday . It was very good .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I didn't know about it . What did you do ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: We ate a lot of things . We played games and gave gifts to Jessie . We had a lot of fun .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You were really lucky .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: My birthday comes next month . I want to hold a birthday party , too .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I hope I can go to your party .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It ' s so relaxing , taking a walk in the country . The air is so fresh and clean .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: would you like to live in the country ? I ' m not sure I ' d like it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I can see a lot of advantage and disadvantage . The problem is that , for me , each advantage has its own disadvantage .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What do you mean ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , I hate the noise in the city , but I love being around lost of people . The problem is that you can ' t have lots of people and have peace and quiet . The two just don ' t go together .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I see what you mean . I love being far away from a city , but I hate being so far away department stores and sports facilities .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: People can ' t have it both ways . If you live in the country , it is often less convenient . If you live in a city , it is noisy , but there ' s more to do .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I would love to be surrounded by hills and streams . They ' re so much better to look at than concrete , rows of parked cars and tall buildings .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I would love to hear the birds singing and feel the fresh breeze on my face . When the wind blows in the city , you get dust in your mouth and in your eyes .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: The view from the hill is so beautiful and relaxing . There ' s so sign of pollution . The village looks so peaceful .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Just remember that in that village there ' s nothing to do . There ' s not even a pub or restaurant . There ' s just one small shop with a poor selection of goods .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You ' re right . I would have to travel to the city at least once a week to go shopping and see friends . I would hate living in the country !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: it's getting cold .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: yes . I bought a scarf yesterday . It's really nice and warm . Have a look .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , it's made of wool . I like the striped pattern .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: yes , I adore simple fashions . How does it look on me ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: it looks great , but you need something to go with it . It's too plain on its own .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: how about this blue sweater ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: that's a good idea . When did you buy it ? Is it a name brand ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: yes , but I bought it when it was on sale , 50 % off the original price . OK , what do you think ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: that looks lovely . Just one more thing---you need a pair of earrings .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I've got a pair of pearl earrings . Here it is .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: perfect !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: you have good fashion sense , Karen .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: thanks . We should be ourselves . There are so many fashion victims out there .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: yes , but with our sense we'll always look good .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Don't just stand outside . Come on in .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yeah .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: This is Alex . Remember ? This is Sean .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Nice to meet you guys .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Over there are Stacy and Rebecca . We're all on the school's tennis team .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Who's that guy who's handing out beer to everyone ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That's my boyfriend Matt . Isn't he cute ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: He sure is !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Come on . I'll introduce you two .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Happy birthday ! This is for you , Kate .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thanks , Miss . Wang .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You know in China we usually don't open presents until the guests leave .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Really ? I've already opened it . Great ! And it is exactly after my fancy . Thank you very much .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Here's some dancing . See those guys stomping , clapping and shouting ? They're practicing step-dancing .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It sounds cool . The rhythms look really difficult .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: They basically turn their bodies into drums . There's a national step competition every year .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , black people are supposed to be great dancers .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Wen ! That's only a stereotype . Like all Asians are supposed to be math geniuses . I'm not a great dancer , and you said you failed calculus .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Ha-ha ! You got me there !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How is everything going with your girlfriend ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Didn't I tell you ? It's over !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , I am sorry to hear that . I did't know that you had split up . What happened ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It was a few things . The first thing that happened was that we were supposed to go out for a romantic dinner for our one year anniversary , but she stood me up !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Really ! Did she tell you why she didn't show up ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No , but I ended up finding out later that night when I saw her drinking with another man at a club near my home !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What was she thinking ? Did you confront her about it when you saw her ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I wanted to , but I knew that if I spoke to her , I'd just blow up at her , so I decided to just go home . I called her later that the night , but she didn't answer the phone .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I can't believe she would do that to you . It's so dishonest-and rude !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I know . I still haven't heard from her . The good thing is that I'm so angry with her that I don't feel sad about not having her around .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I bet you that she regrets what she's done . You are such a good catch ! She really lost out , didn't she ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I guess so .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: So I don't think you'll have a problem finding another girlfriend . There are plenty of fish in the sea !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hello ! So you are leaving today .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hello . Thank you for seeing me off . You actually don't need to bother .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It is my pleasure to see you off .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thanks a lot . I hope to see you again .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I hope so , too .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thanks again for everything you have done for me .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You're welcome . Have a nice trip !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How is everything going with your girlfriend ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Didn ' t I tell you ? It ' s over !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , I am sorry to hear that . I did ' t know that you had split up . What happened ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It was a few things . The first thing that happened was that we were supposed to go out for a romantic dinner for our one year anniversary , but she stood me up !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Really ! Did she tell you why she didn ' t show up ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No , but I ended up finding out later that night when I saw her with another man at a club near my home !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What was she thinking ? Did you confront her about it when you saw her ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I wanted to , but I knew that if I spoke to her , I'd just blow up at her , so I decided to just go home . I called her later that night , but she didn't answer the phone .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I can ' t believe she would do that to you . It ' s so dishonest---and rude !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I know . I still haven ' t heard from her . The good thing is that I ' m so angry with her that I don ' t feel sad about not having her around .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I bet you she regrets what she ' s done . You were such a good catch ! She really lost out , didn ' t she ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I guess so . It would be nice to know why she did this though .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I know . It ' s always nice to have some closure , but I don ' t think you ' ll have a problem finding another girlfriend .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How are you , Sue ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Pretty good . I ' Ve just had my new poems published .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Congratulations on your success .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: And how ' s your brother ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: He is fine .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: He ' s going to be sent to Britain to study , really ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes . He ' s already got the passport and visa .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Fantastic ! Please send him my congratulations .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you . He ' s very lucky indeed .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Mike , come and look at this painting of shrimp ! It is so simple yet so vivid !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yeah . It is incredible ! Is it the work of Qi Bakshi ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , it is . How do you know that ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , Qi is famous all over the world , isn ' t he ? Besides I am quite interested in Chinese painting .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Cool ! What kind of Chinese painting do you prefer , free sketch or claborate-style painting ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I prefer free sketch , especially the landscape paintings . I can always feel peace and harmony from those landscape paintings .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That's true . Chinese art stresses the harmony between man and nature , which is an important part of China's traditional culture .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I love this art exhibition !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: So do I . Let ' s go to other areas to see what they have got , shall we ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: OK .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It's a lovely day , isn't it ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yeah , and most excitingly , I met the girl living under me today . She's really nice .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Is she American ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yeah , and most importantly , she's single ! Man , I could tell from the moment I saw her , she's the girl of my dreams !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: So I take it you two are hitting it off ? I know it's very convenient to be in a relationship with your neighbor , but what if you break up ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I don't know . I am not really worried about that . I don't wanna lose before even starting . Besides I think the other two American guys have also fallen for her .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Sounds like you've got some competition . You made a move already ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Not yet . But I am thinking of inviting her to dinner sometime . I know some good restaurants nearby .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That's nice . Having been here a little while surely gives you the advantage , eh ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You bet . Now that you mentioned it , I think I'll call her now and see if she is available tonight .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Good luck !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thanks !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hi Rose , what are you busy with right now ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hi Jack , I'm working on these documents . The manager wants them for half an hour .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , Rose ,

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Is there something you need ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Are your free this weekend ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , I have nothing to do .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Great , Is it convenient if i visit you this weekend ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I beg your pardon ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'd like to call on you this weekend . I just want to a drop in for a chat .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Really ? well , ok , you're welcome .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Is 5 PM . a good time for you ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hmm , how about seven ? I can treat you to dinner .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Sure , that would be great . I'll bring the wine .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: OK . Then I'll be expecting you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'll be there on time .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: wow , it that your sports car ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: yes , do you like it ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I love it ! I used to always want to drive a green jaguar . Is it in good condition ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: it looks good on the outside , but the inside is a different story . It needs a lot of servicing before it can go out on the roads again .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: what's wrong with it ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: well , first of all , it needs a new engine , which is extremely expensive .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: when's the last time you had it serviced ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: it must have been a few years ago now .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I thought all cars needed regular servicing on a yearly basis .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: they do . Once my son was born , there was no reason to drive this car anymore . It's only a two-seater , you know !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: what else is wrong with it ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: the heating controls don't work anymore , so it always feels like it's about 100 degrees in the car -- even in the summer !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: anything else ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: the brakes don't really work that well anymore either .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: why don't you get it all fixed ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: it costs more than you think to run a car , especially when there are so many things wrong with it !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: well , let me know when you can get it fixed . I ' d love to go for a ride in it !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What a pin-up she is !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Can you imagine she's over forty ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That's incredible ! She has such a sharp figure .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Absolutely . She's a teacher of aerobics .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Merry Christmas , Linda !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Merry Christmas , Lee !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Linda , thank you for this wonderful Christmas dinner . I really enjoyed it .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you for coming . I'm glad you liked it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Is Stanley still singing that Elvis song ? He's really hogging the mike !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: If I hear " Love Me Tender " one more time , I think I'm going to go crazy !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: He sounds like a sick cow !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Can we adjust the pitch a little ? Maybe he'll sound better in a higher key .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I already tried that . Nothing seems to help .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hey ! Where are you going ... ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You look happy .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I am happy . I just bought a new car .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Wow ! Is it a good car ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It ' s a great car . It ' s very comfortable and it goes really fast .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Was it expensive ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Put it this way -- it wasn ' t cheap .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What colour is it ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It ' s red and black .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I often go to a place of leisure .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Really ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I very much like to go to a cafe and doze in the afternoon sunshine .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sounds great .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: The coffee , books , music and sunshine are just beautiful there .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: How nice .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I may take you there some day .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Good .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: OH , This is the famous Emperor Palace building .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It ' s huge .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Would you like to go to the top ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , of course .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: The view is breath-taking .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: The bridegroom looks a bit nervous .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: On this occasion , most people do .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , they are playing the wedding March . Here they come .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: She is a beautiful bride .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I am so happy for them .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Are you crying ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , I always cry at weddings .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Harris and Anne are perfect for each other .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , they are .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You and Tom also make a great couple .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: In fact , we are beginning to make preparations .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: For the wedding ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: No , no , for the engagement .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Try to catch this bouquet then .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What's up , buddy ? You look so upset .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I just broke up with a girl . Why didn't she understand that I loved her ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm sorry to hear that . What's your conflict ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I don't know . She always said I didn't love her , but I did .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Did you think about talking to her again ? Maybe she is waiting for your call .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I have asked for a talk again , but she refused and said she wanted to be quiet .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Come on , guy . Maybe she isn't your right person .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hello , Jason . Are you free this Saturday evening ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes . I have no plans .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Would you like to Come to our barbecue ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , that sounds wonderful .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: OK . See you then .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: But wait , wait , will there be food that is not meat ? You know . I'm a vegetarian

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hey ! I didn't know that ! When did you become a vegetarian ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: The other day , I decided that I needed to loose more weight so I am going to try to be a vegetarian . And you know what ? I don't miss the taste of meat .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Relly ? That's amazing .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , it really is . After having vegetarian diet . I have much more energy , I need less sleep , I feel calmer . I can maintain an ideal body weight without worrying about how much I eat and I can think more clearly .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Are you kidding ? I really don't think that you think less clearly on non-vegetarian diet .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , maybe . But I feel better since becoming a vegetarian . Maybe you could also have a try .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Maybe I'll also have a try some day , but I'm afraid that it would be difficult for me to refuse meat .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Maybe you would change your mind after having a vegetarian diet .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: We'll see . Anyway , I'll prepare some vegetarian food for the barbecue . See you then !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Mr . Green , I ' d like to introduce you to Mr . Brown .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: How do you do , Mr . Brown ? It ' s a pleasure to get to know you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: My pleasure , Mr . Green . I look forward to an excellent relationship with your company .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I propose a toast to the health of everyone here and to the success of our negotiation .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Okay , let ' s make a toast .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hello , Rebecca , fancy meeting you here !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hi , Paul . I haven't seen you for a long time .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How have you been ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Fine , thank you , and you ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Pretty good . What brings you here ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I came to see my uncle . He lives in the next block .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Have you got your invitation yet ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: My invitation ? No , I haven't . My invitation to what ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: The house warming party .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Whose house warming party is it ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Tom and Bill Smith . They are both working now you know ? And they've bought a new house .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , they have ? I didn't know . I haven't seen Tom lately .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It's out in the suburbs .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Have you seen the house ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , I have . I went out with them last weekend .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Is it nice ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , it is . There are three bedrooms , a living room , a dining room , and a big kitchen . There's also a garden .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , that does sound nice . Have they moved in yet ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: They are moving today . Tom's taken the day off . He's rented a truck , and they should have all their furniture in the house tonight .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: When are they going to have the party ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Next Saturday night . You should get your invitation today or tomorrow .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Wow , that would be something to look forward to .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , if it isn't the teacher's pet !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Stop it . Teacher doesn't treat me any different than she does everyone else .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You can't prove that by me . I saw the score on your report .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hey , I worked hard on that report and I deserve the grade I got .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It just happened to be the highest grade in the class .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You're just jealous because you didn't do as well as you thought you did . Admit it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I worked hard too . But she always gives me a lower grade .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: If you think that she is not fair with your work then you should talk to her in person instead of stewing over it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Mrs . Smith , time has stood still with you !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you . You ' re partial .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm not flattering you . You ' re full of energy every day .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It's nice to hear that anyway .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hi ! Tom . Want to go to play bowling tonight ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sounds good . When and where shall we meet ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Let me see . How about 6:30 at the gate of the club ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Fine , see you then .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What are you listening now , Fred ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hey ! Man , put your earphone out . I said which song you are listening to .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Jay Chou's title song in his new album .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What's your comment on his new album ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Gorgeous ! There is another song combining Chinese and western music styles . I am crazy for it , so I hear it over and again . And I plan to make it as the ringbone of my mobile .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Let me enjoy it .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I suppose this song can be the No . 1 on the top chart .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I cann't wait for buying his CD now .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I enjoyed talking to you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I enjoyed talking to you too .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: We should hang out some time .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I think that would be nice .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Is there anything you would like to do next time ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Do you want to go out to eat ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'd like that .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: So I'll see you next time .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm going to call you soon .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'll talk to you later .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: See you soon .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Goodbye .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Brooke , I have bad news .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I called the airlines to reconfirm the reservations today .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Don't you dare tell me that ...

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm sorry . I didn't reconfirm in time and they gave away half of the seats .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , they should have called you !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: They said that they did . I've been so busy ...

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: And you didn't think to leave them my cell phone ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I didn't think there would be a problem .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It's the holidays ! Everybody knows how hard it is to get tickets !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm sorry . We're still going . I got reservations for all of us on the 31st . It will be OK . Trust me .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Trust you ! You can't even handle simple plane reservations !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Brooke !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What a good day !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes . It's really wonderful here The grass is greener and the air is fresher than those in the city .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Right . Let's go out and enjoy the beautiful natural scenery .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Great , let's go .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Wow , what a beautiful lake ! The green hills and clear water really provide magnificent scenery .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: En , it's so beautiful that I don't want to move my eyes from it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I feel as if I'm living in a different world , honey .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: The same to me . All the things here make me happy , the mountain , the water , the grass , the birds , the sunshine ...

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I think we should go out more frequently . The natural scenery can do us good .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That's the point . We should walk into the nature and enjoy its beauty whenever we have time .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Right . The city life has made us tired and out of energy , while the natural world can bring us quite new feelings .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You look pale recently .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yeah . I have got much pressure in the company . I have tobe wrapped upon my work .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Take good care of yourself .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you . I will .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Could you tell me what university you want to go to , John ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Pardon ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What university would you enter ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: University ? Why ? You asked me last year .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , I forget . Sorry .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I went to Harvard University .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Did you ? And what course did you take there ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: God save me ! Is there anything wrong with you ? Didn't I tell you ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I've not known . Perhaps , I've got a bad memory .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I did a B . A . in economics . Remember ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Terrific ! B . A . , again and again-B . A .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: London is such a historical city ! There ' s history everywhere you look . There ' s nelson ' s column , built as a monument to one of the Britain ' s great admirals and his important victory . He won the battle of Trafalgar in 1805 .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I ' m looking forward to seeing Westminster abbey , where many historical figures are buried , like Isaac Newton , the great mathematician and Winston Churchill , the great wartime leader .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Nearby , on the banks of the thames , there ' s the statue of Boadicea . She fought the Romans when they invaded Britain .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Women have often played an important role in British history . Queen Elizabeth I built a navy strong enough to fight off the Spanish armada in 1588 . more recently , Margaret thatcher transformed british society in the 1980 ' s .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: She was a very controversial leader . Are we going to visit the famous tower of London later ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: There ' s a lot to see there . Perhaps we should go tomorrow .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I ' m looking forward to seeing the famous castle and prison . Many historic figures were imprisoned there in the past . I really want to see the crown jewels too .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I ' Ve seen them before . They ' re quite incredible . If you want to see historical figures in London , there ' s one place you have to go .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Where ' s that ? Oh , I know ! Madame Tussaud ' s the waxworks museum .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: There you can see british leaders , entertainers , criminals , and royalty .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Sometimes , it ' s hard to know who belongs in each section of the museum !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hey Rachael , what's up ? How is your day ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Not bad . We have had a big meeting today , remember ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , yea . I forgot . So how did it go ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Pretty well . I think the boss liked my ideas .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Great , so what happens now ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , I have to write the proposal . I'm pretty excited about it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Lucy , you ' re back . How was your first day of school ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It was great . I had a really good time .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What classes did you have ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , I had English from 9 o'clock to 11 o'clock , art from 12 o'clock to 2 o'clock , and math from 2 o'clock to 4 o'clock .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What do you think about the teachers ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: To be honest , I liked all of them , except for the math teacher . Though he must be quite young , he seem like an old person . He ' s so boring !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That ' s too bad . How was your English teacher ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: She was great . In today ' s class , she gave us a lecture on how to be a good student . She told us not to arm for exams , and to pay more attention on communicating than memorizing .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Where is she from ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: She said that she ' s from a small town in the middle of America .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Were you able to understand everything that she said ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Not everything , but nearly . She speaks very clearly and doesn ' t use very complex words so that it is easy for us to understand her .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: She sounds like a good teacher . Do you think you ' ll pass her class ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes ... with flying colors !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What does that mean ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It ' s a new phrase that she taught us today . It means that I will not only pass the class , but I will do extremely well !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: If you like the class this much already , I ' m sure you will .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I hope so .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: did she give you any homework ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: not today . She said she wanted us to relax tonight instead of doing homework ,

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: no wonder you like the class so much .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I've got some great news for you !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: did you get the position you wanted ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: yes , I'll be promoted to department manager .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm glad to hear that . Congratulations !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: thank you . Actually , I could not believe it at first . You know , there're so many outstanding people in our company . Many of them are qualified to fill that position .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: sure , but you really did great and outperformed the others . You deserved it !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: thank you very much .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: you always have unique ideas and you're such a team leader .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I appreciate it very much . You've been doing great . I expect to see you be promoted pretty soon .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: that's very nice of you to say so . I'll try my best . When will you start at the new position ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: next week .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: so by then , you'll be in charge of the whole department .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: absolutely .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Terrible . How about people's lives ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Fortunately , there is no person died .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That's great . It seems that Typhoon is not as bad as earthquake .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yeah . Earthquake is one of the most badly natural disasters in the world .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That's why many people died in the earthquake .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , China is located on the Eurasia plate , where earthquakes happen frequently due to the earth's plates knocking against each other .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , China does have been plagued by numerous destructive earthquakes during its long history .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yeah , we've experienced the 8 . 0 magnitude earthquake in Wenchman .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: We're all familiar with natural disasters . but we still feel weak when we face Wenchman earthquake .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Right . But people at that time only know two words , " save " and " assistance " , they will never don't lift a finger . Life is the most important compared with anything else .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That's the point . Love among human beings is not limited by geography .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Do you have any hobbies ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes . I like gardening .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , that's interesting . Do you have a garden ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , follow me . Here it is .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Your garden is really lovely .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Do you take care of them everyday ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , I do .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Don't you feel dull ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I don't . I like the work .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How was the movie last night ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I didn't really like it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Mary said that she was really pleased with the photography .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I found it very disappointing .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: She liked the acting , too , because that's what she wanted to see .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I wasn't happy with it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Nothing is to your satisfaction .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What are you doing there with your mobile phone ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm moblogging !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Moblogging ? what does that mean ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , moblogging is a combination of the word ' mobile ' and ' blogging ' . It's another form of blogging . Users can publish blog entries to the web from a mobile phone or other mobile devices .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Sounds interesting ! That must be very convenient .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , you're right . I can blog wherever and whenever I'm on the move . It's especially good when I'm on a business trip and my laptop happens to be away from me .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How can you do that ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , if I simply want to write a few words , I'll send it by email or edit it all from the cell phone browser .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What if you want to publish some photos ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Then I'll shoot some pictures , re-size the images and upload them with text descriptions to my blog .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I see . Moblogging must have done a great favor for habitual bloggers like you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You bet it !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: so , how should we go to the theatre ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: let's take the bus .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I hate the bus system in London ! The bus drivers are rude , the buses are never on time , and there are few people around who can help you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: it's not that bad . You probably just had a bad experience once .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: it wasn't just once . Every single time I take the bus , something bad happens to me or to someone else on the bus .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: we could take the subway , but we'd have to go three stops along one line and then change trains twice .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: train fares are twice as expensive as the bus fare , too .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: if we don't hurry up , we'll miss the show . Should we take the bus ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: we're already late , so I think we had better take a taxi .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I don't think we'll be able to find a taxi very easily during hush hours . Let's just take the bus .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: fine . Have a look at the timetable to find out when the next one arrives .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: it looks like it should be here in just a few minutes .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: don't worry . Nothing bad will happen . I'll even buy your ticket for you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: thanks , that was nice of you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: see , now something good has happened to you on a bus trip !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Are you doing anything tonight ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No , nothing . Why ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Do you like western music ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , I do , very much .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: There ' s a concert tonight . Would you like to go and listen to it ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , yes . I ' d love to .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Aren ' t you interested in watching the Olympics ? There have been some excellent performances by athletes from all over the world .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I just don ' t find it very interesting .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I think it ' s wonderful to see people from all over the world taking part in such a great event .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I think that for a lot of people , it ' s just a way to try and show their country is better than other countries .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I think the Olympics help to promote world peace .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I ' m not sure about that . We still have many wars in the world . I think that the idea behind the Olympics is a good one , but the reality is that during the Olympics countries compete . There ' s no real spirit of cooperation and people are usually not very friendly to each other .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You are so pessimistic ! The Olympics is a great opportunity for athletes to demonstrate their speed , skill , agility and strength . Most people hope to see someone from their country win , but I think that they are just happy to see good performances by any athlete .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well . I think that the most amazing performances are by athletes who participate in the Paralympics .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Now there we are in agreement !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hi ! How are you going ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Fine , thank you . How are you doing this morning ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Not bad . How about you ? Haven't seen you for a long time .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes . I've been to New York . I got back only yesterday .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Did you enjoy yourself ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Very much . New York is such a nice place . Shall I show you some photographs ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thanks , I like looking at photographs . How nice ! Oh , I'm afraid I must be going now . I've got an appointment . Have a good day .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You too . I hope to see you soon . Goodbye .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Goodbye .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What a busy week !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Really ! I've never seen so much work .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Right . How are you going to spend your weekend ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I don't know . I have no idea .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Would you like to play some tennis with me before going home ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm not good at sports , I have never played tennis , and I know I would be terrible .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You should try it . It ' s a great game . Come on , let me help you . I'm a good player , and a good teacher , too . What do you say ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: OK , but don't say I didn't warn you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That was a pretty good shot , Mary .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thanks . This is fun !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Let me help you with your serve .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No one has ever tried to show me how to play a sport before . Maybe I should learn to do something .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Of course , you can . All you need is a little help and a lot of practice .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Do you really think I can be a good player ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , maybe not a Michael Zhang , but better than the average . Person would you like to play again Wednesday ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes . This has been fun .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hi , Lucy !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hi . It ' s a wonderful wedding , isn't it ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , It's very great .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Mary's father is a rich man , isn't he ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You are right , Mary's father is responsible for the entire wedding-arrangement , costs , etc . I think he must spend much money .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Will Mary and her husband be ready to leave for their honeymoon ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes . Look ! Mary is going to throw the bride bouquet .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , I'll try to catch it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: ... Now that we have been over the gory details of our disastrous first quarter , Ed ! Give us some good news . How are things looking for us in terms sales this month ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Uh well ... would you like the bad news first or the really bad news ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What ? Ed , don ' t tell me you only have bad news !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well sir , our sales have dropped , no plunged , fifty percent in the past month alone . We are currently overstocked and overstaffed and our profits refalling fast . The market is in recession and we have no way of moving our inventory , or getting rid of our staff . If we consider redundancies , it would cost us a fortune because of the new regulations governing compensation packages . It ' s a real mess .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: For crying out loud ... How fast are we losing money ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Um ... how can I put this ? Let ' s just say that at this pace , we will be filing for Chapter eleven in less than three months .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What ! Geez ! How could this have happened ? So what ' s the bad news ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , that ' s the really bad news . Our supplier suffered QC problems and , well , half of our production is faulty . We ' re going to have to recall all itemssold in the last quarter . And the worst part ? We ' re going to have to shoulder this cost .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Are you joking ? Get the supplier on the line now ! They have to assume the costs of this mess !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: We tried that , sir . The factory has gone under and the owner apparently has fled the country .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: We ' re doomed !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: There is some really good news though !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Really ? What !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I got offered a new job !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Dalian is a beautiful city . Do you agree ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I suppose I do .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: The climate here is pleasant .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You said it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: This city is really comfortable to living .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It sure is .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: No other city can match it . It's heaven .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , If you live in other as long enough you love them just as much .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Maybe .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hi , Jason !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hi , Linda . I have two concert complimentary tickets . Will you go with me tonight ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: With the greatest pleasure ! Where is the concert held this evening ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It will be held at the Central Music Hall .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What is on the program ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It ' s a piano solo . I'm fond of piano , you know .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hah ! OK . Let ' s go together !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Let ' s meet at the park at 6:00 .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: See you then .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Cheer !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Cheer !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: So what time tomorrow ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Half past seven in the morning .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Where to meet ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: In the market .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: OK . Bottoms up .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Bottoms up .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It's on me .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you . This place is nice .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hi ! Susan ! I haven't seen you for ages !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I've been really busy . How is everything ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , fine . Hey , why don't we grab a bite to eat and do some catching up ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yeah , why not ? I've got a little free time on my hands . Where do you want to eat ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , God . It ' s late . I ' m afraid I have to leave .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: But you just got here . Can ' t you stay a little longer and have some tea ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That ' s very kind of you . But if I don ' t go now I ' ll miss the last bus .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That ' s too bad .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thank you for your hospitality .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thanks for coming .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How about next time we meet at my place ? And I ' ll treat you to Chinese food . I know how much you like it . We can order in and watch video too . Anything you like , I promise .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Great idea . I ' m looking forward to it . See you then .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well . I really do have to go .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Good night then .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: See you tomorrow .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hi , Alice , what are you doing this sunday .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Nothing really , why , what ' s up ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: If you are free , maybe you can get having for my birthday party , it should be fun .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sounds great , i ' d very much like having something thanks , when ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Around six pm .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Do you need help setting up or anything ? I don't mind . I like to do that kind of thing . It's fun and I have a good eye for decorating .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: No . thank you . I can handle it , but thanks for the offer .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Ok , I will see you again .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Great . I have a good day , thanks again for the offer .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Why don't you have dinner with me tonight ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'd love to .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Let's say about 6:00 ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That's OK with me .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I don't know what I'm going to do . I need to find a job . If I don't , I won't be able to stay here next semester .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Have you tried university part-time jobs ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What do you mean ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I mean in the library , or in some information center . Often the university hires foreign students for part-time positions .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , I know . I tried that . They don't have anything now . So what can I do ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , since you're a foreign student , it's hard . That ' s because it's actually illegal for you to work in America .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I know that . You don't have to tell me that . That's my problem . I know I have the right to work for the university . That's legal . But they don't have a job for me . And it's illegal for me to get a job elsewhere .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Anyway , there must be some solution . You know there are many people working illegally in New York .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: But I need a pretty decent job . I need to make enough to pay my rent at least .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I have an idea .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Since you're Chinese , maybe you can find part-time work in Chinatown .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I already had that idea .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , why don't you go and look down there ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: But I don't know what I would do .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It may be part-time work as a waitress or something . It would be illegal , but sometimes waitresses make a good salary .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Maybe . I don't know .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I will ask my friends for you . Maybe someone knows a company that needs part-time people . That ' s another thing you should do . Ask all your friends to ask around for you . You might find something .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I have to find something . Otherwise I have to go back to Taiwan . I'll be broke in two months .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Where did you get your mobile ? It's really cute .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , this ? I got it in Singapore . Here , do you want to take a look ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thanks . Gee , it's really light !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , it is , isn't it ? A bit too light , really . What make have you got ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I've got an old Ericsson . Here . Take a look .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Wow , that's really old .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , I like collecting antiques .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Why don't you get a new one ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I don't know . I like this one , and I don't have any need for all the bells and whistles you get on the new ones .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Really , what makes you say that ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , I just need to make and receive calls , and it's quite reliable . I find that the more fancy stuff they put into these things , the more likely they are to break bown or go wrong , you know ? I mean , this camera function , for instance-how often do you use it ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sometimes , but I guess not very often . It's more for fun . Sometimes when I'm on a trip , for example , I can take a picture and send it to my kids . Or I can send a picture of a sample back to my office and get it costed up immediately .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , that's nice I guess . So how many kids do you have ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Three . Two boys and a girl .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Happy birthday , Ms . Lin . Here is a present for you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , thank you ! It's very kind of you . Ah , it is a porcelain vase .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I hope you like it .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , it is lovely . I have been expecting something like this for a long time . Thanks ever so much .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I am glad you like it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I really should be on my way .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , don ' t go yet . Let ' s at least have one more .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: No , thank you . I can ' t .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It ' s too bad that you have to leave so early .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thank you very much . I had a really good time .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thanks for coming ! We should meet again sometime soon .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That would be great ! Actually , can I get your phone number , Ella ? That ' s assuming you don ' t mind if I call you sometime .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Anytime . You can reach me 5558929 .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: ok , got it . I ' ll call you sometime next week .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Fine .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It ' s time to go and I hope we can get together again soon .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I hope so , too . Bye ! Ben .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Merry Christmas , Lily .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: The same to you , Joey .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: This is your first Christmas in the US . Here is the gift for you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It's very thoughtful of you . Wow , it is so beautiful . Could you tell me how American people celebrate Christmas ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Ok . People decorate their houses , place a Christmas tree in the room and maybe sing a Christmas carol together .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Have you been ever been to Disneyworld ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: When I was young , my parents took me to the one in California . I always forget which -- is that one Disneyland or Disneyworld ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: The one in Florida is Disneyworld and the one in California is Disneyland , so you must have been to Disneyland .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That's right . Why do you ask ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , I've never been to either so I was thinking of going to Disneyworld for my honeymoon .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: When are getting married ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Some time next year . We haven't set the date yet .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Congratulations ! I had no idea .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thank you . So what do you think ? Would we have a good time ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Do you like amusement parks ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: For the most part , yes . Some of the rides are bit too scary for me , though .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: If you don't think twice about the rides and go on every ride that you can , you'll have a good time .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Even the roller coasters that go through tunnels in the dark ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Even those . It'll be very romantic , I think . You'll have loads of fun .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thanks for the advice . I'll talk to my fiance about it tonight .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm sure he'll love the idea . Just throw yourself into it and you'll enjoy it !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Are you going to the movie theater with me tonight ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Is there anything good playing ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Titanic is playing tonight . It's a blockbuster .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Really ? I want to go , too .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: OK , let's meet at the movie theater entrance tonight . Don ' t be late .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No problem .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: ( After watching the movie . ) Are you crying ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I get a lump in my throat whenever I see a tragic movie .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Tragic movie ? I think it's a love story .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: But their love is touching !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Ah , you're just too emotional .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I am not !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Steven , would you like to go dance with us tonight ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: John , I am just not in the mood for this .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You look so upset . What's going on ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I lost the table tennis game yesterday .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , what a pity !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I just don ' t want to play table tennis any more .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Is it that bad ? It ' s nothing more than a game .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: My opponent bowled me with the very first ball . I was wondering if it's appropriate for me to play table tennis .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , come on ! Failure is the mother of success . Don ' t lose heart . I'm sure you'll succeed .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Perhaps you are right . But I still need some time to recover from the failure .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I understand .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm going to the store downtown this afternoon to try on my wedding dresses .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh my gosh , how exciting !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Will you come with me and help me choose ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sure , I will . How can I miss that ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Good . I think I'll get too nervous to look at myself in the mirror !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , don't . I'm sure you'll be the loveliest bride ever !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hi , Mr . James , what's the rush ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: The bank closes in 30 minutes and I need to cash a check .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I can lend you some money .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thanks . But it's necessary for me to buy a TV set .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Can I help in anyway ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You can take me to the bank if you want to .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Sure . Let ' s go .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What's wrong ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I have a headache . These past few days I've been living off painkillers . Man , I feel like my head is going to explode .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You should get acupuncture treatment . My mom was always having headache issues and it was acupuncture that cured her .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: The results are too slow . On top of that , just the thought of smoking needles poking into my flesh frightens me .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: They don't just randomly stick you , they find your pressure points . The heat allows the body to immediately respond to the treatment , restoring the body's " chi " .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: But I get scared the moment I see a needle . How could I stand having needles in my body for hours on end ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: The needles are very thin , and as long as the doctor's technique is good , and the patient himself is relaxed , it won't hurt-on the contrary it will actually alleviate pain . Now there are high-tech needles that are micro thin ; they don't hurt at all . However , if you are really scared of acupuncture , scraping or cupping are also options .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Scraping is too terrifying . When they finish scrapping , your body is all red , as if you were just tortured . Cupping is the same , your body ends up with red circles all over . It looks like someone beat you up .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: This only signifies that the toxins have left the body . Actually , there is only discomfort during the treatment process . Once it's over you feel very comfortable .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Chinese medicine is strange . The patients are already ill , and then the doctor makes them suffer more .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: This is the only way to get at the problem . Anyway , if you want to relieve the pain , you are just going to have to be tough and do it .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Forget it . I don't want to inflict any more pain on myself . In a little while I'll go and buy some more painkillers and take a nap .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Betty , would you please read this letter of application I've just written ? I'd like to have your opinion .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'd be glad to tell you what I think .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Good ! I'm interested in your advice .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: If I were you , I would change the beginning . You should write about your education first because we like to judge a man by his abilities .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Good idea , Betty . What would you think about the second part ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I think it's too short . You'd better say something about your work experience .

utterances.speaker: A
