utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , we do .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: The performance is excellent .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It's a new concert hall and the acoustics are great .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I couldn't agree more .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Is this your first time to come to a symphony concert ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , it is .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Do you have concert halls in your city ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , but it's much smaller .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , we'd better get back to our seats . It's about to start .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: OK .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Mary , it seems that your family and friends have been calling you recently , am I right ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , they have been concerned about me finding a job .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What do they say ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: They want to recommend some jobs to me .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Really ? What jobs are they ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: My father wants me to work as a trainee in his company .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It's great !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: My aunt says her company is in need of an assistant now , and she wants me to give it a try .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: This is a good opportunity .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: One of my friends tells me that his company is hiring in a large scale and he wants me to go for an interview .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You can give it a try ! May be you will succeed .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I know . Let me think it over .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: If you have any good jobs , keep an eye for me !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I will .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You're spending a very long time on my hair .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm almost done .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I needed you to be done and finished an hour ago .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm all done now .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Are you sure you're finished ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I don't understand .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You did a horrible job on my hair .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What's wrong with it ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I don't like anything about it .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I apologize .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That's fine , but I'm not paying for it .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Excuse me ? Let's try to work this out , okay ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: May I ask what the name is the girl ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Which one ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: The tallest one .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: She is Miao Li . She's come here to see her brother .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , it's so . She looks very lovely . Could you give me some else information on her ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: OK . She's a costume designer and works in a garment mill .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How do you think about her ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: She looks very beautiful . She is a nice girl .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm wondering if she has boyfriend .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No , she hasn't .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Great ! Thank you very much .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hello , this is Rich .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hi , Rich . Is Jim here ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: He ' s not in at the moment . Can I take a message ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sure . This is Claire .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Does have your telephone number ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No , it ' s 3725019281 , it ' s a 9 , not a 5 .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Right . I ' ll have him call you back .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Can you tell him that it ' s urgent ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Sure can .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thanks a lot .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: No problem .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Bye .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Goodbye .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Excuse me ! I don't have time to waste . I've been here almost one full hour !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sorry , madam . You have to wait your turn . The parking lot is full .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Unbelievable ! Parking in this city is such a nightmare !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Madam , patience is a virtue .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , gosh ! I have to go to the restroom so bad ! I can't bear it anymore !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm sure a spot will open up soon .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , look ! There's a spot open next to the public restroom ! Can I take it ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hello , Tom . I'm really glad to meet you here .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm glad too . Steven , I want to tell you that I'm going to divorce my wife .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm so surprised , B . Why did you decide to end your marriage suddenly ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: We don't get along well with each other and fight a lot .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I didn't know that . I thought that you were happy together .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That isn't true . Actually , we have been separated for six months .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I can't believe it . But if you both determine to divorce , I hope you will have an amicable split .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you , Steven . I accept your advice .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Listen , Christine , you can not afford another day off . You ' Ve called in sick five times in the last three weeks .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I know , Mr . Douglas . But I am really sick .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , I want a note from the doctor on this one . And , to be honest , if this continues , we may not be able to employ you here .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I understand , sir . I ' ll bring a doctor ' s note in tomorrow . I am sorry , Mr . Douglas .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I heard you received a prize for you book .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: yes , I did . I won a prize for best local history book at the annual book awards .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: congratulations ! You must be very proud of your achievement .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: actually , I was happy just to get the book published . Winning the prize was an added bonus .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: what was the prize ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I won $ 200 to spend on any books of my choice .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: that ' s a great prize for a person who writes books ! Have you ever won a prize before ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I shared a prize with some friends last week . We won a bottle of whisky at a pub quiz .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I won $ 10 in the lottery last month . Perhaps next time , I ' ll be luckier and win the jackpot !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: have you bought a present for jim ' s birthday yet ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: no , I haven ' t . I can ' t think of anything to get him .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I ' m having the same problem . I want to get something really special . Jim always seem to know exactly what to get people as gifts .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I know . He bought me that beautiful sweater for my birthday . It was exactly what I wanted . And it fit me perfectly !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: he bought me an iron .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: that doesn ' t sound like a great present .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: maybe not , but my iron was getting old . In fact , it stopped working the week after jim bought me the new one . It ' s as if he knew that my old iron would soon stop working !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: let ' s think . He loves football , doesn ' t he ? I saw signed photographs of famous footballers in a shop near hear . Let ' s go and have a look . You know which team he supports , don ' t you ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: yes , I do . Let ' s go . We should be able to find something suitable . We should get him something old ... something historic .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: it ' ll be an expensive present , but we can share the cost .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I ' ll be happy to get him something special , even if it coasts a little extra .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: yes . He always get us special gift . We should repay his kindness .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: The concert was really great .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I agree .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: The singing group used to be very popular .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I can't believe they would play so good .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Why do you look so gloomy ? What are you looking for ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: My dissertation . I put it somewhere last night and I can't find it now .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Did you finish typing it yesterday ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , I kept on typing it until midnight , but it is lost .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Don't worry about it . It must be somewhere in your room . Let's see where you put it . Have you searched your drawers and the desk ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , but there is nothing inside the drawers or on the desk .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How about the shelf ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I've searched everywhere . Where on earth did I put it ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Don't get upset over it . At least you have another week to go .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I have been working on it for a whole month and it's too late to write another . Just think of all my hard work that goes for nothing . How could I do such a thing ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Cheer up ! What I meant was that you can find it sometime during a week . There is no need to write a new one . Oh , what's this ? Is this your dissertation ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Let me see . Yes , that's it . Where did you find it ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You ' Ve put it among these journals .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: My poor memory . Thank you very much .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hey , Susie , what health club do you belong to ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Total Fitness , why ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , I ' Ve been going to Athletic Express , but I don ' t like it there .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Really ? Why not ? I hear it ' s pretty good .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: The people don ' t really work out there . They just stand around and talk all the time .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , it ' s one of those places .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yeah , is your club different ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , they have different rooms . I lift weights by the pool where there aren ' t so many people .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Do they have a lot of equipment ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yeah , they have all the machines , a pool , and a steam room and sauna .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Sounds nice . What about classes ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: The usual . Aerobics , kickboxing , yoga . They just started a Tai Chi class too .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Wow , that sounds great .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , I have a guest pass . Why don ' t you come with me tonight ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Really ? Thanks . I ' ll stop by when I get off work .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Perfect . See you later .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: O . K . , see you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hello , Jack ! Fancy meeting you here !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , it's really a surprise . How are you ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Fine . How is Jim ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , he is all right . But busy as usual . Well , why don't we have a good chat at a bar ? It's been long time since we met each other last time .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Good idea !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Can I help you , Madam ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes . I'd like to buy a sweater for my husband . Which style is the latest ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: These are all the latest fashion . How do you like this white turtleneck one ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I like this style . But do you have any other colors ? I feel that this color doesn't suit his complexion .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: We also have it in grey .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Great ! I will take it . And could you suggest a pair of trousers to match this sweater ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It's my pleasure . I think this pair of jeans will suit the sweater well .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Let me see . Yes , they are perfectly matched !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Congratulations ! Mr . Stuart ! You won the city marathon .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you . I am very excited .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: We are all very proud of you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I am very happy , too . It was a big game and I won .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I watched the race with my children . We saw you run to the finish line . We all screamed with excitement .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It was really an exciting moment .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Who's that striking woman over there ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hm ? Oh , that's Alice . She's totally mad . Don't get yourself in a room alone with her .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Really ? Why not ? She looks great .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , I know , but she's dangerous .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Really ? Tell me more .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , I'm not one to gossip , as you know , but rumor has it that she sued her former boss for sexual harassment .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Wow , crikey . So what happened ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , this is just between ourselves , of course , but he was her lover and he wanted to leave her , so she got revenge . I heard him say she was a dangerous woman .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Wow .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , while we're on the subject , what happened to you and your secretary ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I have no idea what you're talking about .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , come on . Everybody knows .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Could you excuse me a moment ? I have to make a phone call

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , sure .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It's very cold tonight !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Can I get you another blanket ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: 0h , that would be nice of you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'll turn the heat up .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , please do that .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Are you alright , Ethan ? You don't seem to be as cheerful as you normally are .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: To be honest , Ava , I've just had a really bad day .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What happened ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: First , I slept through my alarm and ended up two hours late to work .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What did your boss say ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: He told me that if I showed up late one more time , he'd fire me . He's so mean !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That's horrible . Was that the first time you'd shown up late to work ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That was my second time . The first time , I was in a car accident .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Is your boss Chinese ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No , he's from Australia . Before I met him , I thought Australians were supposed to be relaxed and easy-going . I had no idea he'd be so fussy about things .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What are you going to do ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I think I'm going to look for another job . I need to find a boss that is a bit more sensitive and optimistic than my current boss .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That sounds like a sensible plan . Do you want me to help you with your job search ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That's very generous of you . Thanks for the offer .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Don't mention it . That's what friends are for !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You are late .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm sorry , it was too cold , and my car couldn't start . I had one to the garage with the heater . I tried to call you , but you couldn't get connection .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Couldn't get connection ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , your number is out of service .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Really ? I didn't know . Let me check . You're right .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: So I couldn't get through .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It's a serious problem . I make expecting an important call . The theater is guilty . It supposed to call me this evening , and discuss my play . What were happened if they can't reach me ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , the only thing you can do is pay the fee to recover your service .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I need to find a new place to live .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yeah ? Why ? Don ' t you like living with me ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , it ' s not you . I just want my own place .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , check the newspaper .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Jeez ... I didn ' t realize a single bedroom apartment went for so much these days .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yeah , prices have really gone up the past couple of years .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , here ' s one . It ' s looks like its in this neighborhood , $ 600 a month . That ' s not to bad .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No , it ' s pretty good . Why not give the landlord a call ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hello . I ' m calling about the one bedroom in Lincoln Park . Could I take a look at it ? Yes . Tonight at six is fine . Thanks .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I feel pity for the old man .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I feel the same way .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It must be dreadful to grow old .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It sure is . He has no one to turn to , very miserable indeed .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Guess what ? I've got great news !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What is it ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , you know how I've been working at the Economist as a proof-reader , right ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , the editor-in-chief heard that I had experience as an editor at another magadize and asked me if I was interested in becoming an assistant editor for him .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Really ? That's fantastic ! Will you get a chance to do any writing ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: She said that the columnist for the literary criticism column would be going on pregnancy leave soon and that I could be in charge of the column until she came back .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Wow ! That's really great news . How often does the magazine come out ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It's a monthly magazine , but my column will be shared with another columnist so my articles will be due fortnightly .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Are you looking forward to doing more editing work ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , but I'm even more excited about getting my thoughts published again !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Do you have any order forms here so that I can get a subscription to the magazine ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I don't have any with me , but I think I could manage to bring a free copy home for you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm really looking forward to reading your column .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Me , too . Do you want to go out to celebrate my good news ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sure , where would you like to go ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Perhaps we could go to the library festival that's going on at the local bookshop .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thanks a lot for having us . We had a good time .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm glad you came . You're welcome anytime .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thanks . By the way , tell your wife she throws a great party .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I will . See you later .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Bob , put on your shoes , your feet are really smelly .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No foot gives out scent .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: But don't forget you are in a cafe .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Never mind , the odour of my feet will quicken their eating speed .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I simply can't bear your barbaric behavior .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Don ' t pretend you are a good God .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You should feel shameful for your behavior .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I've never experienced such a kind of feeling .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm really sick of you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hello ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hi , Shelley . Have you had lunch ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Not yet .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: So shall we have lunch together ? I ' d like to take you this time .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I ' d like to , but I can ' t .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: How come ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I ' Ve a lot of paper work to do right now . I ' m behind schedule .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: All right . Can we make it another time ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Sure , thanks .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I ' ll call you later . Bye .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Bye .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I ' d like to take this opportunity to thank you for everything you did for me .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It ' s my pleasure . I enjoyed working with you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I wouldn ' t be able to make it without your help .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Then keep up the good work .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Mr . Bryant ? Hi , I'm Mike from Florence Incorporated . I'll glad you made it okay . How was your flight ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It was pretty bumpy , also a bit long , all together about 5 hours .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That is a long flight . You had a layover too , is that right ? You must be tired .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Actually I feel quite rested . I was able to sleep on the plane .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Good ! Here , let me help you with your bag . Is it your first time to Seattle ? I'd be happy to take you around this city and show you the sights tonight if you're up to it .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That will be very nice . You're too kind .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I've already made a hotel reservation for you , let's go to the hotel first and drop off your things . Then , I'd like to have a drink so that we can get better acquainted . I've booked a table at an exclusive restaurant downtown . Afterwards , I've made arrangements to take you to see the city lights . Seattle ' s nightlife can be really quite exciting . How does that schedule sound to you ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sounds great . Thank you for your hospitality .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I can't stand the stupid guy any longer . It ' s unbelievable !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , my dear lady . Take it easy . You should forgive a green hand like him .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: He does everything so mindlessly that he is going to drive me crazy .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I suggest you talk with him and teach him how to deal with the problems .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I have told him how to do it several times , but he's never listened to me .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Maybe you should communicate with him just like a friend and not a boss .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , I always have difficulty in getting along with the staff .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Just take them for your good friends and have a talk with them as we do , make sure you don't lose your temper .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I think that's a bad idea . I'd hate anyone here to think of me as a friend . How would they ever respect me as they can do whatever they want ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I disagree . All you have to do is respect the staff and their opinions .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Excuse me , is this the way to the Great Wall ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , it is really far from here . You ' re going in the wrong direction actually .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I must have taken a wrong turn .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It doesn ' t matter . Go back the way you came . After about five kilometers , you ' ll see a hotel on the side of the road . It ' s a big one . You can ' t miss it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: And then ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Take the next right . Drive about one click further , and you ' ll see the entrance of the highway to the Great Wall .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thanks a lot .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You ' re welcome .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: By the way , how long does it take ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Without traffic , it takes about an hour .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I heard the Great Wall closes early in the afternoon . Do you think I can make it before closing ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , I think so . It doesn ' t close until 5 o ' clock . You still have plenty of time .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Great ! Thank you !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: My pleasure , and have a good time !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hello , ma ' am . Can I help you ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I ' m looking for a sweater .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What size are you looking for ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , I ' m looking for size 10 but you don ' t have it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How about this one ? I think it looks terrific on you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , I like the color . Can I try it on ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Sure . The fitting room is on your right .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It fits well . I like it a lot . What do you think ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You look pretty in red .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , it ' s my favorite . How much is it ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Okay . I ' ll take it . Thank you very much for your help .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You ' re welcome .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yeah , I ' Ve just moved here , and I ' d like to activate my cell phone , and I ' m not sure if I should go with a prepaid plan , or a monthly rate plan .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I see . Well , can I have a look at your phone ? Unfortunately , this phone can ' t be used in the US . it ' s not compatible with our 3G network .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What ? Really ? I don ' t really want to have to buy a new phone .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , you ' re in luck ! You see , if you sign up for our three-year plan , we ' ll throw in a handset for free .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Really ? What ' s the catch ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: There ' s no catch ! You just choose a plan , sign a three-year contract and , that ' s it ! Actually , we ' re running a special promotion right now , and we ' regiving away a Blackberry Curve with our special Mega Value forty dollar plan .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: So what does this plan include ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , you get nine hundred anytime minutes , and you can also enjoy free mobile to mobile calling to other Tel-Mobile clients , one thousand text messages per month , and unlimited evening and weekend minutes . Oh , and we also offer a rollover option .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Wow , all this for forty dollars per month ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That ' s right , plus the activation fee , the emergency services fee , the monthly service fee , oh , and any charges for extra minutes , and ...

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Ahem ... uh , sir , I beg your pardon ... Uh , mister , are you waiting to buy a ticket for the movie ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What's it look like , lady ? This is the ticket line I'm standing in , isn't it ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , yes , it is , but ...

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: So , what's your beef anyway , lady ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You just cut into line , in front of me and everyone else , that's what ! Go take your place back at the end of the line , like every - one else !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh sure , lady , and fat chance I'd get a ticket before they're sold out . I'm staying right here , understand ? So be a nice lady and butt out !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Just what gives you the right ... ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Because I'm no sucker ; only suckers go to the end of the line . It's as simple as that , lady .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , you're no gentleman , either .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Okay , lady , just to show what a gentleman I really am , I'll let you go in front of me . Now , just buy your ticket and shut your trap , will you , lady ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Whew ! I got the last one . This must be my lucky day !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What was that you just said ? Last one ... ? Hey , they've closed the ticket window !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , I'm afraid I bought the last ticket , and to think , if you hadn't been such a gentleman . . .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Lady ! This is unfair ! I've been cheated ! I was in line before you . That should have been my ticket ! Come on , hand it over , lady !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Gentleman ! Hah ! Fat chance ! Hah ! Eat your heart out , sucker ! Hah !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What's wrong , officer ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You do realize that you ran a red light , don't you ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I did ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You didn't see the red light ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm sorry for running it , but I really didn't know .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Didn't you learn that red means stop ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I know that .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Then tell me why you sped up on the yellow light .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm not sure .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm giving you a ticket for this .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm sorry for the misunderstanding .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Maybe you'll think about this before you decide to run another light .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: All the food smells tasty today and makes my mouth water .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Let's line up here . This line seems a little shorter .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What's on the menu today ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Fish , beef , pork , chicken , vegetables and beancurd . For staple food we have rice , steamed bread , stuffed buns and noodles .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , we're lucky today , aren't we ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'd rather take stewed cabbage with beef .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I think I'll take fried fish , because fish is one of my favorites .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That's good , we can share what we have . Here we are . You go ahead .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: ( They get everything ready ) Here is a free table . Let's sit down . Help yourself to some fish please . Isn't it delicious and appetizing ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm sorry I don't like it's a little too salty .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I see . You people from south prefer sweet , don't you ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , I like the fish cooked in sweet and sour sauce best . Try some beef , please .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thank you . I'm through with one steamed bread and I'd like a second helping .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Your appetite is good .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm always feeling hungry .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hi ! Is that the new laptop you brought last week ? It looks very nice .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , it is . Thanks . I ' m just surfing on the internet .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Here ? In this cafe ? How can you do that ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: This cafe offers a wireless internet connection . That means I can get on the net for free while I ' m here . Of course , I have to buy a cup of coffee !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That ' s great . Can you do it anywhere ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No . you can only do it when the cafe offers a wireless connection . There are only about 10 or 12 places that offer it in this city .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: So , what programs do you have on your laptop ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I ' Ve got all the usual ones for word processing and then I have a few for creating and editing photographs .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I know you are keen on photography . It ' s very useful for you to be able to download photos from your digital camera . Then you attach the picture files to emails and send them to anyone , anywhere , at a

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It ' s wonderful , isn ' t it ? Would you like to see some photos that I took recently ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Good morning .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Good morning . This is Mary . Can I speak to Anne please ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I ' m sorry She isn ' t in at the momment . She will come back at half past nineCan I take a message for her ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you . But I will call her later

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: OK . Goodbye .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Goodbye .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Honey , the house is such a mess ! I need you to help me tidy up a bit . My boss and her husband are coming over for dinner and the house needs to be spotless !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I ' m in the middle of something right now . I ' ll be there in a second .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: This can ' t wait ! I need your help now !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Alright , alright . I ' m coming .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Ok , here ' s a list of chores we need to get done . I'll do the dishes and get all the groceries for tonight . You can sweep and mop the floors . Oh , and the furniture needs to be dusted .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You know what , I have to pick something up at the mall , so why don ' t you clean the floors and I'll go to the supermarket and get all the groceries .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Sure that ' s fine . Here is the list of all the things you need to get . Don't forget anything ! And can you pick up a bottle of wine on your way home ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hey , honey I ' m back . Wow , the house looks really good !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Great ! Can you set the table ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Just a sec I ' m just gonna vacuum this rug real fast .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Wait ! Don ' t turn it on ...

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Good morning , May . Good girl , you are reading English books again .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Good morning . There is no reason to miss so beautiful a morning . Is that a new bird ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , yes , my daughter bought it yesterday . We call her Lulu .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It looks so cute . Is it a parrot ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes . Just look at her colorful feathers . What else can it be ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I see . It's interesting that there is also a parrot in my English book . His mane is Polly .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Really ? A foreign parrot !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: He can speak English , too .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Maybe you can teach Lulu some English words .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Lulu . Lulu . Say hello . hello . Oh , she is so smart . Good bird .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Bob , can I talk to you for a minute ? There have been some developments for the Stewart case that I really need to talk to you about .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yeah , what's the matter now ? We've had so much trouble with this case already . Don't tell me there's more bad news .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , I'm afraid there is . I have some bad news for you about the results of the forensic tests ... there won't be any results .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What ? What does that mean ? Why won't there be any results ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I hate to tell you this , but it seems that every shred of evidence that would help us to convict were destroyed in a laboratory fire . There's nothing left . I'm so sorry ...

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , no , you can't be serious . I never expect anything like this would happened . What are we going to do ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: There's nothing that can be done . Everything is gone . I wish I could tell you differently , but what has happened has happened . We will just have to figure out a way to move on .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: So , Casey , how are things going with the photos for the press kit ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yeah , I ' Ve been meaning to talk to you about that . I might need to ask for an extension on that deadline .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You ' Ve had over a month to get this finalized ! Why are things delayed ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , the thing is , we ran into a lot of problems . . .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I ' m not looking for excuses here . I just want to get this finished on time !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I know , and I apologize for the delay . But some things were just beyond my control . I had trouble booking the photographer , and then Michael was sick for three weeks , so I couldn ' t include him in the photos , and the design team lost all the files , so I had to re-do the pictures .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I ' m not going to put this off any longer , Casey ! I want those photos ASAP !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It's a beautiful day ! Let's play on those rides in the park .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sounds like a good idea . I love to play on the jungle gym .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Me too . I love to play on the swing as well . Swing is my favorite .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That's great . Then we won't fight over taking the same ride .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Look at the flowers over there . What are they ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: They are morning glories . They are cute , aren't they ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: They are . We can find many different kinds of flowers and insects in the park .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I think so . Last time I saw dandelions and ladybugs near the pond .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: If you come to the park in the morning , you can find squirrels running on the lawn .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It's really healthy to do some exercise there . The air is fresher and it's romantic to watch the sunset with your lover .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , off we go . I am sure we can have a great time .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Won't you have some of this ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , thanks .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It's my grandmother's favorite recipe for barbecue .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It's very good . How do you make it ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I use a special dressing and homemade catsup .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: This salad looks so nice-just right for a hot day .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm glad you like it .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You Americans usually have nutritious food .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , but Chinese food is so delicious . I wish I knew how to cook Chinese food . Do you follow recipes ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: We use different spices but few people use recipes . They learn to cook by experience .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I always use a recipe but my grandmother never did . She was a great cook . She would make clam chowder and cornbread every Sunday night .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh hi , Linda , this is Todd .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , Todd , how nice to hear your voice !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Linda , I just wanted to say that I had a wonderful evening with you last Friday .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I really enjoyed our evening together , Todd .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I had fun also and was wondering if you would like to go hiking with me in the mountains on Saturday .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hiking would be perfect ! May I bring along a picnic lunch for us to share ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: A picnic lunch would be a nice thing to have along .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'll work on the lunch , and you can work out the details of where we will go . What time will you be at my house ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Nine would be good , don't you think ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Nine is good . See you on Saturday !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Good afternoon , madam . Is there anything I can do for you ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , I spent so much time sightseeing here . It is already so late now . I am afraid I can't catch the last bus back to downtown .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Don't worry . I will try to get a taxi for you . You can take it to the bus station .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I am very grateful to your help .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Don't mention it . It is my duty .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thanks again .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hi , are you being helped ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No , I'm not . I am interested in some scarves .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: All our scarves are in this section . What do you think of this one here ? It's made of silk .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hm , It looks nice , but I ' d like to have something warm for the winter .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Maybe you would like a heavy wool scarves . How about this one ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I think that's what I want . How much is it ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It's 75 dollars plus tax .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It's a little expensive . Do you think it's possible to get a discount ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Since you like it so much , how about a 10 % discount ? That's the best I can offer .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That's good . Could you wrap it for me ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Sure . Is there anything else I can get for you ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No , that should be it . Thank you !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Staying out all night , you frightened me to death .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I stayed with my friends .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You should at least give me a call .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm sorry , Mum .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: We have been over this a hundred times ! We are not getting a pet !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Why not ? Come on ! Just a cute little puppy or a kitty !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Who is going to look after a dog or a cat ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I will ! I ' ll feed it , bathe it and walk it every day ! We can get a Labrador or a German Shepard !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What if we want to take a vacation ? Who will we leave it with ? Plus , our apartment is too small for that breed of dog .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Ok . How about we get a cat or a ferret ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: We ' re planning on having children soon , I don ' t think those animals are a good idea with a baby in the house .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Fine ! Let ' s get a bird then ! We can keep it in its cage and teach it to talk ! A parrot would be awesome !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I ' ll tell you what , I can get you some hamsters and we ' ll take it from there .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yay !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thank you for organizing this great baby shower for me ! I ' Ve always been to baby showers but never actually had one held for me ! Let ' s get started !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Ok , let ' s start opening some presents !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh look ! What a great little bib for the baby ! This will definitely come in handy ! Oh wow , you also got me a stroller ! That ' s so great ! Thank you !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: This next one is from Betty .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: A highchair and car seat ! Wow Betty , thank you so much ! I really appreciate it !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: One more from Carla .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: A playpen and crib ! Thanks Carla ! This is just what I needed !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: OK , that ' s all of them . No more gifts . Now who wants to guess when the baby is due ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Umm . I think my water just broke ! Get me to a hospital !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I ' m hungry , let ' s go grab a bite to eat .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yeah me too . Oh ! Can we stop at the shop really fast ? I lost my makeup bag at the airport and I want to pick up a few things .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Will you take long ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No ! Five minutes I promise !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Come on ! We have been here for almost an hour ! I thought you said you were only going to get a few things ! How long does it take you to pick out a lipstick and some nail polish !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Are you crazy ? You have no idea what you are talking about ! Just for my eyes I have to get eye-liner , an eyelash curler , eye shadow , an eyebrow pencil and mascara . Then I need to get foundation , liq

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Whoa whoa whoa ! Are you nuts ? How much is all this going to cost ? I ' m looking at the price at each one of these little things and it ' s outrageous ! This is basically a crayon !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What about you ? You spend as much or more money on your razors , after shave , cologne and gel ! Not to mention how much you spend on clothes and ...

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Fine ! Get the stupid thirty dollar crayon !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Here's some flowers , love . Happy Valentine's Day .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Those are beautiful . They smell lovely . Thank you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: This is let you know that I still you after all this years . I knew there are some up and down when I married you , but through at all , you've always been may my Valentine .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , sweet . You've always been my love too .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I don't think I say this enough , but I want to thank you for your kind listen patience , you ' Ve always been there for me .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'll do everything for you , love . You know that , maybe you didn't realize , but you made everyday a enjoys moment and happy occasion .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I am so glad we met one another .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I think that you look very cute today .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Is that right ? This is a brand new outfit .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What store did you get it from ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I went to Macy's and picked it out .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I love your outfit right now .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , I think you look nice today too .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thanks . I found these new shoes earlier at the store .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I think that those are some really nice shoes . What kind are they ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: These are Chucks .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Your shoes look really nice . How much did you get them for ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: They only cost me about forty dollars .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm going to go get a pair for myself .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , I'm glad you're finally back . I was wondering what happened .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I feel kind of stupid .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Why ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: We got lost coming back . I guess I don't really know this town yet .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You got lost . You're kidding !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No . We took a wrong turn somewhere . And Joseph doesn't know the town at all . So I started giving him directions . But I didn't really know where we were . So we got seriously lost .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You could have called .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I know I could have . But finally we asked someone where we were .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You've been gone for two hours . How could you get lost for so long ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Guess where we ended up .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I don't know . Where ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: When we finally decided to ask someone , they told us we were in Grangerfield .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Grangerfield ! You were in Grangerfield ? That's a completely different town ! How could you drive to a completely different town ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I don't know . The person we asked had to give us directions to the highway to get back here .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Grangerfield is like a dozen miles away from here .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I know it is . I don't know how it happened .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hmm , maybe I do .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Maybe I have an idea how it happened .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: How ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You were too busy looking at Joseph , and you weren't paying attention to the road .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , that's what you think , huh ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , come on , Ultraman !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What's up , Bro ? What's in the bulletin ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It says that there will be a blackout from 5 p . m . to 7 p . m . in our neighborhood today .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Blackout ? Even the TV has the limit .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Don't you know you will look like a monster in the blackout ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oops , no , Daddy can't watch American Idol , either !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That's not the point . Come on , can you imagine that there will be no electricity on such a hot day ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , my god ! No air-conditioner !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: OK , since you are the smart one , can you come up with a better plan ? So that we won't be baked like cookies here .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: How about playing Barbie out there in the neighborhood ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Barbie ? You know , I might be seven , but I'm not a girl .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Do you have a better plan ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: All right , all right .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hey ! I just bought one of those new Japanese cell phones ! It's loaded with extras .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What does it do ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It's got a built-in video camera so you can see the person you're talking to . It also takes stills and I can use the E-mail mode to send digital pictures straight to my friend's phone !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Wow ! What else does it do ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I can plug it into a folding keyboard to type in message mode . l can even surf the net .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Cool ! Anything else ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes . With the 600 - second digital memory , l can record my voice and send it using voice message mode .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Wow !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You'll love this ! I can use a stylus to draw a map on the touch screen and then use the fax mode to send it to another phone .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hello . I sent out my laundry yesterday . Aren ' t they ready ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: They'll be ready by this afternoon .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , no ! I'm leaving for Japan at 11 this morning .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Is that right ? We're very sorry .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I thought it was " the same day " service . Anyway , please do hurry .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm afraid we can't return it by 11 o'clock .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , then , would you send it to Japan , please ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , we'll do so .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm very worried , doctor . I'm afraid that I'm very ill .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Why do you think so ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Because I feel tired all the time , even when I wake up in the morning . I find it very difficult to do any work . I have no appetite .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: How do you sleep ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Very badly , doctor .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Are you worried about anything ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , yes , I am . I'm worried about my work . I've just taken a new job . I earn a lot of money but it's difficult work . I'm always afraid of making a mistake .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , there's nothing much wrong with you . You're under too much pressure .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hi , Francis , how was your business trip ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It was a nightmare .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What ' s up ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Actually , the business trip itself was very successful . We arrived on time , we had nice conversations and we settled some important issues for the next year .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Sounds quite fruitful , why do you call it still a nightmare then ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , the air line lost my luggage on the return flight and then I lost my carry on bag when I was tackling with the officers in charge . I left the airport three hours later than I expected and then I was caught in a traffic jam . When I finally got home , I was totally exhausted . But I found the elevator was out of service due to a blackout .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: This is really a sad story . Did they trace back your luggage ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I am still waiting for their call .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Take it easy , all sufferings have their reward .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How slowly you drive !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm sorry . Something is wrong with my taxi .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Where does it go wrong ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Let me stop my car for check . Oh , my god . I got a flat tyre .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Can it keep going ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sorry . You'd better get off for taking another taxi .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I am a student in Cambridge University . I read your ad , I want to know something more about your room , please ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It's a big bedroom with a drawing room , facing a beautiful wood .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Is there a bathroom ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No , but there is one downstairs , which my daughter used some years ago .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It sounds good . Could I go and see it myself ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Certainly , you're welcome anytime .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: See you later !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: ( after a while ) Good afternoon , Mrs . Smith . I called you just now .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Welcome ! Come in , please !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: This way please . Your room is upstairs ... Here it is .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Wonderful ! A modest , comfortable room . Ah , a beautiful window , through which I can see a beautiful scene , and hear the birds singing . How nice !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , if you want to wash something , there is a separate lavatory room outside .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Excellent ! I like it ! When can I move in ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Anytime you like .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: OK .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What time is it ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Ten to nine .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Your watch is ten minutes slow . So it's should be nine sharp . I'm gonna be late again . What will be my excuse this time ? It should be set the alarm for seven thirty .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Don't cry over spilled milk , Fred ? Could you stay with me a few minutes ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What ? Why ? What's wrong with you ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I just hate being alone at home with nothing to do about listen to the clock ticking . It ' s so lonely and boring . My sickness makes it worse . When will I recover ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You will be fine in the couple of month , just be patient . I've got to woke now , I'll be late .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You only care about your work .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Sorry , baby , you are everything to me . all I do just for our family .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Stay just a few minutes longer , OK ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: OK , I'll leave at 9:15 , Is that all right ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'll spent more time with you in the future , Dina .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: My name is Mary , and I will be your waitress tonight .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you , Mary . We have been looking forward to trying out this restaurant .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Before your main course , would you like to order an appetizer ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sure , that sounds great . Where are your appetizers listed ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: There is a special appetizer menu right here in the center of the table .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: The chicken and cheese quesadilla looks good . Is that pretty good ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You know , that is one of my favorites !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: OK , I'll take one order of that .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You could choose another appetizer for half price to share .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Perfect ! Please add on an order of onion rings .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I was really glad to hear about your award . Congratulations !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thanks , Denise . Actually , I was really surprised . I mean , there were a lot of qualified people out there .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Sure . But the work you did was really exceptional ! You definitely deserved it !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thanks a lot . I expect to see your name nominated pretty soon , too . You ' Ve been doing some great work !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What would you have ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'll try Chinese wine .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What about this dry red ? It's good indeed , it never goes to the head .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: OK . Give me one , please .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Here it is .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm always at your service .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What are we going to do ? I can't get the car out of this ditch . I'm stuck !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm worried , Tom . I haven't seen any other cars for almost an hour .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I know . This is terrible . What can we do ? This snow doesn't stop falling !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I told you we should have stayed in town today . The weather report said 100 percent chance of snow . Why did you want to come up here ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I wanted to show you the cabin . We only had another half-hour to go .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , now we're stuck . What can we do ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I don't know .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I've heard that when this happens , it's important to save energy .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What do you mean ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: We're stranded here , Tom . We may be here a long time . We need to conserve the gas in the car . The car's energy is what will keep us warm .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I have plenty of gas .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , but the gas and the battery both have to stay working . We can't just let the car run and run . If we do , it will die soon . Then we'll freeze .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: So what can we do ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Turn the lights off . Then , run the car and the heater only about fifteen minutes every hour . That will conserve the heat as long as possible .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Alright . That's a good idea .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I wish we hadn't come up here . Now we'll probably be here for days .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Days ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , it happens . That is what happens in big snowstorms . People get stranded for days .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , my God ! It's good we have food .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Probably we'll survive . But turn the car off for about forty-five minutes . Then we'll turn it on again .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: what happened ? Why didn't he win ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: didn't you hear ? He was disqualified .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: how did that happen ? He's so talented ! I thought he had a great chance of winning a gold medal !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: if he didn't have any drug problems , he would have won .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: what ? What kind of drugs was he using ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: he was taking steroids to make him stronger and faster .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I thought that all athletes were supposed to be regularly tested for drugs .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: they are . The reason why they didn't disqualify him until after the race is because the results from the text only came back afterwards .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: that's so disappointing . I don't know why top athletes would feel the need to take drugs .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I don't think it's right , but I can understand why they might . Imagine how much pressure there would be to win for your country !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: regardless of how much pressure you're under , there's never a good reason to take drugs .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I agree . Hopefully with the new regulations , fewer athletes will try to cheat with drugs .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: let's hope so .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thank god you are open ! I have an emergency !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hello , Mr . Henderson what can I do for you ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I need this dress and this suit dry cleaned ASAP !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: OK , I can have it ready by the end of the week .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: No , you don ' t understand , I need this tomorrow morning ! I accidentally spilled beer all over my wife ' s dress and we have a wedding to attend tomorrow ! She ' s gonna kill me !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: OK , I can have it ready tomorrow afternoon , but this suit is also very stained . I can ' t guarantee we can remove it completely .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Fine ! Can you also iron and starch this shirt ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Certainly .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Great ! This is our secret ! If you see my wife , say nothing to her about this !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hi . I'm looking for a gift for my niece .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , little girls seem to love Barbie dolls .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That's perfect . I want to see one .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Here you are -- she's called Digital Barbie .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , I like Digital Barbie ! How much does she cost ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: This Barbie is only $ 29 . 95 .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That's perfect . Let me have her .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Very good . Is there anything else you would like ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: No , that'll do it for now .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Including tax , your total will be $ 32 . 42 . Cash or charge ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Let me give you cash , please .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Here's your change and receipt . Thank you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I've been so tired recently . I've been trying , but I don't think I'm up to this job .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You need to take a break , maybe a vacation .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , yes , indeed . I've run out of steam . To be honest , I want to be in a different environment .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Is that so ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , I don't want to be stuck in a rut . I want to move on .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Have you decided ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes . I want to get a better job .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Could you tell me why you want to quit ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I quit just because of the dissatisfying salary and the trouble in getting along with my colleagues .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , that's terrible . Do you want to get a higher salary in our company ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm afraid not . I've promised my girlfriend . We'll travel southwards to find a job that offers higher pay .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: OK , I'd like to say that I've really enjoyed working with you . However , I think you should work harder for your new job and then you can ask for higher pay .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thank you so much for your advice .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: And every best wish for your new job .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thank you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Guess what , Gilly ? I won both bids .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Good for you . Did you use Paypal ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yeah . It was so easy and super-fast , once I figured it out .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That's the beauty of it , and the danger .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I should get the items within a week . But in the meantime I'm bidding on a digital video camera .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: How much ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thirty U . S . dollars ... and it's only been used for six months .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Mmmm , sounds like risky business . Good luck .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Wow , this is amazing . I'm glad we've come here . So cool .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I always love skiing . You know , it's a cool game for cool people . Stay with me and you will be cool , too .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hey , look over there . It seems that there is something interesting going on . Let's go and have a look .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sure . It's probably the skiing show . Adam told me there were many skiing clubs whose members put on shows to attract more visitors .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: See that . It's so dangerous . My mom would never allow me to do that .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hey , don't be so pathetic . It's a maximal sports show . What else can they do to attract more visitors ? Stop all this fuss and enjoy the show .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You are right . But what if the avalanche happened ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: They are all very experienced and great skiers . So I suppose the chance for them to be buried by an avalanche is slim .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Anyway , the show is breathtaking . By the way , where did they get so much snow in here ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Don't you know that ? Are you kidding me ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hey , not everyone is as lucky as you to have a father who is a scientist .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sorry . Well , they have the most advanced snowmaking machine .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Do you think the snowmaking may cause pollution ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It's possible . But the boss here said they were doing whatever they can .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It's a good thing . OK , let's go skiing .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Here we go .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Am I ever hungry ? When will supper be ready ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It's almost ready . Can you set the table ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: All right .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Want to taste this dish ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yeah . Oh , it's delicious !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Really ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Definitely . It's a wonderful meal . Thank you , Honey .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: If you like to help me do the dishes , I'll be more dreadful .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I wish I could , but I won't .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Come on , fellows . Let's enjoy my wife's cooking !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Em , it's delicious !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thank you ! My wife likes cooking very much .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You're lucky .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thank you for purchasing your new mattress with us .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No , thank you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Would you like us to deliver the mattress for you , sir ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That would be great .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: When do you want it delivered ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I need it delivered tomorrow . Will that be possible ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What time exactly ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I need it delivered at 12 o'clock .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: We can have it to you at that time .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That's not a problem ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: We will deliver your mattress tomorrow at 12 o'clock .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That's great ! Thank you very much .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: The blake's got divorced .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Really ? Why ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Mr . black has been getting a little around aside .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm surprised . He does't look like a guy who'd ever cheat on his wife , does he ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: No , he doesn't . But his wife found out he has been too charming for a long time . Incredibly , he has many different girlfriends . Starting almost right after they married 20 years ago .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , I'm really surprised . You are not doing anything behind my back , are you ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: No , the only thing I've ever done behind your back is zip you up , besides I told all my other girlfriends , and my wife who's getting suspicious . and we had a cold for a while , tell the

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Haha ... You are not very funny . I guess that means - - except me to tell my lover we have stoped seeing each other too .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You are not funny either . I can't believe I married a woman like you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm so glad I bought this watch !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Cool ! Flashy red lines !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I think this is the coolest watch I've ever owned .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Is it waterproof ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Isn't that a silly question ? You know how much of an athlete I am .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Uh , huh ... so what kind of sports do you need a waterproof watch for ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , surfing , scuba diving ...

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hi ! I'm happy you could make it .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , I've been looking forward to seeing you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What can I get you ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'd love a gin and tonic .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Can I help you , Ma'am ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I need a phone card for this new cell phone .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Cool phone . What kind of phone card do you want ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It's for my daughter who is still a senior high school student .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Then the M-Zone will be suitable .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What's special with the service ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You know students use tested message service . And they provide favorable service for that .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That's nice . And I need a pre-paid phone card .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , there is a sales promotion for it now .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , good . Then what is it ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: If you buy a pre-paid phone card worth 100 yuan today , you will get 50 yuan for free .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: May I have two of them ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Sure . As many as you want .

utterances.speaker: B
