utterances.text: Okay , then a third one for my husband too .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Johnny , I can't believe you would do that .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I know , Grandma , I just ...

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You're darn Toomin ' , you know ! Now , you're on housework duty while I'm here !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes'm .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You're going to mop the floor until you can see your face in it !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes'm .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: And you're going to dust every piece of furniture in the house !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes'm .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It's time for desserts ! Are you still hungry ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I've always got room for something sweet !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: what are you going to try first ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I've never tried traditional Greek yogurt , so I want to try that first .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: do they serve the yogurt with anything ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I believe they add locally produced honey to it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: that sounds good . I'm going to start with an Italian tiramisu .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: do you want to try some of my yogurt . It's a favorite everyday dessert in Greece .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: ok . Mmm .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: what do you think ? How does it taste ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: it's nice , but it's rather plain . Do you want to try my tiramisu ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: sure . I'll just have a bite .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: what do you think ? Does it taste good ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: it's absolutely delicious ! That is the best tiramisu I've ever had !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm glad you like it . I don't care for it . Why don't you finish my tiramisu so that I can try one of those fried bananas ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: ok . I've had one of those before . They're really sweet and crunchy .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: do you know where they are from .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I believe they are a local delicacy in the South .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: do you want me to get you one , too ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: yeah , why not ? We've already pigged out as it is !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: ok , I'll be back with two fried bananas in a few minutes . Wait for me here !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , madam ? Can I help you ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , yes , please . But you are just closing , aren't you ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , yes , we are , madam . The shop shuts down in five minutes .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I shall not keep you long then . It was about some saucepans you had in your window last week .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Last week , madam ? I really can't remember which ones you mean . What were they like ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , they were lovely . Sort of imitation wood , dark brown color , country-style you know , and the lids , if I remember rightly , they had a sort of leaf pattern , or was it flowers ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That's strange . I don't recognize any of the ones we had from that description . Are you sure they were in this shop ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , you must know the ones I mean . They were on sale , a real bargain . Reduced to a quarter of the original price . I couldn't believe my eyes when I saw them .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I am afraid the sales are over now , madam . And you know we all sold out of the saucepans .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I don't think you did , you know . My neighbor told me she saw some here only yesterday .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , it's all new stock in the window now .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: May I just have a look , to see if there is anything else ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Eh , well , madam , as you know we are closing .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , yes , I am sorry I won't keep you . It must get on your nerves when customers come in right at closing time . But they were such beautiful saucepans . I ' d have bought them if I had made up my mind on the spot .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Perhaps madam , if you come back tomorrow , I could show you the whole range of kitchen ware . And there are still one or two things at the sale price .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , look ! That was the one there . That is the sort of thing I was looking for . But it's not quite the color .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That might be the artificial lighting , madam . Of course , if you could come back in daylight , you might find it ' s exactly what you are looking for .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: There it is . That is the pattern ! The set behind you . Thank goodness , they haven't been sold . And thank you so much for being so patient with me . Yes , those are the ones .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: This Olympic park is so big !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes . Now we are in the Olympic stadium , the center of this park .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Splendid ! When is it gonna be finished ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: The whole stadium is to be finished this June .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How many seats are there in the stand ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , there are 5000 seats in total .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I didn ' t know it would be so big !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It is ! Look there , those are the tracks . And the jumping pit is over there .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Ah ... I see . Hey , look the sign here , No climbing .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: We put many signs with English translations for foreign visitors .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You won't believe what just happened .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I went down to change some money , right ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes . We need some . How much did you change ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I wanted to change around 5000 dollars . And you know the exchange rate .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , it's about 35 pesos for every Taiwan dollar , right ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Not today .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What do you mean ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I went into the bank with my money , and I looked at the exchange board . At first I couldn't believe it . I thought I was reading the board wrong or something .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Why ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Because the board said 60 pesos for every Taiwan dollar .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sixty ? That's too much . How can that be ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I thought it was wrong too . It didn't make sense .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Just two days ago it was 35 . How can it be 60 ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: So , I went up to the teller and started to exchange the money . And it's true . They really gave me sixty pesos for the dollar .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That's amazing ! Really ? How could it change so much in two days ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Wow , you ' re up early today ! What ' s for breakfast ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , I felt like baking , so I made some muffins .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Smells good ! I ' ll make some coffee . Do you want me to make you some eggs ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sure , I'll take mine , sunny side up .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Www , I don ' t know how you can eat your eggs like that ! Ever since I was small , I ' Ve had eggs and soldiers .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You know , my dad had scrambled eggs every morning for twenty years . It drove my mom crazy !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You know what really drives me crazy ? When I ask for soft boiled eggs , and they overcook them , so they come out hard boiled ! How can you dipyour toast into a hard boiled egg ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You ' re so picky sometimes .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Here you go , honey , fried eggs .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Dammit ! I asked for sunny side up ! How many times do I have to tell you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Mary , it's good to see you !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Josh and I were just on our way back home from the beach and thought we'd drop by .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I am so glad that you decided to stop by !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , it has been a long time since we have seen you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Mary , can I get Josh or you something to drink ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh no , thank you . We aren't all that thirsty .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How about a little snack then ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No , thank you , we just ate lunch a little while ago .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well then , how is your family ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Everyone is doing great . My sister finally had her baby .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , it was nice talking to you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It was nice talking to you too .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: We should really hang out again .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That would be fun .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Where do you want to go ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I think we should go out to eat .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That sounds good .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: All right , so I'll see you then .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'll call you later .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Okay , I'll talk to you later then .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: See you later .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Bye .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Do you know how late it is ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: My fault . I didn't realize what time it was .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I hope you don't think that excuse lets you off the hook .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Not really . I'm telling the truth .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Haven't I asked you to call if you're going to be home late ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: This is true , but it must've slipped my mind .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Regardless , all you had to do was give a call .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I know . I should've called .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Come home late one more time , and you'll find your stuff outside .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You want to throw me out over this ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That's right , maybe then you'll respect my rules .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That's fine , because if I leave , then your rules won't matter .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Whew ! I had to wait for almost an hour to get to the front of the line .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You have much patience .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Wow ! Your calligraphy is very beautiful . It was worth the wait !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you . Today I'm writing a kind of poem called a Chinese couplet .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What does it say ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: This is an especially famous one . It says " May the passing days bring you health and longevity . May this season of renewal find you basked in riches . "

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That's very nice . Is it for sale ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No . I never sell my artwork .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Really ? Then what do you do with it ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I give it away . Here , this one is for you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Wow ! Really ? Are you sure ? Now I'll have a lucky year !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Remember , real luck must be created ( by ) yourself , and then it cannot be given or taken away ...

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What do you think about this store ? I heard it ' s a posh store that ' s only got branches in big cities .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I love this store . The only problem is that it ' s extremely expensive .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Don ' t worry . I ' Ve decided that for your birthday I ' m going to take you shopping for a new dress .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Really ? I thought you hated shopping ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I do , that ' s why you should appreciate this gift !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sure . That ' s really nice of you . Let ' s go in and try some things on .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How about this red dress ? I think it would really suit you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That ' s gorgeous ! Do they have it in a size 8 ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Here you go . On any other day , it would cost me a fortune , but it ' s on special offer today .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I think this color isn ' t quite right for me . Do they have the same dress in white ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Let me look . Let ' s see ... they ' Ve got one in blue , green , pink , black ... and white . Here you are .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: This is perfect ! What do you think ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I think you look fantastic . Happy Birthday !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I ' m so lucky . You only get a chance like this once in a blue moon ! Thanks honey !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Sam , you ' Ve got to forgive me .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Forgive you for what ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I used your computer . And I ' m afraid I ' Ve erased your personal files accidentally .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No ! Are you kidding me ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I ' m afraid not . I apologize .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I can ' t believe it ! I have all my important personal documents stored in that computer . It ' s no laughing matter .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I told you I ' m sorry . What can I do to make it up to you ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , you should be sorry ! Don ' t ever use my computer again ! You can ' t do anything now , it ' s too late !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You guys are charging me $ 10 for a movie that I never ordered or saw .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Let's see , sir . According to your file , you watched ' Titanic ' Monday evening .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , the wrong information is in my file . I was at a concert Monday night .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , your word overrules the file , sir . One moment , please .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I knew you'd see it my way .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sir , I deleted the $ 10 , but I had to add a $ 2 service charge to your bill .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Am I in the Twilight Zone ? You're charging me for a movie I never saw ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Please don't blame me , sir . Blame the computer programmer .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: This is highway robbery . I've got a good mind to call the police !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: If it makes you feel any better , other guests feel the same way .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Why didn't you tell me you had a girlfriend ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sorry , I thought you knew .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: But you should have told me you were in love with her .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Didn't I ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You know you didn't .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , I'm telling you now .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , but you might have told me before .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I didn't think you'd be interested .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You can't be serious . How dare you not tell me you were going to marry her ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sorry , I didn't think it mattered .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , you men ! You're all the same .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hey , look , there is a circus show over there .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm not in the mood .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It's the circus .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I don't want to sit there and watch them torturing the animals .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , come on , they give them treat too . Oh , look , that little monkey is so cute .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Cute ? Hope so .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , it is coming to us , come on , Ben , get a banana to it .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Me ? No way , keep him away from me , please .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Why are you acting so strange today ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I've said that I've got a problem with the circus . I'm not kidding .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That's weird !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Mike ! Look at the floor !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What's wrong with it ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What's wrong with it ? It's filthy !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh ...

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It's filthy because you never wipe your shoes .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sorry , love .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What are you looking for now ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: My cigarettes .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , they ' re not here . They are in the dustbin .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: In the dustbin ! Why didn't you tell me before ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Alright , tell me what you think .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Don't you think it ' s a bit bright ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yeah , maybe you ' re right . How about this outfit ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: This dress looks lovely on you , but it ' s not very practical , is it ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: No , I don't have any plans to go to a formal dance any time soon , but I love the way it looks . I just had to try it on ! What do you think about this ? It ' s casual , yet sophisticated .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I like the jeans , but you need something to go with the top . It ' s too plain on its own .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How about this scarf , these earrings , AMD an anklet ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That might be going overboard a bit . How about just that scarf with a bracelet ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That ' s a good idea . You have a lot of good fashion sense .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thanks . You ' d be ok on your own . There are loads of fashion victims out there , and you are not one of them . Have you tried it on yet ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yep . Here it is . What do you think ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That looks great . Just one more thing---you need some high heels with those jeans . Do you want a pair with a plain pattern or ones with a leopard print on them ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: The leopard print sounds fabulous . Are they a name brand ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No , they ' re a Prada knock-off for 1/10 of the price of the real thing .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That ' s even better than the real thing .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: If I were you , I ' d buy that now while it ' s on sale . If you spend $ 100 , you get a $ 50 voucher for more clothes .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It ' s too bad I did all that shopping yesterday !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I want to get on the bus already .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It just isn't on time today .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It was supposed to be here thirty minutes ago .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I think it'll be here pretty soon .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I need to get to work , so it better .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I really do hate public transportation .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I agree , it's just never on time .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That's right .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I also hate having to stand at a bus stop in all kinds of weather .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , that's the worst .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: We need to get a car .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I completely agree with that .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I hate computer games .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Why ? They are fine .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Because they are too violent . Some of them are even disgusting .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Indeed there are bad games . But many of them are good .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: If boys grow up with computer games , they will surely become bad .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Come on . Things are not so bad . Boys can learn to use the computer through games .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hey , Ann . You don't have a pen , do you ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sure , here you go .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thanks . I don't suppose you have some paper , too .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Of course . There you are .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thanks so much . I owe you one .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Stupid girl , making me spend so much money , now I have to get it from the ATM ...

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hello , welcome to Universal Bank . Please insert your card into the slot .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I know where to put my card ! Stupid machine , talking to me like I ' m an idiot ...

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Please input your 6 digit PIN code followed by the pound key . Thank you . Please select an option . Thank you . You have selected withdrawal .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yeah , yeah , I know what I selected . Just gimme my money !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Please type the amount you would like to withdraw . Thank you , you want to transfer 10000 USD to the World Wildlife Foundation . If this is correct please press 1 .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: No , no ! Stupid machine , what are you doing ! No !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Confirmed . Thank you for using our bank ! Please remove your card from the slot . Goodbye !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: No , no way ! What happened ? Give me my money !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Danger , danger ! The exits have been sealed and the doors will remain locked in until the local authorities arrive . Thank you for using our bank . Have a nice day .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I don't know how to adjust my life . Would you give me a piece of advice ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You look a bit pale , don't you ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , I can't sleep well every night .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You should get plenty of sleep .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I drink a lot of wine .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: If I were you , I wouldn't drink too much .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I often feel so tired .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You better do some exercise every morning .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I sometimes find the shadow of death in front of me .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Why do you worry about your future ? You're very young , and you'll make great contribution to the world . I hope you take my advice .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Can I get you something to drink ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sure , but I don't drink much . So I don't know what to order .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: So how about an aperitif ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It sounds good . I'd like to start with a Compare .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Stirred or shaken ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Stirred will be fine .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Here you are .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thanks . Does the bar have a signature drink ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Sure . All of our mixed drinks are excellent . You can also try a delicious non-alcoholic cocktail .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Can you recommend one ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Try a Stinger . It has lime juice and grenadine over ice .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It sounds interesting . I'll take one .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Here we go .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It tastes great .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Enjoy yourself .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yeah .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Are you free tomorrow night ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , I am .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Shall we have dinner together ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Do you have a special restaurant in mind ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , I do . I know a place that has excellent food .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: OK . I'll be happy to join you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Matthew ? Hi !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Steve ! Haven't seen you in ages ! How long's it been ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It's got to be almost a year now .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: How have you been ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm pretty good . I've been looking for a place to live recently . My lease runs out next month and I don't want to renew it .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yeah , I remember the neighborhood . Have you found a place yet ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Not yet . But I am still looking through the classifieds . Wish me luck .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , maybe I can help . Remember my neighbor ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Mrs . Thou ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , her daughter's having a baby , so she's moving in with her to help out . I think if you are interested , you can come over and have a look .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Great . It's a lovely neighborhood . And it would be nice to be neighbors again . It would be just like the old days !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'll ask Mrs . Thou when she's available to show the apartment and let you know . Has your number changed ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Listen , Karen , I need your help . I don't know anyone here yet .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm glad to help you . What's wrong ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: My mother-in-law just went into the hospital in L . A . Hank and I will be flying there tonight .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm sorry to hear it . What's wrong with her ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Doctors aren't sure yet . But the real problem is Suzy . She has a bad cold , and we don't want to take her with us . But we don't know who can stay with her .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You need a babysitter .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , I'd ask Jill , the girl I've had before , but I need someone overnight . Maybe even for two nights .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I could have Suzy stay at my place .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I don't want to do that to you , Karen .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Why not ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Your own kids would get Suzy's cold . I think it would be better to have a good babysitter here . But I don't know who to ask . I need someone more mature than Jill . It might even be for two or three days .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I know who we can ask . There is a girl I know , Sara Ralston . She is 17 , and she will usually take this kind of job . I know her from my church , and I trust her completely .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'd like to talk with her . This is short notice , I know . But Hank and I are leaving tonight .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'll get you her number . I hope she can do it . She is very responsible .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm glad you know someone . I knew you would be the best person to ask about this . I don't want to insult Jill or her mother . I think Jill maybe could do it . But I'd rather have someone a little older .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'll go home and get Sara's number . I'll call her first myself .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Great . Then call me and let me know if she's free .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Wow ! It's hot today ! Do you want to get an ice cream cone ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No Let's go to an ice cream parlor ! They have way more flavors to choose from there . I feel like having something special like Neapolitan ice cream .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What's that ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It's three different flavors mixed together . Chocolate , strawberry and something green with candied fruit .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Do they have ice cream bars . frozen yogurt or frozen chocolate mousse ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Absolutely ! They also have real Italian Galatian and French sorbets . They do a great baked Alaska .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Maybe a vanilla ice cream milkshake would be good . What's your favorite flavor ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well ... l like the traditional flavors like rum raisin , butter pecan . maple walnut , strawberry , chocolate and vanilla . But now there are some new flavors from Asia like green tea and durian .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: God ! Even talking about it makes me feel like l'm gaining weight !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That's OK . We can go jogging , after we eat !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: We have been here for about five days and I have to leave now .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Ok ! You know you're always welcome here . Did you enjoy your stay ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , we have a very pleasant time . Thank you for being so nice for us .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It's our pleasure . And is there anything else we can do for you before you leave here ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: No , thanks . You've done a lot for us . Thank you for everything .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Don't mention it . Oh , This is a small gift for you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh ! Thank you ! It's very kind of you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: We hope you could visit our company again .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: We're sure we will . And welcome to our corporation next year . We're expecting you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Ok ! We'll definitely go to visit your company .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Francis , you have done an outstanding work in the past six months . In view of your achievement , I trust you ' re now indispensable part of our company and you deserve an officer director title .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I am so happy to know that I could make some contribution to our company .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: This title does not only give you a raising pay-check , but also increase responsibilities . Congratulations , and hope the best for you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you , I will be doing my best .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It's nice of you to see me off .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It's my pleasure . Hope you ' ll visit Beijing more often .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thanks . Stop here now .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: OK . I hope you have a good trip . Thanks ever so much for your cooperation , Mr . Simpson . Give my best wishes to Mr . Green .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: OK , I will . Goodbye and remember to look me up if ever you're in Paris .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Goodbye and all the best .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: OK , bye for now !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Bye .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: David , I ' m going to China .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Really ? How did you get the chance ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You know . I took part in the Chinese contest . I was the best and they gave me this reward . I don ' t have to pay for my trip .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Congratulations . How lucky you are !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thank you . I ' m leaving tomorrow morning .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I ' m sure you ' ll enjoy the trip . China is such a beautiful country .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I ' m sure I will .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Have a nice journey , Lily .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thank you , David .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hey daddy ! You look great today . I like your tie ! By the way , I was wondering can I ...

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: NO !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I haven't even told you what it is yet !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Okay , okay , what do you want ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Do you think I could borrow the car ? I ' m going to a concert tonight .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Um .. I don ' t think so . I need the car tonight to pick up your mother .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Egg ! I told you about it last week ! Smelly Toes is playing , and Eric asked if I would go with him !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Who's this Eric guy ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Duh ! He's like the hottest and most popular guy at school ! Come on , dad ! Please !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No can do ... sorry .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Fine then ! Would you mind giving me 100 bucks ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No way !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That ' s so unfair !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I hate to go outside .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Me too .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Why do you hate to go outside ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I meet too many jerks .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I agree .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: This city is full of jerks .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Rude people are everywhere .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: But what can you do ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You can yell at them .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: And they will yell back at you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yelling doesn't do any good .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No . The best thing to do is just stay home .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: ... so , I said , let ' s take a break . And since that night , I ' Ve been waiting for him to call , but I still haven ' t heard from him . You don ' t think he ' s seeing someone else , do you ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Come on , don ' t be so dramatic ! I ' m sure everything is going to work out just fine .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You think so ? Oh , no ! How can he do this to me ? I ' m sure he ' s cheating on me ! Why else wouldn ' t he call ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: But , you two are on a break . Theoretically he can do whatever he likes .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: He ' s the love of my life ! I ' Ve really messed this up .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Come on , hon . Pull yourself together . It ' s going to be alright .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: But I ... I still love him ! And it ' s all my fault ! I can ' t believe how immature and selfish I was being . I mean , he is a firefighter , it ' s not like he can just leave someone in a burning building and meet me for dinner . I ' Ve totally messed this up !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You know what , Veronica , I think you should make the first step . I ' m sure he ' ll forgive you ...

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: No , this is not gonna happen ! I ... I ' Ve ruined everything ...

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: do you hear something ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You ' re home late today , David . How was school ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Not bad . There ' s a new English teacher .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , what ' s she like ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: She is beautiful .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Is she old or young ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: She is quite young and her hair is blond .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Is she strict ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Not really . Her eyes are blue .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Can she speak Chinese ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Not much . She is very tall and slim .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: David , stop dreaming . It ' s time to do your homework .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It's quiet everywhere in winter .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes . I like winter .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Me too .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It's snowing heavily . What about taking a walk ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That's a good idea . Let's go !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What a heavy snow ! Look ! The water is frozen .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Take care ! Don't slip on the ground .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I've got it . I like the feeling of stepping on the ice .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes . Very wonderful .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: There is a snowman over there .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How lovely it is !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: how are you doing , Christopher ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: to be honest , I'm really fed up with work at the moment . I need a break !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: are you doing anything this weekend ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I have to work on Saturday all day ! I really hate my job !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: are you available on Sunday ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: yes , that's my only day off until Thursday .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: ok , well , my friends and I are planning on going to the beach on Sunday . We tend to leave around noon whenever we go anywhere , so you could still sleep in . Do you want to come with us ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: that'd be fantastic ! Which beach are you going to ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: it's a quiet beach just about an hour outside of the city .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: what should I bring with me ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: we've got plenty of inflatables , but if you want to sit on a chair , you'll have to bring your own sunlounger .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I can just use my beach towel . I love lazing around in the sun .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: do you like surfing ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I've actually never tired . Do you have a surfboard ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: we've got a few . I can teach you how to surf on Sunday . It'll be fun !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I can't wait ! It sounds like we're going to have a great time . How much money should I bring ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: you'll just need roughly $ 10 for food and gas money . My friend is driving , so we usually all chip in a few dollars for gas money .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: ok , where and when should I meet you ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: we'll pick you up at your place at noon . Be there or be square !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hi , what can I get for you ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hello , may I have a double cheeseburger ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: With everything on it ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That sounds great .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Did you want fries with your order ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: May I get a large order of curly fries ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Did you want something to drink ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Get me a medium Pepsi .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Would you like anything else ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No , thank you . That's it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: No problem , that'll be $ 5 . 48 .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thanks a lot . Keep the change .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Is that pesky lady coming to the office again ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yeah , I'm afraid so .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: If there's one thing that bugs me , it's her critical attitude .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , it is annoying .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: See how many people are here !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yeah ! Do all these people work in the company ? Everyone and their dog is here !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Other than the employees , our boss Jack invited some friends of the company .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Can we just sit wherever we want ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Of course not ! We have to sit at our assigned seats . I think our table is over there in the back .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hmm . We don't exactly have the best seats in the house , do we ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Look who you get to sit next to--Tim from purchasing !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Www ! That weirdo ? ! He really gives me the creeps !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Don't worry . I'm also sitting next to you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I just hope he doesn't start bragging again !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I can't wait until we get our year-end bonus !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Me , either ! Who decides how much money we get ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Good afternoon , how can I help you ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Someone has stolen my gold necklace .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I am sorry to hear about that . Would you mind coming with me to my office and tell me exactly what happened here ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Of course not .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Are you sure that it isn't somewhere in your room ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , I've looked everywhere in my room and I can ' t find it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Ok , when and where did you last see it ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Last night on the dresser . I took it off before I went to the shower , and forgot to put it back on after the shower . And this morning I left the hotel in a hurry without wearing it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Are you sure you didn't wear it this morning ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , I am positive .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Did you remember to lock your door before you left then ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , I think I did . It has to be one of your maids who took it . I want my necklace back .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , I understand how you feel , and we will try to do our best to help you . But first please allow me to send one of the housemaids to your room to look for it again thoroughly , just in case it's still in there . If she finds it , we will all be happy . If she doesn't , we will turn the whole matter to the police . But I must say that the hotel can't be held responsible for your loss . You should have locked your gold necklace away at the hotel ' s safety box . If you had read your key card carefully , you would have realized that we specially warned you to do so .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That just isn't good enough . Cet me your general manager . I want to speak to him now .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I am sorry , ma ' am . Our general manager is not in town . But I ' d be more than glad to get you our assistant manager , if you like . But I am afraid that he will say the same thing . We have very clear instructions about valuables and we must follow them . And now if you will excuse me , I'll go and find our assistant manager for you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You look kind of green .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I don ' t feel so good . I am feeling sick to my stomach .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Have you had anything to eat lately ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I had fried shrimp and clams for lunch .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Perhaps the food was bad .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Perhaps , but I haven ' t felt well for a few days now .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Has anything been upsetting you lately ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: My stress level is pretty much what is usually is .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Do you think that maybe you are getting the flu ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It seems to me like I may have caught a bug .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hello , three-five .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Is that Anne ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm sorry , I'm very tired . I'm going to bed early . I didn't have good time , and I don't really want to see you again .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What are you talking about ? We had a great time . We laughed and talked all night last time .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It was hardly all night . And I recall it was you doing all the laughing at your own jokes .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That's not fair . We had fun . Give me a second chance . Can we meet tomorrow night for drinks at the pub ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: No , I ' m sorry . I'm going to meet some friends tomorrow evening . And I ' m too tired now . I have to go to sleep . Goodbye .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: But Anne ...

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I just discovered that I owe $ 10 for a movie that I never ordered .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Let me check , sir . You were charged for watching ' Titanic ' Monday night .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That is absolutely incorrect ! I was out on the town Monday night .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Okay , sir , bear with me a moment .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thank you for taking my word over the computer's word .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: One slight problem , sir . I need to charge you $ 2 to remove this error from your file .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You can

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I feel your pain , sir .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Absolutely unbelievable ! You people should be ashamed of yourselves .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I agree with you , sir , but all I do is work here .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I swear I will never shop at a street market in China . It's a terrible place full of excellent profiteers ! You have to keep an eye whenever it comes to paying for something .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: cool down , Harry ! What are you really mad about ? Did you get ripped off ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: yes . Last Sunday I went to a nearby market . It was on open-air fair . I chanced upon this bag and bought it on the spot , without even trying to strike a bargain . I paid one hundred and twenty . And just now I was told by my Chinese colleagues I bought it overpriced . I could have talked my way to thirty .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: is that so ? I'm afraid people here will not take pity on unlucky guys like you . Bargaining has always been an indispensable procedure in business deals . It's the norm of free trade . The seller sets a preposterous price , and the buyer tries his best to bring it down , until a compromise is reached . Yet you ignored the process . No wonder you ended up easy prey .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: but don't you think it annoying to overcharge the customers by such a handsome margin ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: of course , that's something really irritating . And the only way to avoid being trapped is to know in advance about the real worth of the stuff . I recommend you to consult the price tags in the supermarket first . And then you may negotiate for a fair deal .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Excuse me sir . May I come in ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Mike , you're late again .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm sorry , but my sister was ill , so I

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Do you think I believe the story like that ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: But it's true .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: How can believe it if the same excuse was used twice within a week ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That's coincident .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Ok , hold it . Remember to be punctual next time .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I promise I will .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You'd better .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hi , Victor . How are you ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , I'm fine .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: So , are you going to go to class tonight ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Maybe ... but I don't think so .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Really ? What's the matter ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I don't know . I'm just feeling a little sad .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Listen . Come with me to class , and after class we can go out for dinner .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Now that's a good idea . Thanks a lot , Brian . I'm feeling better already .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I like this apartment . Do you think we can afford the mortgage ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes . I think so . It ' s not a very expensive apartment . It ' s in the right area and it has everything that we are looking for . The rooms are quite large too .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I love the balcony . We can sit outside and enjoy the sun in summer . We are on the 12th floor , so there ' s very nice view from the balcony .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: The neighbourhood is nice too . There is a park nearby .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , and there are many houses nearby . I like it that the neighbourhood isn ' t full of apartment blocks .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It ' s a pity we can ' t afford a house . A garden would be so nice .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , it would . Don ' t worry . There ' s a lawn outside the building and there ' s the park nearby . This place will be fine .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: The building is quite new and well constructed . I ' m happy with the fittings too .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , everything has been well designed .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What a beautiful watch . It goes very well with your ring .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Is that your wedding ring ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm not married yet . It's my engagement ring .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , congratulations . When is the big date ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: In June .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Did you have the watch before getting the ring ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Actually , we bought the ring together after I got the watch .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You did a fabulous job with the selection . It's gorgeous .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you so much .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What kind of watch is it ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It's a Tag Heer .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: If you don't mind me asking , how much do they cost ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: This one is $ 1500 . But they range from $ 600 to $ 3000 .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That's why it looks so nice . I should have figured . You always get what you pay for .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yeah . I would rather get one nice watch instead of 20 mediocre ones .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , Yuri , tell me about it .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm sorry I can't bring better news , sir . The site is a disaster .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That's what I was afraid of .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It is not only the earthquake , sir . But the mudslides . Much of the north half of the site has been covered over by mud .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Mud ? But Ivan told me there were no mudslides in that district . I thought all the mudslides were down in Chichitango .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That's what we thought , sir . That's what the news reported . But there was one little mudslide in our district too . Right above our site .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , that's terrible ! What bad luck ! I wish we had never come to this country . But , if it isn't the strikes and the revolutionaries , it's the earthquakes . Our operations here are finished !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm sorry , sir .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It's not your fault , Yuri . But tell me . When will Ivan be able to get out there ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , it took me about nine hours to get back here by car . If Ivan leaves tonight , I think he should be there by tomorrow lunch .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Good . I want an estimate of damages as soon as possible .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: But sir ...

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , Yuri ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I wouldn't recommend sending Ivan now . Especially not at night . The roads aren't safe .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Has the earthquake damaged the bridges too ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No , sir . The bridges are fine . But I've heard rumors that the revolutionaries are coming down from the mountains . There has been fighting , sir .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Are you serious ? Fighting ? But I didn't hear anything on the news .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You know the government controls the press here , sir . They don't want it reported .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , this is terrible , Yuri . Terrible ! So we can't even assess the damages . How can we do business in this country ? Either we're buried under mud , or we're in danger of getting kidnapped . No , I can't believe this mess !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm sorry , sir .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You don't have to keep saying that , Yuri . It's not your fault . But me--I'm the one who should be sorry . It was me who suggested operations here in the first place ! Oh , what can we do ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Alright , tell me what you think about this one .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Don't you think it's a bit bright ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yeah , maybe you're right . How about this outfit ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That dress looks lovely on you , but it's not very practical , is it ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: No , I don't have any plans to go to a formal dance any time soon , but I love the way it looks . I just want to try it on ! What do you think about this ? It's casual , yet sophisticated .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I like the jeans , but you need something to go with the top . It's too plain on its own .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How about this scarf , these earrings , and an anklet ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That might be going overboard a bit . How about just that scarf with a bracelet ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That's a good idea . You have a lot of good fashion sense .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thanks . You'd be OK on your own . There are loads of fashion victims out there , and you are not one of them . Have you tried it on yet ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yep . Here it is . What do you think ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That looks great . Just one more thing-you need some high heels with those jeans . Do you want a pair with a plain pattern or ones with a leopard print on them ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: The leopard print sounds fabulous . OK , I'll take it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You look so happy , Anna . Any good news ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes . I ' Ve won the first prize in the math contest .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Really ? Congratulations !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you , Paul .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: By the way , would you like to have dinner with me tomorrow evening ? Tomorrow is my birthday .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Good , happy birthday to you !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Not so soon . It ' s not my birthday today . Well , you ' ll come , won ' t you ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sure , I will . Thank you for inviting me .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: My pleasure .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Steven , we are preparing a martial arts show for the New Year's party . Would you like to join us ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'd love to ! But I have never learned martial arts , and there is only a month left before the New Year .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That's OK . A month is enough for you to learn the basic movements . It would be great to have you with us on the show .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sounds great ! Shall I learn the actions that Jet Li did in the movies ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: No . You know , there are many schools and styles of kung fu . What we will perform is a set of Chinese shadow boxing .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Whatever ! I'm glad to learn something of Chinese kung fu . Thanks for asking me .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thank you for joining us ! Now let's see some pictures and know more about kung fu .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Good !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: John , I ' Ve asked you not to smoke in here ! I don ' t want to see you smoking in my office again .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I ' m sorry , Ms . Fairbanks . I won ' t let it happen again .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That ' s what you said the last time ! If you want to smoke , you ' ll have to use your break time and go outside !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I understand , Ms . Fairbanks .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Doris , I'm glad you're home . I'm terrified . I don't know what to do !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What is it ? What happened ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I think someone is stalking me .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No , it can't be . Really ? Who ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I don't know . I saw him the first time Tuesday . He was at the cafe . I noticed he was looking at me a lot . Not just the usual looking , but staring . He just kept staring at me . He didn't stop .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What did you do ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I didn't do anything . Finally , he left . But then I saw him again today . Outside the shoe store . Near the cafe . I went into a CD store and pretended I was looking at CD's . But then he came in too .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Did he leave when you left ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes . Then I noticed he was on the sidewalk behind me . He was following me .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What did you do ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Marketing manage office , can I help you ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Mr Green , please .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Sorry , he's out .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What time you suspect back them ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Sorry , I am not sure , can I take a message ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No , thanks . I'll call back later .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That's fine . please call again later .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Ok , thank you . Goodbye .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Linda , this is Todd calling .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Todd , I am so happy you called !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Linda , I wanted to tell you how much I enjoyed our time together last Friday night .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Boy , Todd , that was one great movie you picked out ! Thanks for asking me to go with you !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I had a great time too and was thinking that maybe you might want to join me for a hike to the waterfalls on Saturday .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: A hike would be great ! Let me pack us a nice picnic lunch , OK ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Linda , that would be a perfect addition .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'll take care of the lunch then , and you can take care of the other plans . What time would you like to pick me up ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I was hoping to leave by 9 o'clock so that it won \ ' t be too hot for the hike .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Nine is a great time to get started . I'll see you on Saturday !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Did your meal meet with your approval ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Our meal was absolutely perfect !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How about a dessert to top off that wonderful meal ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Dessert sounds perfect , but I would like to split something with my friends .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: On this evening's dessert list , we have chocolate mousse cake , homemade fresh strawberry shortcake , and a spicy rum apple crisp .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I think that the apple crisp would be wonderful .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: One dessert will serve two , so would you like to split a second one ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: We would also like a piece of chocolate mousse cake . Could you bring us four dessert forks , please ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How about some coffee and tea as well ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: We are all tea drinkers . Please bring us four teas .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I will prepare your desserts and have someone bring you your drinks right away .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: The hot drinks first would be great . Thanks !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , how did you enjoy your seaside trip ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It was funny .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Tell me about it , will you ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , we drove through the valley on our way there in the morning . It was a magnificent sight .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Did you stop at the big waterfall for pictures ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sure , we wouldn't miss it for anything . After that , we took a short cut to the park . There was very little traffic , so we got there in less than an hour .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You were lucky then . What did you do after that ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: We went for a swim in the sea . That was the best part of the day . Just look at my nice tan .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: So you must have had a busy and enjoyable day yesterday .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , you're right . And I was so tired that I fell asleep on the way back . My arms are still stiff from the swim yesterday .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , I'm afraid I must be going now . I have no idea it was so late .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Stay for dinner with us .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm afraid I can't . I have a dinner party at seven tonight . You see , I am going to England the day after tomorrow .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , I won't keep you then . It was very nice of you to come to see me .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It has been a pleasure . Goodbye .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Goodbye . Thank you again for coming .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: John , I was looking through some magazines for ideas about where we might go on vacation this year .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I've already told my buddy , Mark , that I am going hunting with him in Alaska .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You can't be serious !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hey , I've always gone hunting or fishing on vacation . I am sorry that bothers you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: After a year together , I thought it pretty safe to assume that we would automatically spend our vacation together .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Says who ? I don't think that is necessarily the case .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You know , now that I think about it , I really don't have much more to say to you at all !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Whatever you say !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: The air conditioning is not working ! We need to call a handyman before we start to fry in here !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Dan is on top of that . I think they are also getting the handyman to fix the bathroom toilet that keeps clogging up .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That would be convenient . They might as well ask him to fix the electrical wiring . The circuit breakers keep going out all the time . It ' s really annoying !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yeah you are right . This office is falling apart ! Frank told me the other day that the gutters outside were clogged and that ' s why the parking lot was flooded .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I know ! I was in ankle deep water trying to get to my car that day ! The handyman definitely has his work cut out for him .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You are an outgoing person , quite easy to talk with .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , my friends like to get along with me well .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Do you have many friends ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , I like to make new friends .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What do you usually do with them ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: We like to get together , chat and enjoy beautiful music .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Is there a problem , officer ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I stopped you for driving through a red light .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Did I really ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You didn't know ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I had no idea that I ran it .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Don't you know that yellow means slow down ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , madam .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Why'd you speed up instead ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I really have no excuse , madam .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'll have to write you a ticket .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I understand , and I am very sorry .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Here's your ticket .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You have been doing a great job this year and I am very satisfied with your work .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I am very happy to know my work could be recognized by you and our company .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Based on your contribution , I would like to give you a pay raise . Your monthly salary will be increased by 800 Yuan . This increase includes an 80 % married increase based on your achievements and increase responsibilities and then the additional 20 % increase were reflecting the changes in cost of living .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I really appreciate it . Thank you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Excuse me , i am a new student here . Could you tell me where the English Department is ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It is in that brand new , tall building over there . On the 9th floor .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Where is the school cafeteria ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It is the basement of that red building in front of the tower with big bells .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Where is the Computer Center ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: The Computer Center is on the first floor of the library .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Where is the library ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: The library is next to the Adminstration Building . The Adminstration Building is over there near the school ' s main entrance . There are school maps for free in the lobby of the Admin .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thank you . I will go get one .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sure . Glad to be of service . By the way , my name is Mike Sullivan . You will see me around a lot . I am running for President of the Student Government .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , hi ! My name is Eve Markowski . I am glad to meet you . With your friendly smile and helpful attitude . I am sure you will win .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thanks you for the encouragement .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You are welcome . I ' d better go . Goodbye .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Have a good day . Bye-Bye !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hey , don ' t walk on the lawn .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sorry , I ' m looking for my wallet .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You lost your wallet ? Anything important in it ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes . A lot of cash . Almost forty thousand pounds .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , I ' m sorry to hear that . I think you ' d better talk to the police officer walking there .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It seems that is a better way . Thank you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You are welcome .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I am so busy today .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Can I help you ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I ' m not sure . Perhaps you could do the shopping .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I ' ll be glad to help .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Or maybe make the beds .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: All you have to do is ask for help .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thanks . That ' s terrific !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I ' m ready and willing to help .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Wow ! What a beautiful scenic spot ! It's so open . And just breathe that fresh air , you can almost taste its freshness .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You can have a bird view of Guiling City from the top of the mountain .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Wonderful ! I'll often come here for mountain climbing .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You should . Many Guiliners , especially the old and the young , will climb mountains here in the morning .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: No wonder people say

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Quick ! Pass me your binoculars . Look at that bird ... I've never seen one of those before . It's indigenous to Guiling , and an endangered species too . This is lucky !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I didn't know you liked bird-watching .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I don't really . I just like wildlife , and you don't get to see too much of it in the city . This place is full of it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: This looks like a very nice house .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You know , I fell in love with this house the first moment I laid eyes on it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: The style of the exterior is just what I ' Ve been looking for !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: The exterior is only half of the story . The interior is incredible .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: This home is gorgeous on the inside !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Everything that you see on the walls , floors , and windows is brand new .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: The wall colors totally suit the style of this house .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Straight ahead is the gourmet kitchen .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I love the bamboo flooring and granite countertops .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: The master suite is the best . Let ' s go look at that next .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: There is plenty of room for our king-sized bed , and I love the light in this room .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I know that you like this house , but let ' s take a look at the others before you make up your mind .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Good morning golf aficionados ! My name is Rick Fields , and you guessed it , I am here with my main man , Bob Copeland .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you , Rick ! As you can see , ladies and gentleman , we are here in beautiful Pebble Beach where the top golfers in the world are trying to win the grand prize of one million dollars !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Whoa , that ' s a lot of cash ! Let ' s go to the course and see how Tiger Woods is doing .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: All right , we are here at the eighth hole . It ' s a par four , and has some very difficult hazards which many golfers find difficult to avoid . Although , I did see Jack Nicklaus hit a hole in one on this very same hole !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Tiger Woods is about to tee off , and let ' s see if he has the same luck as Jack . Tiger is asking his caddie for his driver and , he seems to be very nervous .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh no ! Not a good swing at all ! It ' s definitely not his day today . On the seventh hole he got a bogey and before that he barely made par . He will definitely not get a birdie on this shot .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It seems that his ball has flown somewhere deep in the trees . He is having a hard time finding it and even his caddie has climbed a tree to try and spot it .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh no ! A bear ! Run , Tiger , run ! Somebody call animal control !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Can I have my check , please .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Here it is . 350 Yuan all together .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: May son adores my new hairstyle so I suppose it is worth it .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hearing you say that is a big reward for us . And here is the receipt .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thank you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Wait ! Congratulations ! You are the lucky customer of our anniversary celebration .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Wow , it's surprising . So what do I get ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You can have a free facial and then make up free for you . Do you want it now ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Probably not . Doing that will probably take another three hours which I can't afford now .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Here is our number . Call us when you are ready to come .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You mean I should make an appointment ahead of time ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Got it . Bye for now .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hi , Mary , I have decided to look for a job as a salesman .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Good ! Have you got the recruitment information on marketing ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes . I have found some through different channels .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Really ? That's great ! Tell me .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: OK . The first piece of job information I got was from the Internet , and it is about selling medicines .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What do you think of this job ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I am not familiar with the medicine industry , and I don't think it fits me well .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Then how about the others ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Another is about electronic commerce , and its products are mainly large machinery equipments .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I have heard about electronic commerce , and many people say it has good prospects for development .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I also feel it's nice . I want to give it a try .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Come on ! I believe you will succeed .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thanks . You can also seek job information on the Internet .
