utterances.text: Yes ...

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Can I have my $ 200 please ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Sure . Here you are , $ 200 , Thank you , please come again ! Now it ' s my turn to roll the dice .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I have some great news ! I was able to switch to the night shift !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I knew everything would work out for you !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I got to meet the night Anger today too . We got along right from the start .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Wonderful ! Do you already have your work schedule ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Not yet , I pick it up tomorrow .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Do you know what you will be doing yet ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , I'll be managing the guys on the dock .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You're so good with people . I think they will like you !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh . Henry . I haven't seen you in ages . Come in . Let me take your coat . How are you getting along ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Very well , thank you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Please take a seat . Everything will be ready in a minute .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Here you go . We have your cocktail and there're salad . fried chicken , French fries and vanilla ice cream for dessert . Eat the chicken while it's hot . It tastes better .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Wow ! You're right . Everything is absolutely delicious . Please pass the pepper .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Here you are . Taste the French fries .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: They're soft .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Would you like some more ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: No more . Thank you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Here's to our friendship and health !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Bottoms up !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What ' s the Mountaineering Club doing this weekend ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: We are going to climb a cliff on the Colorado River .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How hard is the climb ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It is a very difficult climb because there are not many places to put your hands and feet .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What did you do last week ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: We rappelled down the side of 300 - foot cliff . It was very exciting .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Wow ! That sounds like a lot of fun . I ' m sorry I missed it .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , you should come this weekend . I think you could do the climb .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yeah , I will . See you then !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: O . K . See you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I went to the tutoring service centre on campus today . And I got a job .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Congratulation . What will you do ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: They got me a part-time tutoring job , teaching an Australian businessman Chinese .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That's wonderful . I want to get a part-time job too . Tell me what I should do .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It's very simple actually . You can go to the service centre and have your name and job interest resisted . They will give you a call if any job comes up .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Good . I'll do it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Poor Danny . You are so enfeebled !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Don't worry . No big deal . Just a common cold .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Mom called just now saying that she and Dad will be back later . Do you want to speak to them on phone ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No . You can never count on the grown-ups when there is something .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Whatever . Have a drink of water .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Come on , sister . This is the seventh glass already .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Maybe later . I think we have a medicine-kit .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Do we ? Where is it ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Probably on the of the cabinet . I'll go and get it .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Be careful . Now I have no one but you to depend on .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , here it is . Patulin . Oh , no !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What's the new strike ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Keep lying down . The matter is that all the medicine here is past expiration .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Poor me !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How do you arrange this summer vacation ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I want to travel .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Where would you like to go ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: The seaside .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That's really a good idea . Taking a walk on the beach and lying in the sun are pretty good . I recommend you Qingdao or Dalian .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I ' Ve been to Qingdao before , so I ' ll choose Dalian . I've heard that the environment there is very good .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , that's a good place to spend a holiday . Last year I went there . It's really .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: My friend Emily recently lost 18 pounds .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , really ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: The point is that she has been persuading me to lose weight too .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , it's a good thing for you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Good ? Yes , it's good for her but not for me . You see , she tells me that I'll feel better about myself if I slim down . She keeps giving me newspaper clippings about the latest miracle diet and insists that I join a health club , as she has .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: So you don't think you are fat and need to lose weight ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I just can't bear it that Emily made me feel like a baby who always pigs out on junk food .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: junk food is not good for your health . Too much of it will make you fat .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: But junk food is so easy . It requires no silverware or plates , no rigid mealtimes , no pleases and thank yous .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Ok , but junk food has many disadvantages . As junk food contains high amount of oil and fat , you'll feel sleepy , but not be able to concentrate when you have a lot of it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , but life without chips , ice cream and coca cola is boring .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Let me see . You could exercise more to keep fit .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , that sounds better than giving it up .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Why didn't you tell me you had a girlfriend ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sorry , I thought you knew .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: But you should tell me you were in love with her .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Didn't I ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You know you didn't .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , I am telling you now .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , but you might have told me before .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I didn't think you would be interested .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You can't be serious . How dare you not tell me you are going to marry her ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sorry , I didn't think it mattered .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , you men ! You are all the same .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Excuse me , are you Mrs . Green from England ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , I am .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm pleased to meet you , Mrs . Green . My name is Myra . I work in Beijing Institute of Technology . I came here to meet you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: How do you do ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How do you do ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It's kind of you to meet me at the airport .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Welcome to Beijing . Is this your first time in China ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No , I have visited China several times , but it's my first visit to Beijing and I think it's a great honor to be invited to your beautiful city .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It's our pleasure to have you here . I hope you will have a pleasant stay here .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you . I'm sure I will have a wonderful time here .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Good afternoon , sir , is there anything I can help you with today ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: umm ... yeah ! I ' m looking for a nice gift to give my girlfriend . Our fifth anniversary ' s next Friday .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , I would be happy to assist you in choosing the perfect gift for her . Is there anything particular that you have in mind ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No , not really ... I ' m completely at a loss .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , you can give her a set of pearl earrings , or this beautiful heart-shaped pendant . What is her favorite gemstone ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That purple one . I ' m sorry ... I ' Ve never bought jewellery for anyone and I ' m kind of nervous .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Don ' t worry , we specialize in providing our customers a relaxed , pressure-free shopping environment . That stone is an amethyst . We have a range of beautiful amethyst pieces . Take a look at this bracelet . It ' s 18K rose-gold , studded with amethyst and blue topaz . It ' s a great statement piece .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh ... wow . That ' s really pretty . Jess would love that . But ... I was thinking of something a little more delicate , perhaps a necklace ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: We have this beautiful platinum pendant , or you could also get her a locket . You could also get her a timepiece -- it ' s both glamorous yet functional . If you tell me a little more about your girlfriend , maybe I can help you find something for her .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Jess ? Well , she ' s very smart , and has a great sense of humor . She ' s very feminine ...

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Perhaps you could give her a ring ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well ... actually ... I was thinking about asking Jess to marry me ... I ' Ve just been so nervous .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well sir , I believe your fifth anniversary is a great time to propose !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Okay , I ' Ve decided . I ' m going to pop the question !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Fabulous ! We should look at engagement rings then ! Now that ' s a whole other section .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hello , it's nice to meet you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm glad we're meeting today . Thank you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You're welcome .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I would like to talk to you about your daughter .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Is there a problem ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No , your daughter is great .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That's great news .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Your daughter is a wonderful student .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: She isn't messing up in class ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Of course not . Your daughter is smart and very well behaved .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , I'm so glad to hear that she's doing well .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It is my pleasure to have her in my class .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Merry Christmas , sweetie . How's your brother enjoying Taiwan ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Ryan says he wants to stay . I think he's in love with some girl who designs fruit platters ...

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: No ! Christmas without him is bad enough . So , honey , do you have cold feet yet ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yeah , especially since Jack didn't take care of the plane reservations .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You're not coming ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Not until the 31st . So can you change the church reservations ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm afraid not . The church is booked until the year 2001 .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Then where will we have the ceremony ? At home ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: We'll have to . We'll rehearse on the 1st and have the wedding on the 2nd .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm sorry , Mom .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Don't worry , dear . I'm a great host . Now get some rest . Merry Christmas .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Merry Christmas , Mom . I love you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I love you , too . And forgive Jack . He's doing his best .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I know . Goodnight .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Do you have anything to do after this ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No , I don't .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Shall we drop in somewhere for a couple of drinks ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That sounds like a good idea .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I know a very interesting place .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , do you ? Good .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Is everything all right ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Not at all .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What's the problem ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Someone just robbed me .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What do you mean ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: This guy just robbed me right on the street .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: He didn't hurt you , did he ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm okay . He just stole my things .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm so sorry .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I have to file a report at the police station .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Let me take you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I would like that .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Wow , Amy , look at that number .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What's so great about it ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What do you mean ? It's a scrim .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Not to me , I wouldn't be caught dead in that .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I love that kind of stuff .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yeah , you seem to like those styles .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Sure do . I get a kick out of looking punk .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: This one looks really expensive though .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I don't care how much it costs . I'm rolling in it .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Lucky you ! I can't buy anything else . I'm flat broke .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I got a replace my party outfit , I trashed it last week .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Why did you drag me into this ? I've spent a week salary .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Are you on the level ? You're the one who called me , remember ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Just joking , Tonia . I've got some wonderful clothes . Let's go and have a close look at your outfit .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Good morning ! I am a new comer in our office .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Good morning ! Welcome to our office !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Nice to meet you ! My name is Grace Williams .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Nice to meet you too ! I am Peter Smith .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Today is my first day at work !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , hope you will enjoy your first day ! Just ask me if you need any help .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thank you . It's very kind of you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You are welcome .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hello , is that Cathy speaking ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , is that you , Allen ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , how are you doing ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Not bad .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Say I've got two tickets for the concert this evening . Would you like to come with me ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sure . Thank you very much .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Then I ' ll pick you up at six thirty . OK ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Ok , see you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: See you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What's the problem , Nada ? You look down in the dumps .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I don't know . My life is a big mess . Everything is so complicated .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: come on , nothing can be that bad .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: but promise me , you'll keep it a secret .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: ok , I promise . So what's troubling you so much ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I've fallen in love with my boss .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: really ? Is he married ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: no , of course not . He is still single .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: then what's your problem ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I try to keep it to myself . But there is a lot of gossip about us .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: oh , I see . Office romance tends to be the subject of gossip .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: worse still , he is trying to avoid me these days .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: office romance is very tricky .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: it gives me a lot of pressure and I feel depressed .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: cheer up , Nada . You'll be fine .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , hey , Keri ! You cook , right ! You're a pretty good cook .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm OK .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I want to make an omelet , so actually this is really silly , I've never made one before . How do you make an omelet ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , I can teach you how I make them , which is the same way my father and grandmother make them , which is a little special .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: OK . Yeah ! Yeah !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: First you take some eggs and crack them in a bowl , and whisk them up , quite , so they're quite high and fluffy , and in a hot pan , and you need a pan that's that's kind of small , that the sides go up at an angle . You put some oil and heat it up , so it's quite hot , and then you take your whipped up eggs , or whisked up eggs , and pour them into the pan , and as it's cooking , if you take a spatula , and push the bottom layer of the egg , to the side , to the sides , and then to the middle , so the uncooked egg gets to the bottom of the pan .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , OK . Wow !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: OK . And keep doing that until most of the egg is cooked so you should have a nice thick omelet and then flip it over , you'll only have to cook that side lightly . Put your fillings on the top and fold it over and let it sit just long enough to melt the cheese .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Wow . That sounds really good .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: oh , the clothes here are so expensive ! No wonder there are few people .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Beauty costs , dear ! What do you think of this dress ? Do you think it suits me ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: yeah , it's lovely , but to be frank , it's not the most practical . You don't have many formal events in your calendar , do you ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: come on , you sound like my Mom . Look at that , it's beautiful !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: when you buy clothes , you must think about the material , quality and price .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: maybe you have a point .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: make sure you buy what you need and your clothes can be worn for various occasions .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: all right . How about this black shirt ? It can be worn for anything---a party , a job interview and even a funeral !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: that's true , but you already have two back coats and one black sweater .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: oh ! Hey , look , that's the same shirt Britney wore in her concert .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: exactly ! Oh , my god ! I love Britney ! I'm going to get it .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: why not try it on ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: it's just the right size--a perfect fit ! I'll take it . Oh , no , I'm a little short . Did you bring your credit card ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: yes .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I promise I'll pay you back as soon as we get home .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Dai Ling .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , Henry , I haven't seen you for ages . Come in . Let me take your coat . How are you getting along ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Very well , thank you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Please take a seat . Everything would be ready in a minute .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Can you bring me a glass of orange juice , please ? I am quite thirsty .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Here you are . Here you go . We have cocktail and salad , fried chicken , French fries and icecream for dessert . Eating chicken while it's hot . it tastes better .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Wow , you're right . Everything is absolutely delicious . Please pass the pepper .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Here you are . Taste the French fries .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: They're soft .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Would you like some more ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: No more , thank you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Here is to our friendship and health !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Bottom is up .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You are from Japan , aren't you ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , yes !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I love Japan a lot .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I am glad to hear that .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Let's go to another place where my friend is working , let me pay here .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you , I ' ll pay next then .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , I must be going now ; it was nice talking with you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Check , please .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: 500 US dollars .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No kidding ! We have only 5 bottles of beer .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You had champagne for the girl .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Can you help me find a nice gift for my young niece ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Barbie dolls are quite popular , you know .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You're right . Girls love Barbie . Show me a Barbie doll .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Take a look at the newest Barbie -- Digital Barbie .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: She's beautiful . What's the price for Digital Barbie ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Our regular price for Digital Barbie is $ 29 . 95 plus tax .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Only $ 29 . 95 ? I'll buy it , of course .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Another one sold . Do you see anything else you would like ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thank you , but no . This will do it for now .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Tax brings your total to $ 32 . 42 . How would you like to pay ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Cash , please .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Here's your change . Thank you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Why are you so quiet ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: My girlfriend just broke up with me .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You must feel terrible now .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yeah .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I remember my first break up . It was the worst feeling in the world . I was crying everyday for three months . And slowly , it got better . I know you'll feel better too .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You've been through this too ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yeah . I remember it very clearly . The pain makes it easy to remember . I know you're really hurting right now , but you know many people experience break ups .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: But it hurts too much .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I know it's painful , but it's only temporary . After the pain goes away , you'll find other girls .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What if I don't want to find another girl ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You'll change your mind . Look at everyone in the world . They all break up and move on . The faster you understand this , the quicker you will recover .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You're right .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I also know you must still have strong feelings for her , but try to think of all the bad things . You know she didn't treat you that well . Is that the person you want to spend the rest of your life with ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yeah . Thanks for the talk .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'll give you a call later . We should hang out . It's good to be around people .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Ok . I'll talk to you later .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I really like the way this house looks .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , it has great curb appeal .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: The landscaping is wonderful !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , it is nice , but wait until you see the interior .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , I see what you mean !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: The carpeting and paint are all new , as well as the window treatments .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I love the sage green carpeting with the sunset-colored walls .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Come and see the kitchen .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , look at that beautiful countertop material and the double sink !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Let ' s go check out the bedroom and bathroom .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I really like the Jacuzzi bathtub in the bathroom .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I am happy that you like the house . We should write down what we like so that we can remember it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How's the bride-to-be ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Tired and stressed . This wedding is giving me a headache .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Just relax . With me as your maid of honor , everything will be fine !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm worried that everything will be chaotic !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hey ! I'm the tour guide . I'll take care of the Taiwanese guests .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You're going to have to tell them what to do in church , what everything means ...

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I will . Don't worry !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hit ' em high , hit ' em low . Class of ' 93 -- let's go !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hi there , everyone . We hope you're having a good night !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Wasn't that football game great ! I just knew we'd win !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: The night is young , folks . Get some food and mingle with those faces from yesterday .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Later we'll let you know who the King and Queen of the Reunion will be .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: But for now , the band is playing the songs from our senior year . Get out on that dance floor !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Is Stanley still singing that Elvis song ? He's really hogging the mic !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: If I hear Love Me Tender one more time , I think I'll go crazy !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: He sounds like a sick cow !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Can we adjust the pitch a little ? Maybe he'll sound better in a higher key .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I already tried that . Nothing seems to help .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hey ! Where are you going ... ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Coing out for a walk .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Why am I being arrested ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You have a warrant out for your arrest .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I don't have a warrant .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: My computer shows that you have a bench warrant .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I don't know what a bench warrant is .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You apparently missed a court appearance .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I was never told to go to court .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: There's nothing I can do about that .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: This isn't fair .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That's life .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What about my rights ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Anything you say can and will be used against you in a court of law .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hi , Ellen . That outfit looks terrific !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thanks , Jim . I didn ' t think guys paid attention to stuff like that .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: No , we just don ' t usually admit it !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , thanks for the compliment anyway !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Can you type , Jane ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , I can .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How many words a minute ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: About 100 words a minute .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: En ... and can you speak any foreign languages ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , I can speak Spanish , and I can also speak Chinese .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Really ? that ' s very good . What about French ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No , I can ' t speak French . But I can speak Italian , not very well though .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: ... Can you start next week ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Next week ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , on Monday .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You mean I have the job ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , that ' s right , you have the job now .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Why don't you watch where you're going ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Me ? You're the one who pulled out in front of me !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: There was plenty of room for me to pull out . You didn't have to stay in the lane you were in .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hey , listen . I had every right to stay in the lane I was in . You were supposed to wait until I passed to pull out . And anyhow , you didn't give me any time to change lanes . All of a sudden--BANG--there you are right in front of me .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I think my arm is broken .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sorry about your arm , but it serves you right . You need to learn how to drive . You're lucky you didn't get killed . And I'm lucky to be alive too .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Listen , let's just wait until the police get here . Then we can decide whose fault this accident was .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Fine with me . I know the laws of the road . I'm not worried .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I have a cell phone in my car . Now it's probably on the floor on the passenger side . Why don't you get it for me , and then I can call the police ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Alright .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It doesn't work . It looks like it's broken . I need to get to a hospital . You should drive me there .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , yeah ? It's better if we make a police report first . Then you can go to the hospital .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Damn it ! I'm injured here . We could wait all day for the police .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , you'll just have to wait . I'm not going to move my car until the police arrive . I'll go into one of those houses over there and use their phone . Don't worry . You'll get to the hospital in time .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It really hurts .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , maybe it does . But if you're going to drive like you did just now , you will have to get used to a little physical pain . You know what I mean ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: To hell with you . The accident was your fault .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm afraid it wasn't . And when the police get here , you will also see that it wasn't . But enough of this bickering . I'm going to go find a phone . Don ' t move that arm while I'm gone . Alright ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: To hell with you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Look ! Allen has the mic !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I thought he only liked to listen !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That was before he heard Stanley sing ! I guess he couldn't stand it any more , so he decided to give it a try himself !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: ( Sound of Allen singing ) Hey , Allen has a really good voice ! He sounds like Johnny Dean !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: And he can move . too ! He dances like Ricky Martin !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hey Julie , you want to go grab something to eat ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sure ! What do you feel like having ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I really feel like having a big juicy steak !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh . OK . I don't eat meat , but that's fine , I am sure wherever we are going they will have other options right ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I didn't know you were a vegetarian !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm not , I am a vegan .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: A what ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: A vegan . I don't eat or use any animal based products . I don't wear leather , eat eggs , drink milk or anything that comes from an animal . I used to be a pescatarian before , which basically means you don't eat meat , but still have fish and seafood .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Wow ! That's interesting ! It must be tough !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It's a bit difficult to find vegetarian friendly restaurants sometimes , but since more and more people are vegetarians or vegans nowadays , it's getting a bit less difficult .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hey , how was the show ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Not great . It's a kind of boring .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Really ? I heard it was supposed to be great .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , me too . But I'm disappointed .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: we really were lucky . We got the last available table for two---and we didn't even have a reservation ! Did you see the long lines behind us ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: yeah , I'm glad that we didn't have to wait long . I'm starving !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: let's take a look at the menu so we can order . Do you want to choose an appetizer for us to share ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: what would you rather have , samosas or poppadoms ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I heard that one of their specialities is the samosa .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: well , let's get a plate of those then .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: sounds good . What are you going to have for your main course ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I think I might have a dahl .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: what's in a dahl ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: it's got chickpeas and vegetables in a spicy curry sauce with rice .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: that sounds nice . Do you want to share some kebabs as well ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: ok . How about some lamb kebabs ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: that's my favourite . Do you want to have some wine or beer ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I think I'll have a beer .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: ok , shall I flag down the waitress ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I wouldn't recommend it . I think we should wait until she comes round .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: you're right . That might seem a bit rude . It's a good thing I've got you with me !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: what would you do without me ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hi , I made a reservation for a mid-size vehicle . The name is Jimmy Fox .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I ' m sorry , we have no mid-size available at the moment .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I don ' t understand , I made a reservation , do you have my reservation ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , we do , unfortunately we ran out of cars .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: But the reservation keeps the car here . That ' s why you have the reservation .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I know why we have reservations .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I don ' t think you do . If you did , I ' d have a car . See , you know how to take the reservation , you just don ' t know how to hold the reservation and that ' s really the most important part of the reservation , the holding . Anybody can just take them .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: But we do have a compact or an SUV if you ' d like .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Fine . I ' ll take the compact .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Alright . We have a blue Ford Focus for you , Mr . Fox . Would you like insurance ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yeah , you better give me the insurance , because I am gonna beat the hell out of this car .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Wow , the ferris wheel over there is so big . I'd like to take a ride on it .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It is called Energy Collector .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Look at your right-hand . Is it the zone of the Lost Maya Kingdom ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Maybe . Oh , I see the Jungle Flying Train . I once rode it . It was very exciting .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I want to have a try later .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Me too . Daniel , look at your left side . Can you see the Air Force Ants ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Wow , that's my favorite . It's like a superman shooting right up into the sky .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Good , you can make your dream come true here .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Of course . After this , I want to show you to the Haunted House .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: So you can prove you are a man .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Bingo !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It's just you !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hi Paul . How are you , friend .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Not good . My cousin is driving me up the wall .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How so ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: He stays up untill all hours of the night , and he never lifts a finger to help .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Have you talk to him about it ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Not yet , but I have to soon . He's eating me out of house and home . I caught him reading the fridge again last night

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Ahahah , Maybe that will help you lose weight .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: This is no laughing matter , Nick .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Sorry Paul . I couldn't help it . So why doesn't he give you a hand ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: He watch the tob too much . Now really I don't know . But I can't handle this much longer .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , talk to him , and let me know what happens , OK ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Welcome , how may I help you today ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm ask for a pizza , please .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Then you will be happy to hear that today all our pizzas are on sale . Two for one .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You're right , that is great .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What size would you like ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Medium one will be perfect , thank you

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Which kind do you want ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I like seafood on my pizza .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: We have two seafood pizzas . Tuna and crab .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Tuna sounds good today .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Would that be for here or take away ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That would be to go .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That'll be in a ten minutes . Please sit over there , and I'll call you over as sooner as it's ready .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No problem .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: The boss had an informal discussion with me this morning , I feel really down .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What ' s up ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , actually I failed to meet a deadline last week and I forgot to answer an e-mail for a VIP customer yesterday .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Anything that distracts you from work ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , everything . I feel overwhelmed by the daily work . Sometimes , I just can ' t focus on what I am doing . What is worse , though I make plans for a whole week , I always have to make changes later on because other things come up . I can ' t manage my time well . I can ' t handle work well . I am afraid I was screw up more things .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Look , Lucy . Things are not so bad as you said . This is our company ' s busiest time in a year . You need to relax a little . Don ' t push yourself too hard , ok ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , I will try .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How are you , Sue ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Pretty good . I ' Ve just had my new poems published .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Congratulations on your success .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: And how ' s your brother ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: He is fine .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: He ' s going to be sent to Britain to study , really ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes . He ' s already got the passport and visa .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Fantastic ! Please send him my congratulations .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you . He ' s very lucky indeed .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Wow , the ferris wheel over there is so big . I'd like to take a ride on it .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It is called Energy Collector .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Look at your right-hand . Is it the zone of the Lost Maya Kingdom ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Maybe . Oh . I see the Jungle Flying Train . I once rode it . It was very exciting .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I want to have a try later .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Me , too . Daniel , look at your left side . Can you see the Air Force Ants ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Wow , that's my favorite . It's like a superman shooting right up into the sky .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Good , you can make your dream come true here .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Of course . After this , I want to show you to the Haunted House .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: So you can prove you are a man .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Bingo !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It's just you !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Lee , I'm going to get married next month .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Good news ! And congratulations !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You are invited to my wedding .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you . I'll certainly be there .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Would you like to see our new shirts ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sorry , but I'm not really that interested in those things .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , they are very nice you know .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Really ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: And not expensive either .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , I don't care about that .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Everybody is buying them .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Are they ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , they are very fashionable , you see .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I am afraid I am not interested in fashion .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I see .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: But thank you very much all the same .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Sorry I couldn't help you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Ms Anderson , my name is Mike . I am Division Chief of ABC Company . Welcome to Toronto .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you . It's a pleasure to meet you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: A pleasure meeting you as well , the flowers are for you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you , they are beautiful .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I have a cell phone in my car . Now it's probably on the floor on the passenger side . Why don't you get it for me , and then I can call the police ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Alright .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It doesn't work . It looks like it's broken . I need to get to a hospital . You should drive me there .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , yeah ? It's better if we make a police report first . Then you can go to the hospital .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Damn it ! I'm injured here . We could wait all day for the police .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , you'll just have to wait . I'm not going to move my car until the police arrive . I'll go into one of those houses over there and use their phone . Don't worry . You'll get to the hospital in time .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It really hurts .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , maybe it does . But if you're going to drive like you did just now , you will have to get used to a little physical pain . You know what I mean ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: To hell with you . The accident was your fault .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm afraid it wasn't . And when the police get here , you will also see that it wasn't . But enough of this bickering . I'm going to go find a phone . Don ' t move that arm while I'm gone . Alright ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: To hell with you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Could I have some fish ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Certainly . And what vegetables would you like ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , spinach , I think .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Fine , And what about something to drink ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Just a beer , please .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Good . Thank you . sir .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Would you like to have some more beer ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: No , thanks . I ' Ve had enough . I'll have my bill , please .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Of course . Please wait a moment . I'll go and get it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thank you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hello , sir , what can I do for you today ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hello , I need a new suit . I have an important interview next week , so I really need to look sharp .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: No problem ! We have a broad selection of suits , all tailored made so that it will fit perfectly .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Great ! I want a three piece suit , preferably made from Italian cashmere or wool .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Very well sir . Would you like to have some shirts made also ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sure . I ' ll also take some silver cuff link and a pair of silk ties .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Very good . Now , if you will accompany me , we can take your measurements and choose the patterns for your suit and shirts .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hi , Dan . What's new ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Where have you been ? I've been trying to get in touch with you for two days .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I went to Salt Lake City on business . What's up ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I got fired .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How come ? Last time I saw you . You told me it was a good job , and you'd like to take it as a career . That was only one month ago . Why this sudden change ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It's a long story . In a word , I didn't do a good job of it . I messed up a business deal , a deal that would have made ten million dollars and I messed it up .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What are you going to do now ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I am trying to find a job asap . Lily doesn't know yet . I didn't tell her . I spent the past three days at the coffee shop next to your office , and she thought I went to work as usual .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That's not the way to solve the problem . Did you look in the classified advertisements column ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , I did . But I wasn't qualified for most of the jobs that I was interested in .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Listen . I will see what I can do , ok ? You go home and tell Lily about this problem you have now . She is your wife and I am sure she will understand .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I just don't know how to bring it up . Well , all right . She has the right to know anyways .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Look , here is a very special business card from an illustrator . Every time I go through my book of business cards , I will notice it . It is an eye-catching one .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Wow , fantastic . I like the font and color for his name . It is creative yet personal .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes , it is a bold design . People will believe he can make an illustration as an impressive as a business card . It just stands out from those plain and standard ones used by government people or other big private and public organizations .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I agree . Business cards are great tools for promoting personal business . It won ' t take much time to design an amazing card , but it can make a big difference among the crowd . And you ' ll always notice it from your collection . For they have outspoken colors , own design and the sizes are not always according the mainstream business card . I wish to have one like this . But for sure our company has its own corporate design which all employees have to follow .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Diane Grant ? I haven't seen you for ages !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Brian ! How have you been ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Pretty good . Say , you've really changed !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , well , I've lost some weight . And my hair is longer than before .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , you look great ! How are you ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm doing really well . I got married about three years ago . I have two kids now .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That's terrific !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I am really interested in buying this television .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That's so great !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How much are you selling it for ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: This t . v is only $ 2500 .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You can't be serious .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That's how much this t . v costs .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That's too expensive for me .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: This television is of very high quality .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: You can't go down on the price .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: By how much ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'll buy it for $ 2000 .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm sorry , but the price is final .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Lily , can you take part in our picnic this weekend ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That sounds great . Where are you going ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I think we can go to the river , go around and have supper .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What should I bring ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Nothing . Just wear comfortable clothes and good shoes for walking . We'll bring everything .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Are you finished ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes . May I have some more beer ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , sure . I'll be back in a minute . Thank you for waiting . Here it is . Did you enjoy your meal ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , the meal was very delicious and I enjoyed very much . I'm full .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Is that so ? I'm glad you enjoyed it .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: By the way , Miss . Where is the toilet ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Toilets are in the rear . I'm afraid all the toilets are fully occupied at the moment .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hi , Monica , how is everything going ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Everything goes well , but I am thinking about quitting my current job .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Why ? You ' re not satisfied anymore ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I just sense . But I cannot grow anymore . My boss is not really supporting me . I am interested in some positions in other JV companies , but I need to do some more in-depth research before I send my application letters out .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That is important . Doing research on a company you are interested in will definitely help your application .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Certainly , it is very nice talking with you . But I really have to go now . Catch you later .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Ok , good luck to you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: that was a really good meal , Gordon .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It sure was . I couldn't eat another bite .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: well , it is getting pretty late . I think we should go home .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: you're right . I have to get up early to go to work tomorrow .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: let's see how much the bill is .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: don't worry about it . Tonight is my treat .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: what are you talking about ? We'll split the bill .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: no , I insist . I kept telling you that I would treat you to dinner but I still haven't .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: no way , Gordon . I know that you are a little short on cash at the moment . There's no need for you to pay for the whole bill .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: alright , if that's the way you are going to be , we'll split the bill .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: that's better . This way we will both have money to take a cab home , otherwise , you would probably have to walk .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: just promise you will let me treat you to dinner next week , ok ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: you've got a deal .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: great . Bye .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: bye .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Nice to see you , Patrick .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Bob ! I hear your team won the match .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yeah . All of us tried our best .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Congratulations !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hi , Tina , I ' Ve got good news . I have successfully passed the first two rounds of interview with ABC Company . They informed me to go to the final round next Monday . It looks very promising .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That is awesome . Congratulation ! I know you can make it .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thanks . Let ' s go for a celebration this evening . Are you free ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes . Wait for me at the cafe down my office building . See 5PM , ok ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: No problem . See you !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: See you !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Why don't you watch where you're going ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Me ? You're the one who pulled out in front of me !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: There was plenty of room for me to pull out . You didn't have to stay in the lane you were in .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hey , listen . I had every right to stay in the lane I was in . You were supposed to wait until I passed to pull out . And anyhow , you didn't give me any time to change lanes . All of a sudden--BANG--there you are right in front of me .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I think my arm is broken .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sorry about your arm , but it serves you right . You need to learn how to drive . You're lucky you didn't get killed . And I'm lucky to be alive too .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Listen , let's just wait until the police get here . Then we can decide whose fault this accident was .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Fine with me . I know the laws of the road . I'm not worried .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I have a cell phone in my car . Now it's probably on the floor on the passenger side . Why don't you get it for me , and then I can call the police ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Alright .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It doesn't work . It looks like it's broken . I need to get to a hospital . You should drive me there .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , yeah ? It's better if we make a police report first . Then you can go to the hospital .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Damn it ! I'm injured here . We could wait all day for the police .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , you'll just have to wait . I'm not going to move my car until the police arrive . I'll go into one of those houses over there and use their phone . Don't worry . You'll get to the hospital in time .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It really hurts .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , maybe it does . But if you're going to drive like you did just now , you will have to get used to a little physical pain . You know what I mean ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: To hell with you . The accident was your fault .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm afraid it wasn't . And when the police get here , you will also see that it wasn't . But enough of this bickering . I'm going to go find a phone . Don ' t move that arm while I'm gone . Alright ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: To hell with you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Do you know how happy I am ? The Ant Kingdom is a perfect world with colorful fairy tales . It seems like the air is fresh here .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Just kids like that .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Come on baby , stop trying to pretend like a man . If you go there , you are sure to like them .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hurry up ! Hurry up ! What lovely caterpillars are over there !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I said you are sure to like them . There is the Grand Parade Of Ants Carnival in a few minutes in the square . You will experience a dream of fantasy .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What's that ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: All kinds of insects dress themselves up . They drive straight their own Flower Cars along the Parade Avenue of Ants Kingdom .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That's splendid . Can you take three pictures of me with them ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I thought you had grown out of such child practices .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Cut it out . Look at my smile , and it seems like the flowers in the spring . Right ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Gross !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hurry up ! The smile is frozen on my face .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Stupid girl , making me spend so much money , now I have to get it from the ATM ...

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hello , welcome to Universal Bank . Please insert your card into the slot .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I know where to put my card ! Stupid machine , talking to me like I ' m an idiot ...

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Please input your 6 digit PIN code followed by the pound key . Thank you . Please select an option . Thank you . You have selected withdrawal .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yeah , yeah , I know what I selected . Just give me my money !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Please type the amount you would like to withdraw . Thank you , you want to transfer 10000 USD to the World Wildlife Foundation . If this is correct please press 1 .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: No , no ! Stupid machine , what are you doing ! No !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Confirmed . Thank you for using our bank ! Please remove your card from the slot . Goodbye !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What do you think of this one ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Eh , so so .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: And this one ? Too flashy ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Nah , not too flashy .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hug ! And this sweater from my aunt ? Isn ' t it hideous ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I guess .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Are you even listening ? I ' m trying to have a conversation with you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: And I ' m trying to watch the game , but you ' re yapping on about your new clothes !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well I have to decide which gifts to keep and which to exchange for better ones when I go to the Boxing Day sales this afternoon !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well could you do me the favor of making this quick ? It ' s the third quarter and you ' Ve been blabbering on since the first !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , your precious game . You watch the same game every year , and each year your beloved hometown team loses by at least three goals !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh no you didn ' t . You didn ' t just insult the Sals-bury Seals , did you ? Why don ' t you just . just go and return all of those stupid clothes and not come back until the sales are over ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I might just ! Enjoy your stupid game !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hi Barbara . Have you lost weight ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hi Julie . Yeah . I've been on a diet for a couple of months now .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Wow . You look great .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thanks for noticing .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What type of diet were you on ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I joined a health club and my trainer gave me tips on eating . With a combination of eating better and exercising , I managed to lose 15 pounds in 2 months .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That's amazing . What tips did your trainer give you ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Mostly on how to exercise , but the best advice I got was changing my eating habits . Instead of eating 3 times a day , she told me to eat 5 times a day .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That doesn't make sense . If you eat more , than how do you lose weight ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Actually , I'm eating the same amount . I eat 5 smaller meals a day . Basically , it naturally speeds up the metabolism and helps to burn fat at a faster rate .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That makes sense . I'm going to try that .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You don't need to lose weight .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I have a little gut I have been trying to get rid of .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Ah ... but remember to incorporate a little exercise into your diet .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thanks for the advice .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No problem .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Something ' s burning ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , my bread !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Mm , I love burnt bread .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Curse this oven ! Curse it !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: But I prefer burnt bread .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Curse the worst oven in the world .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Wonderful ! A perfect piece of bread !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: There are thirteen of them . Oh , have another . Have a third , if you like , have them all .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hello , Bessie .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hello , Jack . Happy birthday !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: My birthday ? I forgot it , Thank you for remembering my birthday .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'd like to offer you my congratulations on your birthday and best wishes for your future happiness , good health and continued success . I've asked the Fairy Flowers to send you a bunch of flowers . I hope you'll like them .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thanks a lot . I'm so touched .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Now let me sing " Happy birthday " for you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Thank you very much .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'd appreciate it if you could help me pick out a gift for my daughter .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Would she be interested in a laptop ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That's exactly what I was thinking of .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: A Mac would be an excellent gift .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I like Macs . How much for a Mac ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: You can take a 15 - inch Pro home right now for only $ 2,100 .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: A Mac it is . I'll take one home with me .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: She'll be very happy with this . And how do you plan to pay for it ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'll use my VISA , if that's okay .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Now , if you'll just sign here , the Mac is all yours .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Will she need anything besides what's in this box ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Everything she needs is right here in the box .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I appreciate your help . Maybe I'll be back for more computer stuff .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Your daughter should get straight A's from now on . Good-bye .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm sorry I'm so late . I had a really bad day .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: It's ten after six . We ' re late . But dinner is at six thirty .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I know . I know . I'm really sorry . I lost my bag .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'll call the lost and found office .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I didn't think of it . Thank you . And I do apologize for being late .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Mary , could you please come in for a short while ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: No problem .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Mary , I'd like you to meet Richard , Our new executive in the marketing .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Nice to meet you , Austin .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Welcome to our department . I hope you'll like it here .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: By the way , Richard will assist me in the planning work . I hope you can work well together .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Sure , if you've got any problem you can ask me .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you . It ' s very kind of you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Richard , Mary is a very helpful and experienced secretary indeed , and I'm sure you will find out .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you , sir . I'll try my best to assist Richard in his work .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hello !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hello , Is that Stefan ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm sorry , but I'm afraid you've dialed the wrong number . There is no Stefan here .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Really ? Are you sure ? I called before and he was there .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yes . I'm sure . You have the wrong number . I have used this number for more than 20 years .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That can't be true . I remember the number clearly . Is your number 1199886 ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: No , it isn't . It's 1199866 . It seems that you have misdialed .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Oh , I'm sorry I bothered you . I'm really sorry .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It doesn't matter . It happens to everyone .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sorry again for bothering you .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That's all right .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hi , Jack , how have you been ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Not very well .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Why ? Looks like you're feeling very down ! What happened ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Nothing .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Come on . For a man who's feeling so , down , there're usually two reasons . Either his career is going downhill , or he has a broken heart . Since you're so successful , it must be the latter .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , you're right . I just broke up with Jane .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oh , I'm sorry . I thought you two were made for each ocher .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well , you never know . I'm ready for a commitment and want to settle down , but she says she wants to pursue her career while she's still young .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well , she is not to blame . It's always difficult to choose between career and family .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Maybe you're right .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Jack , I don't know what to say to comfort you , but cheer up ! There are plenty of fish in the sea and you'll find your soul mate , your perfect match !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yeah , but it's hard to forget her at moment . You know , we were together for almost five years . It's really hard ...

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: How about this floor lamp ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Fine , just get it ! We have been shopping for furniture for five hours ! I ' m so tired !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: We still need to find an armoire and a dresser .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Fine ! I am going to go home and drop off this nightstand , coffee table and love seat while you look for the rest of the things .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Great ! Pick me up in about an hour because I think I ' ll also get a bean bag and a dining set .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: While you are at it can you pick out a nice recliner ? I really want one so I can watch TV .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Recliner ? In my beautifully decorated living room ? I don ' t think so !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: How about this floor lamp ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Fine , just get it ! We have been shopping for furniture for five hours ! I ' m so tired !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: We still need to find an armoire and a dresser .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Fine ! I am going to go home and drop off this nightstand , coffee table and love seat while you look for the rest of the things .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Great ! Pick me up in about an hour because I think I ' ll also get a bean bag and a dining set .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: While you are at it can you pick out a nice recliner ? I really want one so I can watch TV .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Recliner ? In my beautifully decorated living room ? I don ' t think so !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What ' s wrong with you ? Why are you scratching so much ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I feel itchy ! I can ' t stand it anymore ! I think I may be coming down with something . I feel lightheaded and weak .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Let me have a look . Whoa ! Get away from me !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: What ' s wrong ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I think you have chicken pox ! You are contagious ! Get away ! Don ' t breathe on me !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Maybe it ' s just a rash or an allergy ! We can ' t be sure until I see a doctor .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Well in the meantime you are a biohazard ! I didn ' t get it when I was a kid and I ' Ve heard that you can even die if you get it as an adult !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Are you serious ? You always blow things out of proportion . In any case , I think I ' ll go take an oatmeal bath .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: What are you going to do next year ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I want to go traveling .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Do you have any where in mind ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes , I've been thinking about Florida .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hello , thanks for calling 123 Tech Help , I ' m Todd . How can I help you ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hello ? Can you help me ? My computer ! Oh man ...

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It ' s okay sir , calm down . What happened ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I turned on my laptop and it broke ! I mean , the monitor went black !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Ok , sir , it sounds like you might have a virus .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I don ' t feel sick , ... let me check ... Nope ! No fever , I ' m fine .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: No , your computer might have a virus , I mean , it has a bad program on it . Maybe that ' s why it crashed . I recommend that you run an antivirus program in order to safely remove any unwanted spyware or Trojans .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Phew ! . . . Wait a minute , CRASH ? ? ! ! Spyware ? Trojans ! What ? where ? when ? !

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: guess what ? I've got great news !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: what is it ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: well , you know how I've been working at the Economist as a proof-reader , right ?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: yes .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: well , the editor-in-chief heard that I had experience as an editor at another magadize and asked me if I was interested in becoming an assistant editor for him .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: really ? That's fantastic ! Will you get a chance to do any writing ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: she said that the columnist for the literary criticism column would be going on pregnancy leave soon and that I could be in charge of the column until she came back .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: wow ! That's really great news . How often does the magazine come out ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: it's a monthly magazine , but my column will be shared with another columnist so my articles will be due fortnightly .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: are you looking forward to doing more editing work ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: yes , but I'm even more excited about getting my thoughts published again !

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: do you have any order forms here so that I can get a subscription to the magazine ?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I don't have any with me , but I think I could manage to bring a free copy home for you .

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: I'm really looking forward to reading your column .

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: me , too . Do you want to go out to celebrate my good news ?

utterances.speaker: B
